summary: "The object, becoming a light that dispels darkness, will shine as a hope to illuminate the world." Yes, that's a light bulb. A hard action adventure game where a brave light bulb overcomes shadows with its gleaming and daring rolls, aiming for an electric lamp.

name: Lost Abroad Café
summary: Lost Abroad Café: a language learning game that puts you in the role of a virtual café owner in another country. Learn and use your new language to serve your customers and grow your business. Try it now on Steam Early Access!

name: Love: Fall in Death
summary:
Love: Fall in Death is an FMV (full-motion video) interactive film game developed by SNR Interactive in Istanbul.
The story follows Kutay, whose personality and fate are shaped by the player’s branching choices as he meets Ayşil in a lively Istanbul bar.
Depending on the choices, the narrative shifts between romantic comedy, drama, supernatural encounters, and light horror.

The game features live-action performances, multiple endings, Quick-Time Events, and a dice-based chance mechanic that affects key decisions.
Originally filmed in Turkish, the game is fully dubbed in twelve languages for its global release.

name: Lone Labyrinth
summary: A fantasy turn-based strategy game where your choices shape your party dynamic and morality

name: Love in the Time of Spellphage
summary: A one-hour spellpunk narrative adventure about pandemic, wizards, and first love.

name: Lost Orbit: Terminal Velocity
summary:
Prepare to once again embark on a perilous journey filled with deadly asteroids, orbital boosts and the emptiness of space, but this time escape space pirates and more in Lost Orbit: Terminal Velocity, the definitive version of the fast-paced, dodge ‘em up game from PixelNAUTS Games.

Lost Orbit centers around the exploration of space. Players take control of a lone astronaut who sets off on a dangerous journey to rejoin his civilization, armed with only an improvised set of equipment and a relentless spirit. Without the help of his ship, Harrison will need to use the gravitational forces of planets to navigate and propel himself through space.

Set in a world rich with comedy and tragedy, Lost Orbit is a game filled with risk, loneliness, wonder, and death.

name: Love ritual
summary: Visit a beautiful fantasy city as an occult scientist where a forbidden ritual was performed. Unravel the mystery with your detective skills as the plot thickens around you, and all while two handsome advocates vie for your attention and your heart.

name: Locally Sourced Anthology II: The Timeline
summary: A collection of 5 experimental games from different indie devs that takes you on a journey through time!

name: Lode Runner 3-D
summary: The game mechanics are similar to the original; you outrun 'monsters' by using alternate routes, sliding on ropes, climbing ladders or drilling holes in the ground to trap them. This game differs from the other incarnations of games from the series because of its apparent three-dimensional perspective. While essentially running in 2-dimensional space, the player has an option to move in another direction every so often. The levels are mostly spirals that require climbing to complete. There are five worlds and each one must be unlocked by finding five cards from the previous world excluding the first. Each world is divided into five stages with each stage divided into four levels. The general goal of each level is to collect a certain amount of gold to activate a portal that allows the player to continue. As the player progresses, each world adds new interactive objects and tools as well as new obstacles.

name: Lost Lands X
summary: The sudden madness of an old friend from the Lost Lands forces Susan, who has long since retired, to return to her old adventures. “Lost Lands X” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: Lost Judgment: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Lost Judgment is an action-adventure video game developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and published by Sega. A sequel to the 2018 game Judgment (a spin-off of the Like a Dragon series), the game focuses on private detective Takayuki Yagami as he investigates a criminal accused of both sexual harassment and murder

Joined by his partner, ex-yakuza Masaharu Kaito, the crime-fighting duo is called on to investigate a seemingly perfect crime whose lead suspect has an airtight alibi. What starts as a tale of revenge reveals a tangled web of conspiracy involving several unlikely factions taking advantage of a broken law system. But as victims pile up and Yagami unravels the truth, he must choose between defending the law or exacting justice.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following in-game content:

-Lost Judgment base game
-Detective Essentials Pack
-School Stories Expansion Pack

name: Loopedal
summary: As the DJ for Fantasma Night Club, use looping instruments to curate the vibe.

name: Love Love School Days
summary: The protagonist is trapped in the world of a love game. Can you return to the real world again...? Try to escape while running away from the gal game heroine A love simulation-style survival horror game!

name: Lord of Arcana
summary:
Lord of Arcana is an all-new brutal action role-playing game from Square Enix for the PSP (PlayStation Portable) system.

Dive into a world filled with vibrant visuals and non-stop multiplayer action in this new brutally visceral action RPG game

Multiplayer gameplay available for up to four players, allowing you to team up with friends to slay tough monsters and battles together.

The stunning monster artwork in the game has been designed in collaboration with many well-known illustrators who have been successful both abroad and in Japan, including some renowned Square Enix staff.

With incredible visuals and non-stop action, mixed with great multiplayer co-op and creatures designed by a variety of world-famous illustrators, LORD OF ARCANA is not to be missed when it comes to the PSP system.

name: Lost Hope
summary: Lost Hope is a multidimensional adventure game where you shape the world, battle zombies, and explore diverse territories, uncovering secrets while facing extreme challenges.

name: Love Tavern
summary: After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different girls from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.

name: Lomando.com
summary: A horror website from Japan launched in 2009 using the flash engine, being famous for its weirdness and visuals.

name: Logistical: Norway
summary: Logistical: Norway is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country with over 300 towns to Complete.

name: Lost Angel
summary: Lost Angel is the first feature-length interactive FMV(full motion video) made in Korea. We invite you to the dangerous journey of influencer Alex, who is on a trip to Korea!! Your choice will soon become a new story for this film.

name: Lone Wolf DS V: Shadow On the Sand
Lost in Tropics
summary: Lost in Tropics: Embark on an unforgettable survival adventure where the lush, unpredictable tropics become your testing ground. In this immersive game, you find yourself stranded on a mysterious island, where every corner hides both breathtaking beauty and perilous challenges.

name: Love Hospital
summary: "Love Hospital" is a comedy romance simulation game where you can enjoy sweet relationships with beautiful nurses. Experience the fun and laughter-filled romance unfolding in the hospital!"

name: Lost in Blindness
summary: Play as Alex, a young blind archeologist and follow the tracks left behind by the disappearance of the Mayan civilization! In this blind adventure game, discover an incredible 3D environment only by listening to the sounds around you, without using your eyes to see.

name: Lots of Things 2: Travel and Search - Collector's Edition
summary: AviGames presents Lots of Things 2, the second partt in the new hidden object series! Explore a variety of locations and search for hidden objects! Play lots of mini games and solve puzzles!

name: LoopWorlds Free
summary:
LoopWorlds is a logic puzzle game where you must collect every ‘bite’ in a level to complete it, in a very limited number of moves. There is usually only one possible combination which will yield victory in the number of moves given for each level, and it will not be the first one you try, and it is sometimes the last one you would ever think of.

After each group of levels, a new type of object will be added to the game, including sliding blocks, button-activated walls and portals.

Swipe to move, and the Discoball will keep rolling until it hits something; and if the Discoball exits the side of the screen it loops back in the other side.

You can still create your own levels too, but in this free version you cannot upload them or download levels from other players, just create and save them for later, and let your friends or family have a go on them! (on your own device of course) :)

LoopWorlds was originally based on the bonus levels in the Dizzy game Kwik Snax, but it has been greatly expanded upon and is now an epic evolution of it’s predecessor :)

name: Lonely House
summary: Lonely House is a cozy little game about home decorating. It's just you, pleasant music, and a solitary building at a crossroads. Decorate it to your liking and forget about your troubles.

name: Lost in the Maze of Those Memories I Wander and Nervously Laugh
Low_Signal
summary: In this mysterious first-person adventure, explore an abandoned 90's Asian slum with the help of various abilities, collect documents and objects to uncover the fate of its former inhabitants and interact with a strange Altar to unveil the story of this unique place.

name: Lone Wolf DS IV: The Chasm of Doom
Lone Wolf DS II: Fire On The Water
Love 365: Find Your Story
summary: Voltage's otome game catalogue app, which offers over 40 otome games with their character stories split up and sold individually. Previous titles sold on apps stores were taken down and added to this app, making it the only way to play most of the company's titles.

name: Lootfest
summary: This is a simple but fun game. Kill monsters, loot them for gold, buy bigger weapons. Enjoy a top view adventure game with classic controls, where your goal is to find and destroy the three evil bosses that are terrorizing your country.

name: Long Hun Shi Ke
summary: 全新3D无锁定动作网游，独具特色的主角时刻，充满挑战的团队副本，全面革新的3D动作竞技，流畅刺激的大型公会战，闪与攻的动作哲学，铸就血脉偾张的史诗体验！

name: Locked in my Darkness
summary: A tense, atmospheric descent into psychological horror—trapped in a place where reality fades and fear takes hold.

name: Logistical: Canada
summary: Logistical grows in North America with the addition of Canada. Over 800 New towns to Complete. Canada is huge. 2nd biggest country on this planet. Bigger than Australia but many parts not as accessible. That being said, it will take a lot of travel to play this country.

name: Lost Paradise of Karuta
summary:
"The one who came to meet me as I attempted suicide was a pure white grim reaper."

"A visual novel ensemble drama gift for those who find living in the present difficult."

A visual novel game themed around life and the human psyche, dedicated to those struggling to live in today's challenging times. This is a story searching for the answer to why we live.

name: Love Girls
summary: Indulge in a tranquil puzzle game that is sure to uplift your spirits.

name: Lost Host
summary:
Lost Host is a story-driven adventure puzzle game about a small toy car searching for its missing owner.
When the boy mysteriously disappears, the toy car begins a journey through the house and beyond, exploring dark rooms, hallways, foggy streets, and abandoned places while following clues to uncover what happened.

Players control the toy car as it navigates dangerous environments, solves physics-based puzzles, and interacts with objects to progress. The world is full of hazards for a tiny toy car - heights, fire, water - as well as enemies such as dogs, robotic vacuums, and hostile toy creatures.

The game combines atmospheric exploration, light horror elements, and emotional storytelling, creating a family-friendly adventure centered on mystery, discovery, and survival in a large, human-sized world.

name: Lost Memories Dot Net
summary: Lost Memories Dot Net is a game about chatting and building websites as a teenage girl in 2004. You play as 14 year old Nina, chatting with your online friend Kayla about a middle school love triangle, and building your blog between messages. You explore the online world Nina occupies, downloading images to decorate your blog as the drama at school unfolds.

name: Love is Blind: Mutants
summary: Love is Blind: Mutants is a stealth game that relies on the character's mutant powers in order to overcome obstacles such as guards and blocked pathways. The game utilises a low-poly, high-contrast aesthetic akin to early PSX games, for that genuine 'no frills' nostalgic gaming experience of yesteryear.

name: Love Across Izumi
summary: A new graduate student is perplexed about his future. Through serendipity, he decides to go on a self-exploration trip to Izumi, where is rich in tourism resources. In this trip, you will meet several girls with different personalities and find romance along the way.

name: Looking For Healer
summary:
A pick up group is looking for a healer…

Looking For Healer is a solo or cooperative "heal-em-up" card game where you (alone or with a friend) heal for a PuG (pick up group) trying to tackle bosses. Your party will make it hard on you, but with skill, expertise, and a bit of luck, they might not screw everything up...

Pick one of three healer classes, beat one of two bosses, and don’t let your idiot party members kill themselves!

name: Locked
summary: Maks is looking for a waitress he hasn’t seen for over a month. Intuition brings him to an abandoned mansion enshrouded in mystery and secrets. Will Maks find and save the girl?

name: Love Delivery2
summary:
The protagonist lives an uneventful and surplus life.

While shopping for second-hand goods to organize his house, he meets , who has just started broadcasting on the Internet. Strangely, he keeps running into her...

Meanwhile, at the internet broadcasting event, she meets , an extremely recognizable streamer from a large company...!

The love they've never been able to express before, the love of their special someone, is streaming!

name: Love Cult
summary: Love Cult - an otome inspired by Cult of the Lamb A dark romance game about saving the world with your cult followers to spread love, featuring a GxB/GxG romance!

name: Lost Epic: Premium Edition
summary: This is the story of a knight who would slay the gods themselves.

name: Loutra
summary: A loitering simulator and dreamcore powerhouse, Loutra opens its inaugural group show. Thirteen artists display their work within a world of crude, deteriorating pixels.

name: Lost Awakening
summary: A sci-fi point-and-click puzzle adventure game

name: Locomotive 115
summary: It's difficult to know how many locomotives have been swallowed by the suffocating blizzards of the Widow's Run. Cursed with creeping tales of things that lurk in the dark and overshadowed by frequent casualties, it now stands as your only path forward. Will you be able to survive?

name: Lotus: Lost Memories
summary: Step into the richly woven tale of Atsushi, a young samurai bound by duty to his ailing father. Undertake a journey of purpose as he faces skilled adversaries and uncovers the echoes of a legacy that will shape his destiny. Realized in a pixel art visual novel with turn based combat.

name: Lost Dooors
summary:
Escape from a mysterious ruin.

The new version of the "DOOORS" series, the stage clear-type escape game.

Solve many hidden mysteries to open the doors and escape from the ruins.

name: Loft is in the air
summary:
One-room loft is the new trend!!!

So as the best real estate agent in town, you can't let that opportunity pass. Wait! There are no more one-room lofts left to rent??

That won't stop you... You can perfectly turn any average flat into a shining one-room loft!

name: Lost in the Mythic Island
summary:
Lost in the Mythic Island (LitMI) is a MMO (Massive Multiplayer Online) Game.

The core idea is based on the most known First Person Shooter games, altough it has nothing to do with them!

The game features many game modes, from which the players can choose!

First comes the base story mode, then the death match and finally the capture the flag.

Story Mode: Inside you will play based on the game story in an open world, where you will find scary creatures, meet other players, form guids and of course you have to survive!

Death Match: Players are spawned inside a map, where they have to kill each other, reaching the maximum score in order to win the game.

Capture the Flag: This is the only team mode, where your goal is to capture enemy's flag and bring it to your base.

The game includes many unique features, like custom physics, also it compines many type of games, like Role Playing, Survival and Shooter games.

name: Loftia
summary: Welcome to Loftia, a cozy, multiplayer world where you can build towards a brighter, more sustainable future! Connect with friends both old and new, to farm, craft, explore, decorate, and create a meaningful impact - together.

name: Lords of the Chaos
summary:
Lords of the Chaos is a single player real time strategy game which has everything needed for an unforgettable experience.

The game has a default campaign with the story shown before each map starts and had a download option, with multiple server providers, to get additional campaigns or maps. Some downloads were free including a second campaign available at launch while others had to be bought separately.

There are 4 unit types in the game with commands for movement or a general attack into the fog of war and a behavior option that is active when waiting for orders, the hero unit can also cast spells.

There are 6 map tile types with grass as the only place to build, swamp and sand allow movement, water and mountains acting as barriers along with trees that can be chopped down for resources and to make paths.

There are 6 buildings available with different uses and menu options: main camp to train workers and the hero, farms for food to manage army size, Training camps to train and upgrade warriors or catapults, Towers for vission or upgraded to hold a catapult, wizard tower to research or change a hero's spells and gold mines for workers to gather money.

Due to CPU speed and memory differences between phone models, some features were removed from the relevant versions. These changes can include the map download feature, animations and spells.

name: Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch
summary: From the world of "Lost Eidolons" comes an all-new turn-based strategy RPG. Stranded on a mysterious island with scattered memories, your only means of survival is to fight. Recruit allies, undertake a perilous journey, and battle to reclaim what you've lost... no matter how many deaths it takes.

name: Lost In Transit
summary: a horror game about trains, girls, and hospitals

name: Love & Fool's Gold
summary:
Love & Fool’s Gold is a choice-driven Wild West romance-mystery visual novel with an Eldritchian horror twist.

You play as a nomadic bounty hunter, arriving in the town of Cortez Creek to chase a bounty, only to quickly discover that not everything is as it seems.

After meeting a cast of enigmatic characters, you're given a choice of who to partner up with to uncover the dark Eldritchian mystery that plagues this ill-fated town. But who do you choose? The Cowboy, the Bounty Hunter, or the Mysterious Outlaw? What does this mean for the desperate citizens of Cortez Creek? And is romance - or death - in the cards?

name: Locomotion
summary:
Locomotion is an arcade-puzzle game in which you are presented with a top-down view of a railway network with a number of stations and junctions. Trains are released from stations at random intervals, each with a destination station. Your job is to get a set number of them to this destination within a time limit.

You control a cursor which can click on each of the junctions, toggling their positions. When trains reach a junction which is not set in a direction they can move through, they will stop until you move it. When they reach the wrong station they simply reverse and continue. If two trains make contact, they are lost, and a penalty is accrued.

name: Lost Caves
summary: A 2D collect-a-thon in which you explore caverns filled with underground ruins to find treasure and to hopefully find your way back to the surface. Collecting treasure from chests accumulates your wealth, and the wealthier you become, you further you can progress.

name: Logiart Grimoire: Emil's Magic Training, Part 1
summary:
Emil has begun training to create Logiart puzzles, just in case!
Feel free to try out the records of his hard work.
It seems he still needs more training, but maybe he’s already managed to create a perfect puzzle now and then...?

name: Lone Ruin
summary: Venture into an old, magical ruin to seek an ancient power in this highly replayable, top-down, roguelike twin-stick shooter. Combine and optimise your spells to defeat twisted monstrosities and dive deeper into the Lone Ruin.

name: Love and Sex: First Base
summary: Become roommates with two gorgeous girls and explore the largest free hand-drawn 18+ dating sim ever. Level up your stats, sharpen your game, and roam the city to seduce 5 unique waifus & find your soulmate(s). Play your cards right, and your days will be filled with nothing but love… and sex!

name: Lovely x Cation
summary: The protagonist lives alone in an apartment owned by his uncle and lives a carefree school life. One spring day, his uncle can’t stand seeing him confining himself in his room any more and tells him to go out and find love while he is still young. However, he doesn’t have any experience with girls nor does he have anyone that he’s interested in.

name: Lost Surreal Hell
summary: A Turn Based RPG, where you collect elements, and evolve your attacks, but if you wander too far off the path, you may end up stuck in a strange surreal hell full of disjointed worlds full of surreal comedy shows, brainwashing, a strange company running a dying MMO in the backrooms and a dark truth.

name: Lords of the Fallen: The Monk's Decipher
summary:
The Monk's Decipher DLC adds a small quest to early game that grants a valuable item for treasure hunters. The quest begins in the Keystone Monastery, on a sideroom near the area where you meet the Injured Monk. An NPC called "Mysterious Monk" wearing a mask will appear, and you will have an option to talk to him and assist him in finding the signs Antanas has left behind for others to follow into the Citadel.

The NPC will give you the trinket Guide of Antanas, which you must equip to complete the quest. Once equipped, head up towards the gate you opened near the Injured Monk and out into the bridge with the three infested enemies. After dealing with them, check the sides of the walls for faded runes that you can now interact with by pressing triangle. Activate the symbol and continue forward towards the area where you obtain the Gauntlet. Look to the sidewall of the stairs and activate a second rune, then a third on the other end of the gauntlet bridge.

name: Lords of the Fallen: Game of the Year Edition
summary:
The new edition comes with all previously released DLCs bundled in, which include:

- ‘Lords of the Fallen’ itself
- ‘Ancient Labyrinth’ DLC
- Demonic Weapons Pack
- Lionheart Pack
‘- The Monk’s Decipher’ DLC

name: Looksley's Line Up
summary: Looksley's Line Up uses the DSi's camera to track the user's face in order to shift the 3D perspective to reveal hidden pictures.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Space Infantry Above and Beyond - Battle Pack 1
summary: Lock 'n Load Tactical Series now heads in the world of Science Fiction adding the Space Infantry Above and Beyond as an expansion game. You will test your tactical acumen as the determined Space Infantry and Colonial Guard advisors of the Imperium.

name: Loot Stack: Relics Hunter
summary: Explore ancient dungeons, uncover hidden treasures, and master the art of inventory management as you organize, stack, and collect precious relics in 25 scenarios. Can you find them all?

name: Lost girl's [diary]
summary: A group of girls are having their vacation, alone. What would a group of girls do on a dark Christmas night? Of course, fortunetelling! Unfortunately for them, their boyfriends are not about to leave them alone and their sudden visit totally ruins their plans for fortune telling, turning it into a scary story contest.

name: Lost and Found: What if I Come and Find It
summary: "Lost and found - What if I come and find It" is a first-person narrative game whose story will take you to the depths of working in a great corporation. After finishing your studies, you have achieved an internship in the maintenance department of SilverCup, the most renowned technological company in your city. A unique opportunity which will bring you a promising future.

name: Lost Relics
summary: The Lost Relics is a Zelda-inspired action-adventure game, blending intense combat, mind-bending puzzles, and the strategic use of powerful, ancient Relics.

name: Lovelace Case
summary: Lovelace Case is a Retro Lovecraftian Survival Horror set in the 1900s. Explore the nightmarish Mansion, manage scarce resources and face eldritch terrors where survival means choosing what parts of reality you are willing to lose.

name: London Cab Challenge
summary:
London Cab Challenge is a racing/driving game similar to Crazy Taxi but using a British taxi cab.

Each "mission" involves picking up and delivering customers to their destinations as quickly as possible, all while staying in the proper lane and avoiding collisions with traffic. A green arrow appears on-screen as a direction guide, changing to red when the destination spot is within sight. A yellow arrow helps in navigation, warning when a direction can be hazardous. An on-screen speedometer displays how fast the cab is going at all times.

Missions increase in difficulty as the game progresses, and better drivers gain rewards that can be used to upgrade the cab. Scores are kept on a Ranking board.

name: Longboard Stunts and Tricks
summary: Thrilling longboard downhill race starts! Ride through the twisty serpentine track, perform cool tricks. Compete with the most skilled skateboarders in different racing modes and win!

name: Lost Circus VR
summary: Meet a mysterious Clown and his abandoned circus. Will You dare to start a thrilling night excursion? If You dare to get into a barrel on the old, rusty cart, pushed by a strange Clown - get ready for an extreme experience.

name: Lost Island
summary: Trapped on an Island. Find items to survive and finish missions

name: Locomoto
summary: Locomoto is a cozy, life-sim adventure game set on a train, where you are the conductor! Customise and manage your train, while tending to your colourful passengers. Get onboard and embark on a journey through beautiful landscapes, accompanied by a soft, lofi original soundtrack.

name: Love Me or Die
summary: Yuki, a lonely teenager, embarks on a desperate quest for popularity and fame. But her path soon turns into a dark and tragic journey that will change her life forever. A retro graphic adventure with challenging puzzles, intense tweet battles, and a pixelated world filled with humor and mysteries.

name: Locke(d)
summary: An algorithm decided to show you this. What now?

name: Longcat Journey
summary: Longcat Journey is a Snake-like puzzle game. Stretch the cat to collect all the fish scattered around the screen and reach the ladder to complete each level.

name: LogicBots
summary: Design, build and wire up your own unique robot to complete challenging logic puzzles. LogicBots is a puzzle game where robots are used to complete the various levels. Sometimes the LogicBots will be controlled by the player and other times they will work independently to complete the puzzles. In both cases it will be up to the player to design, build and wire their LogicBot to meet the requirements of the level.

name: Long 15: NCR Expansion
summary: Massive lore-friendly quest & land expansion with 30+ quests, 200+ fully voiced characters, new minor factions, player homes, and multiple main questlines. Allows the player to visit the Long 15 before nuking it in Lonesome Road, and expands upon NCR lands in California. ~20 hours of total content, with expansive player choice and consequences.

name: Low and Furious
summary: Low and Furious is a thrilling driving game set in a Brazilian map that lets you customize your dream car and participate in exciting races and role-playing missions. With stunning graphics and engaging gameplay, LAF is a must-play for racing game and car customization enthusiasts.

name: Love Live! School Idol Festival 2: Miracle Live!
summary: Curtain has been raised once again for the School Idol Festival and strongly aimed by μ’s, Aqours, Nijigasaki School Idol Club, and Liella!

name: Locked Heart
summary:
Can androids fall in love? That is what Nat thought to himself.

One day, an android arrived at An's house, called himself "NAT-39" and said she is his new master. With a face similar with someone who was special to An's, she let the android stay in her house. As time passed by the android began to learn about An's life, about the certain someone... and so about himself.

name: Lost Balloons: Airy mates
summary: "If only I could fly free in that sky..." This is a hard action-adventure game that should be played while holding on to the memories of those days of floating balloons with such thoughts in mind. Easy among the LOST object series by KIMIDORI SOFT, so it is recommended for first-time players.

name: Lobotomy Corporation
summary: Monster Management Rogue-Lite Simulation game inspired by the monsters from game and movies such as SCP Foundation, Cabin in the woods and Warehouse 13. One disaster will cause another, and it will lead everything into chaos. Manage and Survive.

name: Lost in Random
summary: Welcome to the world of Random, a dark kingdom where every citizen’s future is determined by the roll of a dice. Will you be defeated by your fate or embrace chaos and learn to make it work in your favor? Embark on a journey with Even and her sidekick Dicey to play the odds and break the curse of Random.

name: Logiart Grimoire: Emil's Magic Training, Part 2
summary: Emil has begun training to create Logiart puzzles, just in case! Feel free to try out the records of his hard work.

name: Love Live! School Idol Paradise: Vol.3 Lily White Unit
summary: Love Live! School Idol Paradise is a rhythm-action game based on the Love Live! franchise. The game was split into three versions as "Vol.1 Printemps Unit", "Vol.2 BiBi Unit", and "Vol.3 Lily White Unit".

name: Lost in Prayer
summary: Lost in Prayer is a traditional grid-based roguelike in which everything that kills you becomes playable. As a disembodied soul, possess the inhabitants of the afterlife to conquer either Heaven or Hell as you seek the final deliverance you were promised.

name: Logiart Grimoire: Emil's Magic Training, Part 5
summary: Emil has begun training to create Logiart puzzles, just in case! Feel free to try out the records of his hard work.

name: Lost Twins 2
summary: A cute puzzle-platformer with a unique mechanic of moving the world itself to create new paths. Play solo or with a friend in local co-op mode to help Ben & Abi navigate this mysterious world. Engage in clever puzzles & overcome obstacles to help them re-unite & find their way back home

name: Lost: Via Domus
summary: In Via Domus, players control Elliott Maslow, another survivor of the Oceanic flight 815 plane crash. The game takes place during the first 70 days after the crash and includes all of the main characters from the show.

name: Lost Fragment
summary: Survival Horror game made in Unreal Engine 5

name: Logiart Grimoire: Emil's Magic Training, Part 4
summary: Emil has begun training to create Logiart puzzles, just in case! Feel free to try out the records of his hard work.

name: Lost Base Escape
summary: Lost Base Escape - Sci-Fi horror with elements of shooter. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of an abandoned space station. Hide from the monsters, and travel through the maze. And finally find the exit.

name: Love in the Glen
summary: “Love in the Glen” is a romantic otome visual novel/dating sim with a fun and charming match 3 minigame. Follow in the steps of Zoe Richardson, an interior designer living and working in Los Angeles’ exclusive and stylish Westside, as she explores the true meaning of love, commitment and passion and how it exists on so many different levels and planes.

name: Loopwood
summary: Loopy, moody, solitaire puzzle

name: Lolita Expedition
summary: Around a game called《Lolita Expedition》, it tells the story of playing in dreams and the incredible things that all kinds of players encounter here. It seems that dreams are invading the real world. In order to uncover the truth of the event, we did our best to investigate……

name: Lombardi's World
summary:
Welcome to Lombardi's World. You will die here, but you'll have some fun. You and your friends must band together to explore, complete puzzles, and fight enemies with the ultimate goal of defeating Chris Lombardi of Matador Records.

The game takes place in a surreal world where Matador Records rules over all inhabitants. At the helm of this bleak tyranny is none other than Chris Lombardi. Matador records must be stopped, and it is up to three heroes to defeat them! Trait, Tommy and Stoney must work together using their unique hero abilities to conquer evil enemies and solve difficult puzzles.

name: Looking for Cold Girls
summary: In this world, materials are in short supply. You must gather enough supplies if you want to escape. There are a total of 24 different props distributed throughout the scene. Every time you find an item, you will earn some gold, and your Allies will regularly replenish you with some gold.

name: Love is Dead
summary: "Love is Dead is an action/puzzle game about love, death, and pancakes. You and your love are on a world-spanning adventure through graveyards, cities, an art gallery, a volcano, and beyond. Successor to the i saw her web game series that won the 2014 Canadian Videogame Awards’ Best Casual Game."

name: Lotte’s Forest: The Tale of Love
summary: A otome game by R-Infinity and Abracadabra Inc.

name: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die - Stitched in Style
summary: Dress to impress - or intimidate - with the Stitched in Style Expansion! Unlock two patchwork-perfect sets for Aleksandra and Fortune, tailor-made by the Rug Reader herself. Wrap yourself in mystic flair with the Rulemaster's Set or embrace your sinister side with Ludo's Outfit.

name: Lost Horizon 2
summary: In the shadow of the Cold War, Fenton Paddock is facing the hardest fight of his life. While the tensions between the superpowers threaten to tear the world apart, the British soldier has to save his family that has been caught by powerful enemies.

name: Lost in Play
summary: Go on a feel-good adventure with a brother and sister as they explore dreamscapes and befriend magical creatures. Lost in their imagination, Toto and Gal must stick together and solve puzzles to journey back home. This whimsical puzzle adventure game will make you feel like you're playing a cartoon!

name: Logos Panic: Goaisatu
summary:
Logos Panic GO.A.I.SA.TU. is a Japan-exclusive puzzle video game released for the Super Famicom. It was developed by Kan's and published by Yutaka in 1995.

The characters were designed by Kotobuki Shiriagari.

The game starts with an animated/cinematic intro sequence. A Japanese man and woman portrayed in the distinct business man/woman ("Kaisha-in 事務員") satire comedy Kotobuki Shiriagari "Heta-Uma へたうま" style, turn up at work but they can't understand the greetings their co-workers are saying. Suddenly a silver-haired devil turns up mumbling something. The man and woman say: "He just said しつれいします, didn't he?", prompting the start screen to launch. Logos Panic pits players to scramble Japanese Kanji in a sort of Tetris puzzle style scenario; kanji must be correctly put together in time, simultaneously as new kanji pop out at the bottom of the screen. The game ends when the player can't assemble appropriate sentences in time. At the beginning there are only eight selectable characters but as the game progresses, another three will eventually appear. It uses a password system to allow players to pick up and play at their leisure.

Logos Panic is about garbled versions of greeting words. Goaisatu "ごあいさつ" or greetings are the words used in the game being 'garbled' and pretty random, not just greetings. They are puzzled over the greetings "aisatsu します". The two players have to create words that appear in red, yellow and blue at the sides of the screen, aspects to consider are players and the blue line to pay attention to, in order to correctly put the katakanas in their correct grammatical place.

name: LOR - League of Runners
summary: You will fight for the title of best runner in a beautiful fantasy world. You will need to pick up the scope to activate the portal and enter it. The main task - to pass as quickly as possible given the track.

name: Lostmiao Mjao
summary: Open-world pet simulation game: Cats & Dogs

name: Love
summary: Love is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) created by Eskil Steenberg. Unlike most such games, the content in Love is almost entirely procedurally generated. Another major difference is that there are no predetermined quests; instead, the gameplay is emergent from the interactions of players with each other, with NPCs and the environment. Love uses skill-based progression and any benefits gained from defeating NPC enemies apply to all players from the same settlement.

name: Locus
summary:
Locus is going to take your eyes and ears for a ride!

It's the ultimate multiplayer VR game! Network up to 9 players or go head to head with one of 12 computer teams! Locus is about speed. It's about action on the floor. Action on the walls... on the ceiling. Non-stop action everywhere you turn. It's about bashing your opponent to get the ball... and not getting creamed in the process. It's simple. Move. Crush. Score. Do it again. Until you are victorious and ready for the next challenge... the next arena... your next chance to become LOCUS.

name: Lock n Drop Bracket Racing
summary: Racers can Select from multiple cars and race split screen with a friend!

name: Lost Soul
summary: “Lost Soul” is a multiplayer horror survival game for 1-4 players. Work together to rescue possessed souls, using your surroundings and strategy to fight and escape. Play cautiously to avoid detection while experiencing fear and excitement. Join with others, scream, and defeat the ominous threat.

name: Loot of Baal
summary: "Loot of Baal" is an idle game nestled right on your screen's sidebar. Multitask your way to glory by sending your hireling crew out to explore, fight demons, and collect loot while you focus on other things! With hundreds of uniquely skilled hirelings, over 1000 distinct items, and a wealth of randomized battle stages, there’s always something to discover. Craft items and upgrade them to Immortal levels, and trade items online with other players to create the perfect team of heroes.

name: Love Shore
summary: Play as Sam or Farah as they attempt to navigate the neon thrills of their cyberpunk city Love Shore, solve murders, fight gods and maybe fall in love.

name: Lost in Space
summary: Lost in Space is an open space survival adventure game. You have received a distress signal from a spacecraft.

name: Love Starts Again
summary: A live-action romance adventure with high-definition images from a first-person perspective. A love drama begins with a friend, a childhood friend, a junior from high school, a senior at a part-time job, an influencer you like, and a student you saved from a delinquent...

name: Loop
summary: Loop is a vibrant Contemplative Puzzle Game; where you and your companion travel through a mysterious, ethereal temple. During this Journey, you will traverse many riddles and face the ultimate enigma: can the endless loop be broken?

name: Lordbound
summary:
The land of Druadach, a dense new region larger than Solstheim, filled with quests, dungeons, events and activities, for you to enjoy.
About 60+ hours worth of content through main questlines and side content.

Over 40 quests, found through our many new settlements and exploring the world.

Over 50 new dungeons, featuring the most epic spaces you've ever explored!

The biggest main quest you've ever played in Skyrim, with choices and consequences that change the state of the valley.
Join Lord Haelan on a quest to uncover the truth behind his family’s past.
Assist the Imperial Legion in reclaiming the trade route to Jehanna.
Support the Orcs of Garshakur, as they defend their new home against the Legion.

Loot that you’ll want to carry over to your future adventures. New weapons, armor, spells, and surprising consumables.

Fully-voiced NPCs and an original soundtrack!

name: Lost in Cheese
summary: Lost in Cheese is a brand new puzzle game. Play as Mewton, a cube shaped cat who travels to Roll island. Embark on a cozy adventure filled with cheese. Lots of cheese. Your mission? Push, strategize, and clear the path to the big red button!

name: Lorelei and the Laser Eyes
summary:
A woman, summoned by an eccentric man to participate in a project in an old hotel somewhere in central Europe, becomes embroiled in a game of illusions, increasingly dangerous and surreal.

Now you are invited to fall into the same rabbit hole, in a non-linear mystery with an immense amount of handcrafted puzzles, constantly presenting you with new riddles to solve, each leading you closer to deciphering the enigma of Lorelei and the Laser Eyes.

name: Loded Depths
summary: Take on the role of an adventurous archaeologist who stumbles upon clues leading to a mythical underground civilization believed to hold immense knowledge and power.

name: Lost Ground
summary: 3x3 grid turn-based battle and the exquisite encounter of the rogue-lite deck building! Place multiple heroes on the 3x3 grid to strategically defeat your enemies. Customize and grow your heroes with various combinations of gears, cards, and relics. Defeat the demons to reclaim lost ground!

name: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Patrick
summary: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Patrick is a fun and rewarding puzzle game. Assemble charming St.Patrick Day-themed pictures, sharpen your attention, and immerse yourself in a festive holiday world.

name: Loreen's Purgatory
summary: Get ready to be hunted by monsters, surprised by jump scares, and tested by the rage-inducing obstacles! Get ready to conquer Loreen's Purgatory! if you can...

name: Lorem Gioco
summary: A colorful, fast-paced symmetry-based arcade puzzle game inspired by Puyo Puyo and Tetris. Features a lighthearted story and gameplay that emphasizes space management, speed and strategy.

name: Long Nardy
summary:
Nard refers to both intellectual games and gambling, which allows you to combine "business with pleasure", while giving the player the opportunity to show logic and feel the triumph of victory. In our case, we are talking about the game Long Nardy, since no other game will allow you to get so much adrenaline.
When playing Long Nardy, you will have to "work your head" well, because in order to play Long Nardy, you need ingenuity, tactical thinking, the ability to see the game one move ahead.

name: Lorelai
summary: Lorelai, a brand new emotional horror ride from the maker of The Cat Lady and Downfall, tells a coming of age story of a young girl trying to escape the hell of her toxic family home. But adulthood is like waking up from a long dream. There will be times you will wish you were asleep again... But you can never go back to the same dream.

name: Locked in for the Win
summary: Your star gymnast can't seem to concentrate on his competition. That's when you decide it's time to lock your jock's cock.

name: Looney Tunes World of Mayhem
summary:
Join Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Marvin the Martian and all the classic toons to build the greatest “Toon Team” in Looney Tunes World of Mayhem! Collect cartoon characters like Tweety Bird, Taz, Road Runner and more to wage wacky battles in a vibrant Looney Tunes World.

Collect your favorite characters and discover their unique and hilarious fighting abilities. Characters from Road Runner and Wile E. Coyote to Sylvester and Tweety to Porky Pig each have unique abilities and hilarious attacks. Collect all the classic Looney Tunes cartoon characters in this epic action RPG.

name: Lock-On
summary: Lock-On is a 1986 first-person combat flight simulator video game with a futuristic theme. It was developed by Tatsumi and licensed to Data East for US distribution. Its graphics feature scaling sprites and a full-screen rotation effect. The game consists of 20 levels. Gameplay is similar to After Burner: the plane follows a predefined path, but the player can steer it slightly to evade incoming missiles. The player can fire guns and homing missiles, the latter of which requires the eponymous lock-on first.

name: Looped
summary: Looped is a short interactive story that lasts around 30 minutes. You will help Him and Her to progress by solving mini-puzzles and clicking your way forward the Chapters. It's a short, peaceful story about love that's perfect to enjoy when you need a break.

name: Lock On
summary:
After a vicious warlord threatens the nations of the world with a massive military invasion, the United Nations have recruited an experienced pilot by the name of Jake Steel in order to bring peace back to the world.
The player will participate in a variety of missions against both air and ground forces and can fly in four different aircraft (the British made Panavia Tornado ADV, the Japanese Mitsubishi F-2 fighter, the A-10 Thunderbolt II and the F-14 Tomcat). The player can use the strengths of each airplane to their advantage along with their powerful weaponry such as M61 Vulcans cannons and heat seeking missiles against enemy jet fighters, tanks and other various enemies scattered throughout each mission.

name: Lords & Villeins
summary: Grow dynasties of medieval families and see them evolve and interact as you build their homes. Lightearted pixel art city builder where you manage peasant and noble families, expand your production chain and influence the daily lives of your villagers to craft a unique story of your settlement.

name: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Christmas
summary: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Christmas is a fun and rewarding puzzle game. Assemble charming Christmas-themed pictures, sharpen your attention, and immerse yourself in a festive holiday world.

name: LoveKami -Divinity Stage-
summary: MoeNovel's exciting new original title, LoveKami -Divinity Stage-, debuts on Steam in English, bringing a fun and energetic tale filled with magic and music!

name: Loop: New Reality
summary: A VR game play tester finds herself locked in a NEW REALITY! Slip on the revolutionary NEW REALITY headset and dive into the mesmerizing purple void. But beware—The Warden prowls relentlessly, hunting for its next prey.

name: Love in Login
summary: Met the girl who is my game buddy in real life.

name: Loot River
summary: Set in a series of procedurally generated labyrinths, Loot River is a dungeon crawling action roguelike that combines tense, real-time combat and dark fantasy settings with spatial block-shifting.

name: Lost in Anomaly
summary: You wake up on the 9th floor of an unknown building. The only way out of here is to detect and mark anomalies. One wrong move and you could be trapped forever.

name: Locust_4457
summary: Locust_4457 is a self-contained compilation of puzzles with elements of cryptography, escape rooms, and some ARG tropes.

name: Love At First Squeak
summary:
Are you desperate for love this Valentine's week? Well head on down to the Rat Hole Nightclub and mix it up with some of Scythe's locals to find romance!

Have fun, fall in love, & remember to open up your heart, all the way. Rip it open! A brand new dating experience where you pursue romance at the hip Rat Hole nightclub. But on this night - vulnerability can be deadly!

name: Love Is All Around: Love In The Room
summary: "Xiamen, I'm here!" You will play as the male protagonist Gu Yi and immerse yourself in a unique shared living life with three beautiful roommates in Xiamen from a first person perspective.Who you would choose at the end, is up to you to decide.

name: Lone Fury
summary: A top down arcade shooter for the Playdate inspired by classic 80's coin-op arcade games.

name: Lost Worlds Prophecy
summary:
Lost Worlds Prophecy is a fun and relaxing casual puzzle game for the whole family.
Fire bouncy drones through the screen to collect shiny gems and hit your enemies to collect points and get to the next level.

Top Puzzle fun and action for the complete family!
Use your puzzle solving skills to beat the highscore and become the best! 🚀
The game is beautifully designed and features music+soundfx by German Techno producer 0x7f.

Please Note: The free version is Ad supported, however if you want the best puzzle action without ads, you can get the premium version of this challenging game in the play store as well, which is completely ad-free.

The whole game (from coding and design to music) is made by a single developer.
Only some graphic layers are purchased assets, so if you like it, please show your support by sharing the game on social media, or your own websites.
The more response it gets, the more updates and new levels it will receive.
Thank you! 

FYI: This is only the first version, more bonuses and items will be included soon for even more puzzle fun! Hopefully this will become one of the best free puzzle games you can find on the play store.

name: Loopstructor
summary: Loopstructor is a strategy tower defense survival Roguelike game. Design defensive lines, assemble battle carts and construct firepower to destroy waves of enemies! Continuously experiment with different combinations of caravans and zones to slaughter the monsters.

name: Looping Doors: Subway
summary: You are stuck in a loop in a subway station. And there are two buttons in front of you. You need to press the right button 20 times to get out of this loop. Memorize where the items are in the subway station in level 0. You need to find out if there are any anomalies in the next levels. If there are, press the red button, if not, press the green button. One mistake will send you back to level 0. Good luck...

name: Love Curse: Find Your Soulmate
summary: It is a girls' love visual novel set against the backdrop of college and the workplace. The protagonist carries a love curse and is searching for her true love. However, as events unfold, she finds herself facing even bigger challenges...

name: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die - Fortune Edition
Loco Loco
summary: A puzzle game from Garoo Games.

name: Lone Labyrinth: Burden of the Just
summary: A morally-charged action RPG where you hunt the condemned to decide who deserves salvation–or punishment.

name: Love Alone Death
summary: Build relationship with the characters. Your choices might earn you favor from one character, but disdain from another. Use items to solve problems. Confront various endings. Choose one person and face the end with them.

name: Lorsvale
summary: Lorsvale is a open world fantasy rpg, where four factions battle for dominance. As a new arrival you can recruit allies, form alliances, and defeat foes as you shape the future of the Lorsvale.

name: Lore Distance Relationship
summary: Follow user StaircaseHaven14 on a Neopets-esque site called Ruffians as she faces life's challenges, RPs with her long-distance BFF (or more than BFF?) Bee, and encounters familial hardship, from age 8 to 18.

name: Love Drops
summary: A port of Love Drops: Miracle Doukyo Monogatari for PlayStation 2. It censors the erotic content and adds new scenes and cg's.

name: Looptide
summary:
For some reason, you find yourself drowning. A strange person saves you.
A short visual novel made for the GMTK Game Jam 2025.

name: Lost Lands: Sand Captivity
summary: An artifact found on Earth interferes with Susan's life and forces her to return to adventures. “Lost Lands: Sand Captivity” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: Lost Echo
summary:
In the near future Greg's girlfriend Chloe mysteriously disappears in front of him.
He starts a desperate search for her. What happened? Why does no-one else remember her?

In this indie, story driven adventure game you explore fully 3d environments using an intuitive point and click interface.
Solve puzzles, explore, play minigames, interact with numerous characters and find out what really happened!

name: Lootbox Lyfe
summary: Lootbox Lyfe is a hardcore metroidvania platformer with idle game elements and satirical comedy.

name: Logi Box
summary: Logi Box is a clone of Nonograms/Picross published by DAN-BALL. In addition to the ten built-in puzzles, players can create their own puzzles and download puzzles shared by other players on the website.

name: Logic: Electrons Connect
summary: Logical game for meditation in which you need to connect all of the electrons among themselves.

name: Logic Leap
summary: In this unique command-driven puzzle platformer, you don't directly control your character. Instead, you write an "action script" for it, acting like a "programmer." Your character will strictly follow the script to navigate traps, avoid enemies, and unlock mechanisms.

name: Lock 'n' Chase
summary: Lock 'n' Chase is a 1981 maze arcade game developed and published by Data East in Japan in 1981, and later published in North America by Taito. Lock 'n' Chase was Data East's response to Pac-Man. The game's main character is a thief. The object of the game is to enter a maze and collect all the coins and, if possible, any other treasure that may appear. The thief must then exit the maze (a vault) without being apprehended by the Super D (policemen). The thief can close doorways within the maze in order to temporarily trap the Super D and allow him to keep his distance from them. Only two doors can be closed at a time. The Super D policemen are named Stiffy, Scaredy, Smarty, and Silly.

name: Lophis Roguelike-Card RPG game: Darkest Dungeon
summary:
We fused card games and roguelikes together to make the best single player deckbuilder we could. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, and Dark Dungeon Survival -Lophis Fate Card Rougelike is a single-player RPG card game.
The game incorporates the popular Roguelike game elements and creates rich unknowns and diversity, ensuring that the game experience is different for each time. In the game world, players need to make choices when encounter emergencies, and defeat the enemies in the adventure combat by establishing card group strategies so as to complete the adventure tour of the roles.

【Independent role story】
There are six different careers of roles with different career skills and exclusive cards. Each role has an independent plot and independent battle ending.

【Different chapters of the plot】
A total of four chapters are included. Maps and the regional guardians of each chapter are randomly generated. Players need to defeat the final boss to clear the stage.

【A Large number of emergencies】
Random emergencies will occur during the game and different decisions need to be made so the entire adventure may be influenced. Currently more than 60 emergencies have been designed in the game.

【Brain-burning card group building】
The card group building in the game adopts the method of DBG, which means players do not have to choose from a big card pool to build their own card group. There will be a set of initial card groups according to different careers. Players can constantly acquire other cards during the game process and gradually perfect the card groups that are suit them.

name: Love Colors: All in One
summary: Love Colors - All in One Pack Includes DLC 1 - Happy Pixels features and DLC 2 - Pixel Adventurer.

name: Lonely One : Hole-in-one
summary: There lives a lonely one, who pitches and putts all day long, for he has not much else to do and all by himself except for tiny gnomes.

name: Lode Runner
summary: An unreleased version of the game for the Atari Lynx was discovered in 2008 on an old Atari Corp. hard drive and was eventually released by Video 61. The Bungeling Empire has stolen a huge cache of gold from its rightful owners, and your mission is to infiltrate its treasury and recapture it. This entails progressing through 150 screens of platforms, ladders and ropes. The Empire has sent robotic guards down to protect the gold, and contact with any of these will cost you a life. Your method of escaping them is to press fire to dig a hole in their line of movement, thus causing them to fall in briefly, allowing you to move across the gap safely. Once all the gold has been collected, a ladder allowing you to move onto the next screen is added. Completing these screens often requires forward planning and precision.

name: Lots of Cats in Every Moment
summary: “Lots of Cats in Every Moment” is a game where you find hidden cats while romance unfolds!

name: LostBound
summary: Have you ever thought about a mod that adds skyscrapers to the game to explore? Probably. Luckily for you, this mod does exactly that - and more.

name: Looking for Aliens: Collector's Edition
summary:
Aliens are among us! Can you find traces of them on Earth, the moon, and the edges of the galaxy? Find all the clues to prove the existence of alien civilizations and discover how making fried eggs can end up in a monster attack!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
• Blast-off with five exciting bonus levels!
• Explore the galaxy with a downloadable soundtrack and wallpapers!
• Tons of hidden cards to collect!

name: Love Hotel Manager
summary: Love Hotel Manager is a game where you own your own Love hotel! Manage and customize unique and whacky rooms while dealing with strange customers and their needs. Slowly expand your hotel to become a thriving business.

name: Lovely Girls
summary: A puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.

name: Lost in the Dark Woods
summary:
In the dense, shadowy forest, the crackling fire is your only defense. The flames flicker and dance, casting long shadows that keep the predators at bay. But the fire is weakening. The night is alive with sounds—rustling leaves, distant growls—reminders that danger lurks just beyond the light.

You must gather wood quickly, feeding the flames to keep them strong. Every piece of wood you find is a lifeline, each spark a promise of safety. The fire is your shield, your beacon of hope in the dark wilderness.

If the fire dies, the predators will close in, their eyes glowing in the darkness, and the forest will consume you. You have no choice—keep the fire burning, or face the terror that waits in the night.

name: LoveKami -Useless Goddess-
summary: After finding a collapsed goddess on the street, Sho takes her home. Akane is an Aragami, a goddess that only thinks about herself and causes trouble to those around her. Can Sho, with the help of Inori and Maika, help Akane reform into a perfect goddess?

name: Locked In Mind
summary: In Locked in Mind, you are trapped in a virtual escape room full of puzzles. Use your wits to solve them at your own pace without the pressure of a time limit. Perfect for players of all skill levels. Start your adventure today!

name: Lovux
summary: Lovux is a minimalist puzzle game where you try to break all glasses on the screen using different types of glass wisely.

name: Lost Tales: Karai Vosa
summary: Lost Tales: Karai Vosa is a horror anthology game with retro graphics, and the first installment of Lost Tales, a series of different dark stories collected in Paraguay.

name: Logam vs Ksi
summary:
In this game you'll fight for one of your favorite vloggers.
Both of them are at the top of YouTube. That's why we've decided to give you an opportunity to fight for one of them
in our game. And the judge of this fight will be the most popular youtuber at the moment.

name: Lost Your Marbles
summary: Lost Your Marbles is a charming visual novel where the roll of a marble makes all the difference. Join PROTA in this branching-narrative adventure as she makes her way through Pomegranate Village on a quest to find her lost dog MINTY and make it to the annual Festi-Ball before day's end.

name: Lovely x Cation 2
summary: Spring has come again and the protagonist has moved into a new home by himself after his parents transfered elsewhere for their jobs. Everyone went smoothly until he received a prediction at a shrine which he had come upon: “Go find the one who will become your partner for life. Otherwise, you will live a cruel life”. However, a non-assertive man like him didn’t know anything about love. At such an critical juncture in his life, will he be able to summon up the courage to find himself a girl?

name: Lost & Found: Inanimate Object Dating Agency
summary: Welcome to Lost & Found Dating Agency, where forgotten objects find a perfect home. You’ll need to make items of our wonderful objects. Use your romantic intuition, but remember, love comes in all forms, and it doesn’t always follow the rules.

name: Lords of Football: United States
summary: Now you can play the USA league. Play the USA National League (includes playoff). Taste of the USA – The USA comes with modified building backgrounds; reflecting their real world architectural style.

name: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage
summary: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage is a brand-new story-driven journey through time from the creative minds behind Life is Strange. The magical summer of 1995 is one of self-discovery and forging unbreakable bonds for high school friends Swann, Nora, Autumn, and Kat. 27 years of no contact later, fate reunites them to confront the long-buried secret that made them promise to never speak again.

name: Looping Doors: Diner
summary: You're in a loop in a diner and you have to get out of it. All you have to do is find out if it's an anomaly and get out the right door. Good luck.

name: LO-OP
summary: LO-OP have simple design and simple concept. Connect right amount of loops between each other and clear board to pass the level. Train your skills in this minimalist-design game that can eat your brain. Don't be so rude with your mental health and spend some time sleeping while not playing LO-OP.

name: Lovelorn Sanatorium Ⅲ
summary: This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts

name: Log.in
summary: Log.in is a mystery-horror game where you explore a PC screen, digging through images, videos and files. Hidden somewhere in the system is the location of a girl being held captive. Your actions on the desktop will dramatically change the story and her fate.

name: Lotus Simulator
summary: For the first time, bus, tram and train are simulated extremely realistic in a single game – and you can drive them, build them or create the world around. Lotus simulation will never be the same!

name: LOCO Online
summary: A project to recreate Lego's 2013 MMORPG; Lego Legends of Chima Online.

name: Lost Planet 3
summary:
The extreme and unpredictable conditions that characterized the Lost Planet series return, harsher than ever before. Lost Planet 3 reveals new truths about the foreboding planet and the colonial history of E.D.N. III.

Lost Planet 3 introduces Jim Peyton, a rig pilot who leaves Earth to take on a hazardous but lucrative contract on E.D.N. III. Working for Neo-Venus Construction (NEVEC) who are preparing the planet for colonization, Jim joins his fellow pioneers at the Coronis base and begins surveying the uncharted terrain and obtaining samples of the planet’s energy supply – Thermal Energy.

With NEVEC’s existing Thermal Energy reserve running low the fate of the Coronis mission depends on the natural source of the energy supply being located. Realizing that this is a great opportunity for a huge pay-off and early ticket home to his family, Jim braves the risk of the treacherous environment and threat of the indigenous Akrid.

Acting as a home away from home and boasting an array of tools that can assist Jim on the field, the utility rig provides Jim’s safety and is essential not only for his contract work but also his protection against the ever-changing climate.

Lost Planet 3 will deliver a diverse range of gameplay including on-foot battles and intense first person action. With a number of multiplayer modes and a compelling single player experience, Lost Planet 3 will delve deeper into the Lost Planet universe, uncovering hidden truths within the unique and dynamic environment of E.D.N. III.

name: Lost Judgment: The Kaito Files
summary:
Play as the muscle of the Yagami Detective Agency, Masaharu Kaito, and take on a new case that ties up loose ends of his past in The Kaito Files. Kaito brings his own Primal Focus detective techniques and two beastly fighting styles to challenge new foes and crack the case with a distinct Kaito swagger.

Following the events of Lost Judgment, Kaito starts a lucrative case while Yagami is out of town that unexpectedly has him searching for his old flame, Mikiko. Along the way, Kaito encounters a teenager claiming to be their son and team up to uncover the truth behind Mikiko's disappearance.

Now Kaito stands at the crossroads of past and present while up against a syndicate tied to Kamurocho’s criminal underbelly. But why did Kaito and Mikiko split up, and what does this dark fraternity have to do with her?

name: Lone Wolf
summary:
Lone Wolf: A Post Apocalyptic Beat-Em Up Role Playing Game. This action/adventure game lets a player use martial arts skills, weapons, and turn into a werewolf to fight their way through a world set in the aftermath of post nuclear devastation.

This game was made with the love of the beat-em up arcade machines and console games of the 1980's and 1990's, taking some of the mechanics of these games mixed with some more modern gameplay.

name: Lottery Center Simulator
summary: You will act the administrator of a lottery center.

name: Loot and Shoot
summary: Loot and Shoot is a dungeon crawler 2D platformer action roguelite. Travel through various procedurally generated lands, battle challenging enemies, and collect diverse resources to expand your city and unlock new weapons. Avoid lava and carve your own path to the top as everything is destructible.

name: Love and Demons
summary:
Love and Demons is an hilarious Isekai Parody Visual Novel game where you control the fate of Maximillian, a young and naive prince who accidentally enters a portal and finds himself in a mysterious and dangerous demon realm.
In Love and Demons, you play as Maximillian, a charming but clueless prince who quickly becomes the object of desire for the demon realm's most beautiful girls. Keep an eye on your level of coverage and carefully choose your responses, or your disguise will disappear.

Made with a custom engine in Love and Demons you can choose your own path, make decisions that will impact the story, and watch as your choices lead to different outcomes and endings.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter hilarious scenes, absurd puzzles, wild romance, some bugs, and a lot of bad endings.

Will you choose to fight your way through the demon realm or win the hearts of the girls who cross your path? The choice is yours.

name: Love in Lockdown: Ella version
summary:
Visual novel by Melancholy Marionette.

7 different endings depending on your choices
Casual choices and choices with consequences
The option to rename ELLA and name yourself
Gender-neutral - ELLA will refer to you by your chosen name + 'you' and 'they'
Full (terrible) British voice acting with 2 different voice options to choose from
Mild adult content

name: Lost Ed
summary: Lost Ed is a game to bring a sense of nostalgia to old games. It does not contribute to innovative mechanics, but tries to offer a gaming experience from the 80s and 90s.

name: Lovely Lady RPG
summary: Lovely Lady RPG is a game about wandering around and just sort of seeing what happens. After waking up with a hole in her ceiling, a cosmic space Orb embedded in her chest and no recollection of basically anything, Ghost sets out to continue her life as best she can.

name: Lost in the Backrooms: Day 100
summary: Lost in the backrooms day 100 is a co-op horror game based on the concept of the backrooms with different levels and entities , a sanity system and unreal engine 5 graphics for the best immersive experience.

name: Lona: Realm of Colors
summary:
"Take the brush as Lona, a young girl on a journey to the deepest depths of herself. Beware though! For in the realm of colors the craving to explore can turn to a yearning to return in a blink of an eye.

Lona - Realm of Colors is an independent puzzle-adventure dwelling in the highly stylized and abstract past memories of Lona.

Who is Lona? How did she come to be here? Push fear aside and command the paintings as the original artist, shifting the world to reveal the answers. Discover Lona’s past. Escape the Realm of Colors. Return to reality."

name: Love and Enchants
summary: A casual puzzle lewd game about magic, girls and the power within. Using your free hand to enchant weapons for customers and the other hand for the...more important stuff.

name: LootMage
summary: LootMage is a bullet-hell action roguelite game set in a medieval fantasy world. As an adventurer in this realm, you must brave ever-changing dungeons, battle fierce enemies, collect treasures, and fight to survive.

name: Loneliness
summary: An experimental, minimalistic microgame about loneliness.

name: LocoMotion
summary:
Locomotion is an Action, Platformer Game Inspired by many other Games out there. This game has a fascinating story behind it! Play it to find out what secrets the Acidic Waters have in store for you!
You play as a crash test dummy and the people who made you need to test your strength.

name: Lockdown Opportunities
summary: Go on this one-room adventure where you fill your house with more and more junk as time passes!

name: Lo-Friction
summary: Lo-Friction is a speedrunning platformer about being in the zone, finding new ways to gain speed and getting better and better times.

name: Lou's Lagoon
summary: A cosy open world adventure about running a seaplane delivery service. Customize your character, discover new islands, harvest goods, solve a family mystery, and work to keep an adorable island community afloat.

name: Lost in the Dark
summary: You're in a Maze with Monsters! try to solve its mystery!

name: Lovely Sweet Dream
summary:
Welcome to Lovely Sweet Dream! A game made for the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 5! Inspired by Yume Nikki and LSD Dream Emulator.

A girl called Lulu is walking home from school one day when she finds an interesting looking charm at a flea market. The box describes that the charm will give the user wonderful dreams. Intrigued, Lulu takes the charm home and it introduces itself as LOVELY. With LOVELY's power, Lulu can explore its beautiful and happy dreams.

name: Loco
summary: Model Railway Simulator

name: Love Chemistry: Sibella's Formula
summary: Take the role of an unhinged lady chemist in raucous side-scrolling platformer Love Chemistry - Sibella’s Formula! Shoot syringes of your special mind-control formula at weird enemies, from robots and carnivorous plants to roving bookworms, and make your way through tricky corridors in old-school pixel art style!

name: Lost Realms
summary: Survive a fractured dark fantasy realm. Brave cursed forests, drowned cities, and searing deserts. Scavenge resources, obtain powerful gear, rebuild your sanctuary, and conquer monstrous horrors. Uncover ancient secrets before the abyss claims everything.

name: Los Justicieros (Zorton Brothers)
summary:
Los Justicieros is a video game created by Dinamic Multimedia in 1996 as a version of the recreational game Los Hermanos Zorton . It is the first, and so far only (apart from the game Corruption in Marbella , which was only distributed in recreational) Spanish interactive film . It was produced by PicMatic SA and Snatcho . 
 
The game was a revolution at the time to be entirely composed of real scenes shot in the desert of Almeria and directed by the director Enrique Urbizu . It counted on specialists of cinema in charge of the falls, persecutions and explosions.

name: Lost Ember: Legendary Souls
summary:
Legendary Souls is an expansion of Lost Ember’s world into a new and open map that you can explore freely.

It features all the playable animals from the main game and you’ll need them all in order to get around the different biomes, climb massive mountain ridges, search for forgotten memories deep in the lake and see the world from high above.

Help more lost embers make their way to the legendary City of Light by helping them understand their past through the new Soul Quest side missions.

name: Lost Game
summary:
Lost † Game is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. Unlike most Yume Nikki fangames, the main character, Sakura, is already dreaming. She seems to be trapped in a dream world full of strange creatures. The chasers, known as reapers or "death gods", can harm Sakura directly.

Outside of minimal dialogue, Lost † Game is unique in its use of a Game Over system upon being captured by a chaser or otherwise trapped. To compensate for this, the player can save at any time from the menu. To reach the ending, all thirteen Symbols must be collected and placed in the coffins seen at the start of the game.

name: Logistical: The Netherlands
summary:
Logistical expands into Europe starting with the Netherlands.

Netherlands like what you have been doing down under and would like to use your services. We are overloaded with a national icon and need it distributed badly.
Before you get too carried away you will be required to upgrade a few roads if you want your trucks driving all over the place.

name: LoveUnholyc
summary: You are an "Unholyc", a race born between a human and a devil. As befitting of a descendent of the mighty devil himself, you are equipped with the power to charm and seduce others to do your bidding. However, in order to become a fully-fledged Unholyc, you were seeking partners for your coming-of-age ceremony when you accidently managed to form a contract with not one but three handsome humans…

name: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club: Tokimeki Roadmap to the Future
summary: An upcoming visual novel based on Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club by Bushiroad Games.

name: LouveSystems' TrackMasters
summary: Create your own tracks - challenge your friends!TrackMasters is a multiplayer arcade racing game inspired by MicroMachines, packed with a full level editor to make your own tracks the way you want, and share them with your friends!

name: Love Mythos: Sanctuary Island
summary: Love Mythos: Sanctuary Island is an all-inclusive, one of a kind Visual Novel and Puzzle game for PC, Mac, and Linux. This venture features a balance of immersive story, as well as a mini game to progress both relationships and dialogue.

name: Logic Missile
summary: Logic Missile is an action puzzle based platformer where you and the missile must reach the central core. Launch the missile and setup the level properly so that you and the missile can exit the level. This game is extremely hard keep that in mind!

name: Lodestar
summary: Lodestar sends you and your squad of friends on your own space odyssey. Transverse multiple planets in a journey to get home without losing yourself or your ship to the perils of the unknown! Gather resources, farm asteroids, and survive... with your own oh-so welcoming AI sidekick!

name: Looney Tunes: Twouble!
summary: The antics of two of your favorite Looney Tunes characters come to life in TWOUBLE for the Game Boy Color. In this single-player adventure you play as Sylvester, everyone's favorite hungry cat, in pursuit of his yellow songbird rival Tweety. TWOUBLE gives you two ways to play: in the first type of stage, you will attempt to catch Tweety in a fast-moving side-scrolling adventure. Duck, jump, and dodge through obstacles in your hunt for lunch. In the other type of level, you will control Sylvester in an isometric viewpoint, and you'll have to use your wits along with keys and other items to progress through these levels. Watch out for Hector, Granny, and other popular Looney Tunes characters in both types of levels, because they are dedicated to making poor Sylvester go home hungry. Will Sylvester finally catch Tweety Bird, or will he have to enjoy lunch from a garbage can again? With three difficulty levels and a password save system, TWOUBLE has more than enough action for fans of the cartoon duo and their wacky tricks and chases!

name: LostWinds
summary: Wield the awesome powers of Enril the wind spirit to guide and protect young Toku through this unique platform adventure.

name: Loria
summary: Loria is a homage to classics from golden era of strategy games, with modern spin on controls and user experience.

name: Love Exalt 8372
summary: A furry visual novel about a death game on a train. Read the minds of characters through minigames, choose which perspectives you want to see, and uncover the mysterious lore behind twelve unique characters.

name: Lots of Cats on an Adventure
summary: “Lots of Cats on an Adventure” is a game where you find hidden cats in comic strips, meow!

name: LootOnline
summary: Loot. Win. Repeat.

name: Love M01
summary: Who will you choose among twelve datable college girls while managing classes, clubs, work, and rest?

name: Lost Resolve
summary: Master your movement skills to blast through exhilarating areas at a breakneck pace. Lost Resolve is a quirky, charming adventure about finding hope in the midst of chaos.

name: Lords of the Fallen: Master of Fate Update
summary:
VERSION 1.5 - 'Master of Fate': This update represents the culmination of 30+ post-launch updates resulting in significantly improved performance, stability & optimization, alongside rigorous difficulty balancing, and also includes our 'Advanced Game Modifier System', allowing ALL players to fully customize and adjust difficulty of future play-throughs.

The Master of Fate Update concludes now concludes the Free Content Roadmap for Lords of the Fallen, adding the following content and quality-of-life enhancements, vastly improving the experience for all players:
