- Significant performance, optimization and stability improvements
- Rigorous difficulty balancing including mob density reduction & nerfed ranged attacks
- Split PvP and PvE game balancing
- Online multiplayer enhancements for improved matchmaking and connection stability
- New questlines including Season of the Bleak, Trial of the Three Spirits, and Way of the Bucket
- New armor and weapon sets
- Additional secret boss weapon abilities
- Improved boss encounters with additional movesets & new AI
- 12 new spells including the arena-devastating Immolation
- New grievous strikes: each weapon family now features two unique finishers: one for single-handed wielding and another for two-handed wielding
- 3 new projectiles: Blood Vomit, Explosive Mines, and Frost Worms.
- QOL updates including: inventory expansion, appearance reset, storage functionality & gamepad rebinding

name: Lost Wing
summary: Lost Wing is all about speed, guns, and points. Storm your way through brutally-challenging environments and destroy the mega bosses for a chance to top the leaderboards! Featuring a deep electronic soundtrack and stunning neon sci-fi visuals.

name: Lord of the Other World
summary: This game is a more casual strategy war game, it bid farewell to the endless confrontation between players in traditional strategy games! More emphasis on collaboration between players.

name: Logistical: USA - Wisconsin
summary: Logistical: USA - Wisconsin is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the state. Over 300 towns to complete including cities like Milwaukee, Madison, Green Bay and many, many more.

name: Looterkings
summary: Looterkings is a procedural dungeon-crawler you can play online in coop-mode with up to 3 of your friends. Loot as much as you can on your way up from the dark caves beneath earth to the surface, gear up and reach your ultimate goal ravaging the hallowed halls of the Elven Queen, eventually.

name: Lost Planet: Extreme Condition - Colonies Edition
summary: Lost Planet: Extreme Condition Colonies Edition includes everything that made the original Lost Planet a hit on PC, as well as a bunch of new features!

name: Losers Lament 3
summary: short game about digital timestretch

name: Looney Tunes: Acme Arsenal
summary: Tag-team with the Tunes in the fight for their lives! Wield a major arsenal of ACME weapons as the tunes team-up to hunt down the mad scientist, chasing him through exotic locals from the past, present and future.Unite Bugs, Taz, Daffy, Marvin and more in a co-operative whack-and-smash romp through time - including online play!Melee and projectile weapons: Each character's weapon/melee skills can power up three times on the fly as you go.Vehicle Based Action: Race a jet scooter across an alien environment or wage battle on top of a giant flying Pterodactyl...the possibilities are endless!Travel to various locations such as Camelot, Ancient Egypt, Mars, the Wild West and more!Top-notch voice talent provides the characters with their classic voices and an authentic Looney Tunes slapstick adventure, while giving their look an updated, next-generation, modern edge.

name: Looney Tunes B-Ball
summary:
Looney Tunes B-Ball is a 2-on-2 Basketball game, similar to the more well known NBA Jam. However, Looney Tunes is much more informal and silly, though this level of silliness is set by the player via the Wackiness Meter on the main menu. Players choose their teams from the likes of: Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Elmer Fudd, Wile E. Coyote, Tasmanian Devil, Sylvester, Yosemite Sam and Marvin Martian. Each player has unique statistics for their shooting, 3-pointers, defense, stamina and speed.

Once on the court, the player can pass the ball, shoot the ball, grab a burst of speed or unleash a special defensive ability or a special offensive ability.. These abilities include cream pies, time bombs, sticks of dynamite and other fun toys from the ACME Corporation. Offensive Abilities must be "bought" by collecting gems and other items which occasionally show up on the basketball court.

name: Louder Than Words: The Story of a Field Trip
summary: Louder Than Words tells a dramatic coming of age story, following Teijo's path as he enters the adult world and faces its different hurdles, as well as the innocent relationships at school, which soon turn to serious commitments later in life.

name: Love Hina Advance ~Shukufuku no Kane wa Naru kana~
summary: You take the role of Urashima Keitaro, who’s been rejected from entering Tokyo University for the second year running making him, what the Japanese call, a ronin. To make things worse, his parents have kicked him out of his house. Fortunately, his Grandmother owns the nearby inn and Keitaro thought this would be the perfect place to live and work as the landlord. Or so he thought. He finds out that the building is no longer an inn and is in fact a girls’ dorm making him the only guy around! Most guys would kill to live with six cute girls, but if Keitaro’s not careful, this job will kill him…

name: Lovers in the Lunar Labyrinth
summary: Play as Oberohm or Altania in this action plaformer roguelike game as they battle through the surreal landscapes of the moon. Explore the labyrinth, and use your powers and your allies to craft powerful weapons and abilities as you break through the cycle that keeps the lovers apart!

name: Low Polly
summary:
Polly's soda-lighted you're here.
Just earlier today, a strange gravity anomaly snatched Polly’s favourite can of pop clean out of his webbed fingers, and he needs your help to reclaim his beloved beverage! Use Polly’s signature bubble-jump and tongue-grapple to traverse a low-poly world reminiscent of games from your childhood.
Embark on an un-frog-ettable adventure through 3 challenging levels set to an energetic soundtrack punctuated by humorous narration. This is a Foddian game sure to keep you busy for up to 60 minutes, or until you rage quit, whichever comes first.
So, what are you waiting for?
Hop to it!

name: Lords of Exile
summary: Lords of Exile is a 8-bit side-scrolling action platformer set in the far Lands of Exilia where a cursed knight makes his way to the revenge. A combination of classic retro mechanics and linear level design in 8-bit graphics!

name: Love, Death & Mummies: Zombie Romance Visual Novel
summary: Enter a devastated world where zombies, mummies and humans fight to survive! Can the undead fall in love? Find out in this exciting story full of passion, betrayal and wars.

name: Lollypop
summary: In Lollypop the player takes control of Young Lolly in her quest to satisfy her hunger for sweets. In this action platformer the player must navigate levels and avoid enemies in order to win the game.

name: Lost Altr
summary:
LOST ALTR is a solo rogue-lite card game set within the crumbling halls of a forgotten temple. You’ll face a series of Trials—mysterious encounters drawn from an ever-shifting deck. Each completed Trial leads you deeper into the Ruins of ALTR. Use Aspect cards to shape your fate—mysterious forces that grant you powerful advantages, but always at a cost.

Built on the foundation of the Scoundrel card mechanics by Zach Gage and Kurt Biegand, a heavily reimagined experience, LOST ALTR blends strategy, luck, and lore in a dark, esoteric world. The path forward is never the same. The further you go, the more the ruins remember.

Early Access will evolve with new cards, mechanics, and layers of mystery—shaped by feedback from those brave enough to enter the ALTR.

name: Love Language Stories
summary: Explore the complexities of love in this romantic game where you conquer hearts and unlock exciting endings with five unique characters.

name: Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling: The Relapse
summary:
After experimenting surreal visions in her ceiling, a stressed student discovers that life is not always a relaxing journey. Exams are not over: reality demands more psychological efforts to overcome new problems.

Enjoy this new story of “Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling” and live the life of a student trying to fight anxiety, stress and overthinking.

name: Lone Survivors
summary: Cut through hundreds of monsters and survive against all odds in this fantasy survivors-like top-down action game! Level up, unlock abilities, and defeat bosses with a wide arsenal of weapons and magic.

name: Looking Up I See Only a Ceiling
summary: A short psychological adventure about a stressed girl who wants to explore her ceiling.

name: Lost Artifacts: Mysterious Book
summary:
The team of experienced treasure hunters rushes again to meet adventures!
During a regular inventory at the museum, archaeologist Claire comes across an unfamiliar book with a mysterious lock-puzzle adorned with precious stones.
After unsuccessful attempts to open the book, the girl, in anger, presses a strange mechanism, and all the stones from it fall out immediately!
The museum room quickly changes into a forest with giant trees - the book has taken Claire and the team to its world.
Will the brave treasure hunter be able to find the lost stones and return home?
Embark on a heroic mission with Claire - quench your thirst for adventure and help her find all the stones!
Convenient controls and clear training will help you easily get into the basics of the game.
Embark on an exciting journey through the world of the Enigmatic Book!

name: Logic
summary: Logic is a 3D logical platform game, where you can get through the levels by solving several different puzzles with the help of moveable cubes, by switching buttons and pressure plates, and by using elevators and teleporting platforms.

name: LoliTower
summary: LoliTower is a comfy roleplaying game featuring 120 layers of elaborately designed maps of ghost towers, in which players manipulate two distinct and equally powerful characters, the fallen hero and the talented girl.

name: Love Love Mystery Club
summary: In Love Love Mystery Club, you’re the newest member of the Detective Club at a seemingly ordinary high school. Through Full Motion Video (FMV) storytelling, your choices steer the narrative—will your heart find tenderness… or will hidden horrors emerge from the darkness?

name: Lost Letter
summary: Lost Letter is an incremental idle game where you explore countries, collect more than 500 unique stamps, and upgrade vehicles to find a mysterious person. Experience relaxing gameplay with randomized targets, resource management, and a charming collage-inspired art style.

name: Love Poem Written For a Fairy
summary: A poet met a beautiful and charming fairy on the edge of the human and demon worlds..... Poets have no other choice but to pursue love poems.

name: Loading...

name: Love Brings You Home
summary: Love Brings You Home is an Otome game by Voltage Inc. that's currently available in Japanese and English.

summary: Tune up for "Wai Wai Tennis", the authentic popular tennis game. Now with even more beautiful graphics that provide rich variations in attacks with a variety of motion animations, 150 in total, and more than 70 kinds of shot patterns. Enjoy tennis made fun for the whole family.

name: Lost in the Woods

name: Loop Archer
summary: Come back stronger after each death to defeat The Loop.

name: Loser Simulator

name: Losen Screws Puzzles

name: Looney Tunes Racing

ACME Corporation, the corporate juggernaut behind such successful products as the Acme Disintegrator Gun and the Acme Portable Hole, is sponsoring a number of racing contests all over the universe for the Looney Tunes characters to compete for the looniest racing champion title.

name: Lord of the Wings

Ding dong, your tank is dead. To resurrect her, you accept a quest to take a duck to the neighbouring city under strict instructions to NOT open the cage.

Enjoy duck puns galore, a wealth of truly terrible jokes, and — sometimes spicy but mostly dumb — romance with the adventurer of your choosing. Customise your character, find hidden items to unlock extra choices and enjoy the comic book experience!

name: Loren the Amazon Princess
summary: Loren The Amazon Princess is a fantasy visual novel with RPG elements. The player reads through the story and occasionally has to fight against fantasy monsters.

name: Loretta
summary:
Loretta is a psychological thriller that would make the player an accessory to the heroine’s crimes and would lead her through a self-crafted nightmare. This story is about a woman, dealing with betrayal, her husband’s infidelity, relationship problems and the difficult social situation of the 1940s.

Conceptually and aesthetically, the game is inspired by the American art of the twentieth century, the works of Andrew Wyeth and Edward Hopper, film noir of the 40s to 50s, thrillers by Alfred Hitchcock, the Philip Ridley movie The Reflecting Skin, the books 1922 by Stephen King and Lolita by Vladimir Nabokov.

name: Lode Runner: The Bungeling Strikes Back

The objective of each level is the same: collect all the gold scattered around the levels while avoiding enemies. In the event that you are trapped, you can create holes in the platforms to the left or right of you for the enemies to fall through, similar to what the player does in Apple Panic. They will then die and respawn. Some enemies will flash, letting you know that they carry gold. You can either wait for them to drop the gold or force them to give it up by trapping them in holes.

name: Lost in the Backrooms

name: Loner
summary:
Loner is a very simple game, no attributes, no upgrade, or even no score, what it wants to bring you, is only purely tranquillity and loneliness.
Loner tells the story of a lonely journey of a pilot, in the journey, you would understand his past and his pursuit.

name: Lotus Turbo Challenge 2
summary:
The second Lotus game shifted focus to arcade-oriented gameplay. Being the first of the series released for a game console (for Sega Genesis/Mega Drive under the title Lotus Turbo Challenge), the fuel limit and difficulty levels were dropped, and the lap-based levels were replaced with course-based time trials, (not unlike arcade games such as Out Run), with the player required to complete each course within a specified time to qualify for the next one.

In addition to the Esprit Turbo SE, Lotus Turbo Challenge 2 also featured the Lotus Elan SE, hence 'Esprit' being dropped from the title. There was no choice of car however; the player runs with the Elan SE on odd levels, and with the Esprit on even levels.

Lotus 2's single-player mode uses all of the game screen instead of half, and opponent cars appear in a variety of colors (opponent cars in the original game were all white). However, music is absent from racing altogether; the player instead hears the car's engine sound.

Lotus 2 was developed for the Amiga and then converted for the other platforms.

name: Lords of the Fallen
summary: Lords of the Fallen is a mysterious action game where you battle gothic monsters in a thrilling 1-on-1 combat. Use swipe controls to attack, dodge or parry. But keep in mind that quick wits needs to be combined with the right strategy to defeat enemies.

Diagnose, repair and cross paths with robots and stories. Uncover secrets buried in the past and future, discover the truth that makes each robot unique.

name: Lords of the Fallen
summary:
Lords of the Fallen is a challenging fantasy action RPG set in a harsh world where humanity has defeated its God. When his army starts to re-emerge from its demonic realm, led by the formidable Lords, humanity turns to an unlikely defender for help.

Lords of the Fallen offers a deep and satisfying melee combat system with weapons, armour and skills influencing speed, power and agility. Every fight is both a challenge and a meaningful victory. Powerful and spectacular magic complete the arsenal. Embark on an epic journey of combat, exploration and discovery
to become the world’s salvation… or doom.

Developed by CI Games of Warsaw, in collaboration with Deck 13, a developer based in Germany.

name: Lofi Mahjong

name: Lost Souls
summary:
Lost Souls is a MUD, a free text-based multi-player online RPG (role-playing game). The theme of the setting is medieval fantasy, with elements drawn from a wide variety of sources alongside entirely original content. Your character in the game battles monsters, develops skills, advances in ability, pursues quests, and explores the wide, detailed world.

Lost Souls was founded in 1990, and has been under continuous development for thirty-two years. While many MUDs regard themselves as essentially finished works, Lost Souls takes pride in always working to improve its technology and design, reinventing the game experience continually.

On your first day of school you discover that the previous owner of your locker has “mysteriously” disappeared. Do you want to figure out what happened or are you too busy being a social butterfly and trying to avoid your enemies…

LongStory gives you a chance to find true love as a middle school student (yes with all the awkwardness that entails) but we promise it will be so much better this time around!

name: London Racer II
summary:
London Racer II is another iteration in the prolific Racer series by Davilex. The races take place primarily in the streets of London and Edinburgh, with additional tracks in Las Vegas, New York and Chicago.

There are three single player modes available: Single Race, Tournament and Time Trial. In Single Race, the player is free to choose any of the 6 characters available, any of the tracks and any of the unlocked cars. In Tournament mode, the player races in a series of tracks while collecting money prizes and unlocking new cars. In both modes, players race against other racers while avoiding being caught by the police. In the Time Trial mode, players race against the clock trying to beat the best time for each track.

Each car (driven by a different character) has different stats in acceleration, top speed, handling, breaking and strength. The cars can also be upgraded using money collected from winning races and collecting money tokens during races. The cars also take damage when hit and can break into total loss if the damage bar is full. Repair tokens can be collected during races and if a car finishes a race damaged, it can be repaired before the next one using money. Nitro tokens can also be collected and bought, and the cars' colors can be changed.

There are also two split-screen two player modes: Duel and Cop vs. Driver. In the Duel mode, players race against each other in any given track. In Cop vs. Driver, one player is the cop and the other a regular racer, and the cop player must try to crash the driver within the time limit.

The game can be played from either first (hood camera) or third person (behind the car) perspective.

name: Lort
summary: LORT is a 1–8 player co-op action roguelite. Team up with your friends to battle, loot, and stack ridiculous power-ups across a cursed fantasy world. Fight toward escape, revive your homies, and get absolutely chadded as you evolve from goblin tickler to god slapper.

summary:
For years now, the sailors and pirates of the Lost Lands have been talking about a ghostly ship sailing in the heart of a storm. This vision disappears as soon as it comes to life, yet witnesses still spread rumors... About a huge octopus traveling with the ship. About its owner, the captain. About the earl's rage and his curse. And the sorceress they believe is responsible.

Meanwhile, somewhere else in space and time, Susan finds a strange pirate chest with the compass of the worlds inside, and a note begging for help. It's time for her to return to the Lost Lands again.

name: Lost Judgment
summary:
Lost Judgment is an action-adventure video game developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and published by Sega. A sequel to the 2018 game Judgment (a spin-off of the Like a Dragon series), the game focuses on private detective Takayuki Yagami as he investigates a criminal accused of both sexual harassment and murder.

Joined by his partner, ex-yakuza Masaharu Kaito, the crime-fighting duo is called on to investigate a seemingly perfect crime whose lead suspect has an airtight alibi. What starts as a tale of revenge reveals a tangled web of conspiracy involving several unlikely factions taking advantage of a broken law system. But as victims pile up and Yagami unravels the truth, he must choose between defending the law or exacting justice.

name: Love(Battle)Doll
summary:
Love(BATTLE)Doll
A sentient robotic love doll is brought into a world of tournaments, destruction, and battle.

You really aren't made for this, but that's okay!
It's all foreplay.

A collab between basicbean and mala.
Made for roro jam and doll and kigu jam.

name: Loop
summary: One day, all of a sudden, Sora finds out that the elevator is connected to her room On her usual way to work. She tries to find a way to escape this endless Loop. Your choices will be a matter

name: Loading Simulator

name: Lostria

name: Low Magic Age
summary:
Low Magic Age is a fantasy RPG that focused on turn-based party-based tactical combat. Field of View, Fog of War, Cover, Zone of Control, Charging and Flanking, various and abundant tactical elements are implemented in the game rules that evolved from Wizards of the Coast's Open Game License (OGL).

Inherited from classic game rules: Evolved from historic pen-and-paper game rules, plus well designed information display UI, clear prompt of hit percent and damage range, help players to learn and immerse in the fantasy world. The innovative combat system, flanking, charging, full-attack, etc., various circumstance bonuses bring more meaningful tactics selections.

Classical fantasy monsters: 7 categories, 100+ classical fantasy monsters. Goblins, trolls, giant ants, basilisks and much much more. Different monsters need different strategies and tactics to defeat.

Tons of equipment and wondrous items: 60+ common items, 90+ wondrous items, 80+ enchantments. Slashing, piercing and bludgeoning, different weapons against different monsters. Gloves of Dexterity, Counterstrike Bracers, Ring of Regeneration, Belt of Magnificence, Cloak of Thorns, Elemental Gem, collecting powerful magical artifacts to create the hero character in your mind.

Well designed skills and spells: Fighters own a variety of martial arts movements, not only basic attacks. All of the arcane spells and divine spells of caster classes are greatly improved, too.

name: Lookouts
summary:
Two lookouts meet in a desert, far from the sight of their gangs.

With more in common than they could've expected, they scout out a town with rumours of gold.

What will become of this fateful meeting?

name: Lost in the World of Succubi

name: Losted

name: Lost Soul Aside
summary:

Chain lightning-fast combos, learn new abilities, and upgrade your weapons as you take on formidable enemies and colossal bosses in fast, dynamic combat.

name: Loopmancer
summary: Loopmancer is a 3D horizontal roguelite action game with realistic graphics that takes place in a cyberpunk universe. Players play as a detective who comes back to life after an unexpected death, and battle in this lifelike and futuristic city of the east.

name: Lonewolf: Zombie FPS 3D
summary: In this game, you can kill waves of zombies in three different maps with a full arsenal. Lots of blood in contrast with dark maps, dimly lit, that requires you luck and skill! Have fun levelling up, unlocking new guns, maps, perks and earning cool emblems!

name: Lost in Hieroglyphs: A Hidden Objects Expedition
summary: Hidden Object Discovery: Find hidden objects in ancient locations and reveal lost treasures. There are a total of 180 hidden objects in 6 chapters.

name: Low Taper Fade 3D
summary: In this game you can protect Ninja from getting a Low Taper Fade. You have to shoot whoever is trying to do so. Since the meme is massive, you will enjoy unlocking awesome guns like the baby oil launcher, the aura sucker and the Hawk Tuah gun.

name: Loop Frogs
summary: Guide two froggy friends through a pixelated, time-warping adventure. This 2D platformer will require you to master the time loop and leap your way across 30+ levels of hazards and puzzles.

name: Lord of the Click 4
summary: In "Lord of the Click 4" you will find incredible new challenges, amazing graphics and improved mechanics. As a great monarch, you will fight many new and dangerous enemies using your clicker skills. Every click on your screen summons powerful warriors, deals crushing blows to enemies and directs the magic of nature into battle. But be careful — each level will bring even more powerful and treacherous bosses, who will have to be defeated to advance further.

name: Lost Patrol
summary: Lost Patrol is a survival action role-playing game with strategy elements. "We’re fit, we’re alive, but we’re not back home." In this classic multi-genre DOS game, take command of the seven survivors of a U.S. helicopter crash in Vietnam, desperately trekking across 57 miles of harsh terrain infested with booby traps and enemy soldiers.

name: Logic Town
summary: Logic Town is a challenging coffee-break puzzle game based on Einstein Puzzles (AKA Zebra Puzzles). Solve the puzzles to redecorate various scenes in a Seaside Town. Each new location unlocks a new puzzle theme!

name: Lovely Lisa and Friends
summary:
FASHION IS FUN WITH LISA AND HER FRIENDS!

Lovely Lisa helps younger girls learn the importance of having fun and working hard while earning your way to your own fashion style! Earn Lisa-points by perfecting your beauty skills and techniques, helping out around the house and even learning what it takes to become a successful career girl! Providing a well-rounded approach to beauty and fashion, Lovely Lisa rewards girls with gorgeous accessories, original clothes and fabulous hairstyles and make-up! Prove you’ve got what it takes in the Heart Hills pageant-with-a-difference! Only the girl with the best skills in all categories can win – because after all, beauty is only skin deep!

name: Looking for Heals
summary: Command your squad of warriors while keeping them from an early grave in this action-adventure where the healer calls the shots. Heal, shield, and resurrect your way through a world filled with impossible choices, people to save, and elaborate boss fights inspired by MMO dungeon raids.

name: Lovebyte.exe
summary: A chat dating sim game inspired by Mystic Messenger, VTuber communities, and internet spam

name: Lost & Found Spot It Fast!
summary:
Find the Target Character Within the Time Limit!
A Brain-Training Picture Hunt Game to Boost Your Reflexes

name: Lost Future
summary:
Fight zombies in the open world of the near future. Enhance your combat skills, loot, craft and enjoy a deep story, spectacular animations and realistic graphics on your mobile device.
Survive the zombie apocalypse in the open world of the near future. Fight to develop your combat skills, explore, loot and craft to defeat the hordes of the Infected. Enjoy spectacular animations and console-quality graphics on your mobile device. Dive into the deep storyline and uncover all the secrets of a dramatic story that unfolds in the foothills of the Appalachians in the fall of year 2035.

name: LocoRoco 2
summary: The LocoRoco are in danger again, the evil Moja have returned and this time they've brought with them a terrible song that sucks the life out of living things! The LocoRoco must once again save their planet - this time by making lots of sweet music. LocoRoco 2 is easy to play, instantly addictive and guaranteed to make you feel all warm and fuzzy while you hum along to the soundtrack! Explore 25 new stages, including hidden challenges, and meet a colourful cast of new characters. Enhance your LocoRoco through music and song, learning new actions to overcome the Moja. Perform new actions such as climbing inside shells to destroy thorns, jumping from grass blade to grass blade and swimming underwater. Expand your fun with six new mini games, including an Ad-hoc four player game.

name: Lovely Neko Girl
summary: Lovely Neko Girl is a soothing puzzle game that offers players a chance to unwind while solving puzzles. Complete each puzzle while enjoying beautiful pictures of hot girls and relaxing music.

name: Lone Apocalypse
summary: Lone Apocalypse is an open-world survival game set on a frozen island in the near future. Players build, explore, and survive in extreme conditions while uncovering the truth behind a failed climate weapon. The game combines crafting, survival, and story for an immersive post-apocalyptic experience

name: Loca-Love: My Pure Priestess
summary:
Loca-Love is a visual novel with art by nanaca mai, of Corona Blossom and Grisaia fame, and a story by Japanese writer Hozumi Kei, famous for his sweet and romantic love stories.
This is a three-part series, being Loca-Love: My Pure Priestess the third game.

name: Lone Voyage
summary: You are the last living organism in the galaxy. Adrift and alone in a cold dark world you must scavenge for resources to keep your ship running, and arm your ship to prepare for the swarms arrival.

name: Locked
summary: Locked in a deadly cat-and-mouse with a relentless serial killer, you must outsmart, escape, and survive in this intense 2D horror experience. Solve chilling puzzles, and stay one step ahead of a relentless pursuer. Inspired by PS1-PS2 classics and iconic horror films.

name: Loop One: Done
summary: Loop One: Done is a mixed reality automation game where you record loops with drones and robots, turning your play space into an efficient automated factory.

name: Lotus III: The Ultimate Challenge
summary: The third game in the series combined the gameplay aspects of its predecessors, allowing players to choose between racing opponents of Lotus Turbo Challenge or the arcade-like time trials of Lotus 2. The two-player option was retained and the music selection feature returns (Patrick Phelan's soundtrack to Lotus III spawned many modern remixes). Lotus III also added a third car - a concept Lotus M200 automobile - and allowed the player to choose which one to race with. The game recycled most of the graphics from Lotus 2, but added a number of new sceneries.

name: Lost Girl Platformer
summary: Lost Girl Platformer is a thrilling 2D platform game where you play as a courageous girl. Your task is to jump from platform to platform to survive and escape. But be careful: time is limited, and every jump must be precise!

name: Lost and Hound
summary: Lost and Hound is a scent hound adventure following the reluctant yet strong-willed Corgi, Biscuit. Hunt down criminals, help people that are in trouble or lost, solve mysteries and save lives in this blind-accessible canine story.

name: Lost Cartridge: Cold Read
summary: Lost Cartridge: Cold Read is the first in a series of horror anthology games by Pure Ice Blue, creator of Lily's Well and I Cannot Drown. Explore the library, hide from those who want Mitch's life to end, and solve puzzles in order to possibly find a way to escape.

name: Lofty Quest
summary: Lofty Quest is a narrative-driven hidden object adventure game where you search and explore beautiful, hand-crafted 3D dioramas to topple an evil King.

name: LogiKing
summary: LogiKing is a game where you utilize the effects of 10 cards numbered 0 to 9 and deduce your opponent's hidden cards.

name: Long Knives
summary: An oriental narrative mystery. The story branches upon your choices. The dice lies.

name: Lofi Ping Pong
summary: Meditative rhythm ping-pong

name: Lonn
summary: LONN is an action-adventure story based VR game set in a dystopian cyberpunk city.

name: Lost Age
summary: In the mystical world of Lost Age, darkness looms, and heroes rise to reclaim the light. Embark on a captivating adventure where card-based strategy meets the excitement of RPG. Collect and customize powerful heroes, explore magical realms, and tackle thrilling challenges—all at your own pace. With idle mechanics, your journey continues even when you're offline.

name: Lone & Vita
summary: A retro-style action platformer game starring androids Lone and Vita. Features split-screen co-op and a wide selection of special weapons.

name: Locator
summary: A Geoguessr-inspired detective game set on an alien planet. Pinpoint the exact locations of photos to track down missing archeologist Abigail Lidari. Cross-reference journal entries, decipher cryptic symbols, and uncover the mysteries of an ancient civilization. Find her... before it’s too late.

name: Love Ribbon
summary: "Love Ribbon" is a yuri (girl x girl) visual novel about forbidden love between two sisters.

name: Lost Lands: Sand Captivity - Collector's Edition
summary:
Lift a mysterious curse, explore a fantasy world, and solve dozens of puzzles!

After the peace in the Lost Lands was restored, Susan decided to restore her own world. She had become a dedicated mother and a grandmother. All that reminded her of her previous adventures were the stories she told to her granddaughter under the guise of fairytales. But like mother, like son. Jim couldn’t walk by the artifact of the Lost Lands that was found on Earth. Accidentally, he unleashed an ancient curse. So now Susan has to return to the Lost Lands one more time to save her family.

Find a way to lift a mysterious curse with the help of the Lost Lands inhabitants, welcome familiar characters and meet the new ones to find solutions together with them!

name: Lost and Found Co.
summary: Lost & Found Co. is a hidden object adventure in a cozy and immersive world. Join a cast of quirky characters on their epic journey across countless magical locations. Find lost items, solve puzzles, and help a tiny dragon regain her power!

name: Long Steel
summary: 20 years after the defeat of the Shaper of Magic, Warlock, the island of Melas is in a time of peace. But when the dark cult known as the Wicken return to resurrect Warlock from his ashes, you must spring into action to stop them before the apocalypse is set into motion.

name: Love
summary:
Love is a reductive platforming game with a retro aesthetic and a focus on a challenging difficulty. It has an custom respawn system, 16 levels, 12 track soundtrack, competitive scoring, and a simple-to-use level creation feature.

The challenging levels are balanced with the inclusion of a simple yet unique respawn system wherein the player can leave a checkpoint at any location at any point, as long as they are on solid ground. Players have a number of gameplay modes to choose from, whether they want it easy, normal, or they want to try their hand at a mode designed specifically for Speed Running.

Beyond the visual aesthetic, the challenging level design, and the abundance of features, there is the fantastic soundtrack composed by James Bennett, which brings the simple 3-color atmospheres to life.

name: Love x Crotch x Gym
summary: With a well-toned physique, opportunities for romantic encounters will come knocking on their own. Just imagine, if one day you could spend two months in an all-female fitness center, serving as the exclusive one-on-one personal trainer for these VIP members. How wonderful would that be?

name: Lost Tales of Altoris
summary: Awaken as the Lost Guardian and reclaim your forgotten past. Explore a vast dark fantasy world, battle spectral foes, and shape your destiny in a story-driven open world where every choice matters.

name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Rivera's Revenge
summary: Turn on your bike light to explore the secret cave of Sierra Rivera's lost trail in this free DLC. Collect the fire elemental customization set by playing through the brand-new challenges. Saddle up and face Rivera's Revenge in the Lonely Mountains.

name: Lost Ember
summary: Explore the remains of a fallen world from fascinating perspectives! Slip into the role of different animals to uncover the fate of an ancient world. Dive into deep waters, fly at lofty heights, dig underground as a mole or even climb steep cliffs with a mountain goat, there are lots of ways of getting around.

name: Loan Wolf
summary: A corporate werewolf vn with wlw monster girls. And student loans.

name: Lowglow
summary: Lowglow - an audiovisual puzzle journey. The game includes over 100 mind-bending levels. The gameplay is physics driven and plays with different gravitations, pushes, pulls and portals for starters. You are an astral light drop in the endless sea of darkness, trying to bring shine where it's needed the most. Each set of levels has a strong theme where the coloring, audio and mechanics vary greatly. The levels have lots of weird mechanics that are sure to keep you entertained throughout the game.

name: Love Love Knuckle
summary: Love Love Knuckle is a goofy beat-em-up starring buff men wearing animal heads. Players use their buff animal man to beat up other buff animal men and collect the high-calorie sweets they drop to recover health. In between battles, players can buy upgrades to customize their character, including new heads.

name: Lostade
summary: Lostade is a mysterious and unique Arcade-Stylised dungeon crawler with endless possibilities, combining Character building, Crafting, and Exploration with Endless endgame and Replayability !

name: Love n Dream
summary: 《Love n Dream》 is a puzzle game with many kawaii girls. You will be transformed into multiple roles to approach all of our girls. Your job is to unlock their desired, characteristic, favorite, hate by using your skill to solve all the puzzles and understand more about them.

name: Lose Grace Tale
summary: Add scars and destroy enemies!

name: Lost Caves
summary:
You control the famous explorer, armed only with his trusty shovel. You must collect ten diamonds in each of the sixteen mines. Once these gems have been collected you must find the wooden door which leads to the next cavern.
Your explorer can clear the soft earth using his shovel, however the Nomads who have followed him into the mines are unable to do this. The explorer may also push boulders which will kill Nomads and detonate bombs, on contact.

name: Lotus Digital
summary:
Lotus is a beautiful game that grows into a unique work of art every time you play. 
 
Clear your head and take in the quiet strength of the Lotus garden. It takes skillful care and nurturing to grow these flowers to their full potential, but once picked, they provide their owner with wisdom. Beware, for there are others who will do anything they can to get their hands on these mystical flowers. You'll need to enlist the help of creatures native to this land to take control of the Lotus garden and achieve true enlightenment. 
 
In Lotus, players take turns adding petals and utilizing guardians to control and nurture these mystical flowers to maturity. Collect special abilities as you grow to aid you on your quest, and gain wisdom points for each completed bloom. At the end of the game the player with the most wisdom points will emerge from the garden that much closer to enlightenment!

name: Lords of Magic: Legends of Urak
summary: This expansion contains 5 new quests where Earth, Fire, and Death each have a unique quest while Order has two quests. The quests themselves revolves around various fables and stories not connected to the main plot.

name: Love, Elections and Chocolate
summary: An upscaled version of Love, Election & Chocolate, now in 16:9, with resolutions up to 4K and localized to English and Simplified/Traditional Chinese.

name: Lola Maria
summary: Lola Maria is a first-person psychological horror game where everyday tasks take a disturbing turn. Living with your grandmother, you uncover unsettling secrets as the line between family, memory, and the supernatural begins to blur.

name: Lorraine
summary:
"Attend the tale of the diabolical widow, as she pondered and planned the next to be stabbed..."

Lorraine is a bite-sized, blood-curdling, bone-chilling, narrative-driven graphic adventure about a desperate widow in a preternatural situation.

name: Lost Connection
summary: An emotional and moody sci-fi visual novel.

name: Lost
summary: Imagine a catastrophic event that forces you, your family, and your friends to flee your home and everything you knew. Imagine seeking help from a neighboring country that ruthlessly stop your attempt to enter their territory. Lost seeks to explore the topics of empathy, emotions after a tragic loss, and what it means to be a refugee.

name: Lost God
summary: Lost God Is a game about exploring ancient ruins and facing off against its denizens. You start out in a sacred forest, where you arrive knowing only one thing: You must free a god. During your travels you will have to fight the twisted creations that roam the lands, upgrade your equipment, delve into trap-ridden dungeons and uncover the history of the world. The game is planned to include one large inter-connected forest area and four distinct dungeons, each with their own enemies, hazards, secrets and bosses.

name: Loot Collection: Mahjong
summary:
Loot Collection Mahjong is the perfect game for the casual player looking for fun and extensive gameplay.
The goal of this game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board. The game is finished when all pairs of tiles have been removed from the board.

name: Love and Deepspace
summary: As the brand new installment of the popular Mr. Love series, Love and Deepspace allows you to step into a sci-fi world where love knows no bounds. With immersive cutscenes, 3D storylines and interactions, love is truly within reach!

name: Loop the Loop: The Mansion of Gluttony
summary: A closed-circle mystery visual novel where twelve people wake up inside a bizarre, impossible mansion—and a string of murders begins. Read from Remi's point of view as you piece together the truth through his thoughts and conversations. Linear, text-focused, Japanese/English supported.

name: Load Slinging VR Training
summary: Train your professional skills in Load Slinging VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

name: Lost Alice: Destined Lovers in Wonderland
summary:
“You’ve come here, neither following the White Rabbit nor in response to the Queen of Hearts.You’ve come to Wonderland on your own will.”
--The key to solving all the mysteries is your lost memories.
“My Alice, I’ve been waiting for you for so long.”
“I told you, I’m not Alice!”
--You remember nothing but your name. They call you Alice.Elegant tea party with the Hatter. Temptations from the Cheshire Cat. The golden afternoon with Joker. While the days in Wonderland never cease to entertain you...you find your true love.
Whose “Alice” will you be?

name: Loopsy
summary: A quirky loop making game for Playdate.

name: Lock & Key: A Hunter's Legacy
summary: Become an unlikely hero by exploring, building new gadgets, jumping, and shooting to find the elusive keys to a mysterious tower that has emerged from the ground without warning and awakened a terrible power.

name: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Summer
summary: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Summer is a fun and rewarding puzzle game. Assemble charming beach-themed pictures, sharpen your attention, and immerse yourself in a festive holiday world.

name: Lost in the Roots
summary: A 2D adventure with a twisted story about guilt, where a girl is kidnapped and held in an attic somewhere in the countryside. Why and who took the girl to this godforsaken place? What to do when there is nowhere to run?

name: Locked Together
summary: A horror game inspired by escape rooms, where you explore eerie environments, solve intricate puzzles, and escape before sinister entities catch you or your friends.

name: Lootcycle: Craftsman Simulator
summary: Lootcycle is a craftsman simulator where every piece of junk can become a masterpiece. Buy scraps, design and assemble unique loot, and trade them with adventurers. Upgrade your workshop, unlock new parts, and build a name for yourself as the best craftsman in town.

name: Loveless General Hospital
summary:
Welcome to Loveless, a hospital known for it's clinical efficiency above anything else.

Tonight you will choose a doctor to fix you up, be careful.

name: Lost Wage Rampage
summary: An over-the-top, fast-paced, driving heist game about closing the gender pay gap

name: Lone Wolf DS III: The Caverns of Kalte
Low Poly Mouse Game
summary: 2-4 Sneaky and squeaky low-poly mice face off against a lone cat in the battlefield of a human house. Mice use proximity chat to communicate with other players, while the cat hunts their noises. Will the mice perform enough tasks to destroy the house, or will the cat defeat enough mice to save it?

name: Logic Mahjong Souryu: Yon-nin Uchi / San-nin Uchi
summary: Here's a traditional mahjong game with no cheaters. In addition to the typical four-person rules, you can play a speedier game of three-player mahjong, with bigger chances of bigger hands. You can change various rules, and even experience an adventure-game-like story mode. There's even a hidden mode where you can play a match against characters from the "Marl Kingdom" series of games. Casual controls and traditional gameplay--this game is enjoyable for all ages.

name: Lost In Static
summary: A psychological first person horror game. Your daughter has gone missing. You must find her.

name: Lottery World
summary: A free-to-play global multiplayer online arcade gaming platform.

name: Lord of the Wilds
summary: A strategy game where you build and defend your territory in a wild land. Gather resources, train armies, and face threats from rival lords, orcs, and undead.

name: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders - Baifushan
summary:
Baifushan is a free update to the game, available now on Xbox and Steam. It is inspired by the beauty of Chinese mountainscapes and might be the most gorgeous mountain we ever made - it is definitely the biggest.

Baifushan offers four new trails with two slopes each, new challenges, new achievements, full multiplayer support for racing, team mode, quickmatches, private tours, and leaderboards.

name: Love Breakout
summary: Relax arcade game to keep you in a good mood

name: Love's Crescendo
summary: On a cold winter day, Valerie and Cadence are brought together through their shared love of music. Determined to hear more of the talented pianist’s tunes, Valerie seeks Cadence out in hopes of making something beautiful. Little did they know that their composition would blossom into something more…

name: Love Love 2024: The Love Election
summary: Experience the future of democracy where romance is the key to choosing America’s next leader. But beware, a shadowy manipulator is attempting to rig the election! Date your favorite candidates and see if love can truly save the nation—what could go wrong??

name: Logo Game Guess: Brand Quiz
summary: Logo Game Quiz Do you like logo trivia guessing games? Then Logo Game Quiz: Guess Brand Quiz Game is for you! Guess the names of thousands of popular brands

name: LostTicket
summary: lostticket is a visual novel where you have lost your ticket. Try to convince the ticketer to let you in anyway!

name: Lok Digital
summary: Lok are a fresh new kind of living beings that spawned in the middle of a vast, incomprehensible world. Help them through mind-bending word-search puzzles and guide them towards expansion of their civilisation.

name: Lovely Spot the Difference
summary: A spot-the-difference game featuring lots of cute girls!

name: Lost Girl In Mirror
summary: This is a girl puzzle adventure game, through the wisdom of the gentlemen's minds, through the complete patchwork scenes, to save the girls trapped in the mirror, to give them a place to live. More than a dozen different characters and scenarios for you to explore.

name: Lost Flight: Survival
summary: Find yourself stranded on a mysterious, uncharted island after a devastating plane crash. With no signs of rescue, your only goal is to survive

name: Lost Sea
summary: Lost Sea is an explorative action-adventure game set inside the perilous environment of the Bermuda Triangle. Select your hero and recruit a ragtag crew of survivors who can help you navigate the hazardous island chain. Scour each island for the mysterious tablets you need to navigate the waters of the Lost Sea and venture closer to the mysterious portal, that you hope, will transport you home.

name: Loop Yourself
summary: Create clones of yourself looping you previous actions to solve 19 puzzle rooms.

name: Lost Oasis
summary: Embark on a serene journey through a vast desert, uncovering forgotten oases and hidden mysteries in this relaxing walking simulator.

name: Love's Sweet Garnish
summary: Amidst the falling cherry blossoms, Asaki wishes to revitalize his grandmother's beloved cafe. With the appearance of Rira and Richer, two girls who wish to work at the cafe, this is the start of a bittersweet story that will intertwine them all.

name: Lost Region
summary:
Lost Region is a third person survival action game. Game is developing for the XBox One, PS 4 and Windows platforms.
Alpha version of the game will be shown on February 20th 2017.

Key Game Features:
– Large world to explore. You will be able to explore every building and visit any corner of the world with area over 64 sq/km, to loot supplies and
the necessary tools to survive.
– Ability to create clans together with your friend or to join to already existing. Bandit groups, research teams and mercenaries are trying to survive in new cruel world.
– Wide specter of buildings – from little house to huge base with other players and NPCs. Capture, protect, create, destroy. You cannot survive in this world being homeless.
– Choose your path: Bandit, Mechanic, Soldier or just an adventurer. Only you choose your destiny. Do all the best to survive in this world.

name: Love in the Limelight
summary: How did you get into this situation, is all you can think as you stare at the shocked woman in front of you, having blurted out your confession to the woman of your dreams, a local celebrity and actress. And then even more shocking is when she responds with a Yes.

name: Lonelight
summary: Dive into the mysterious world of Lonelight! Explore what remains of Earth-3, uncover secrets left behind by your creator, fight a cast of twisted enemies, and above all, don't let the light fade away...

name: Lords of the Realm: Royal Edition
Locomalito Arcade Legends
summary: Pay tribute to Locomalito's classic work with this collection, which includes the creator's best games.

name: Lofi Kitten
summary: Step into the dreamy world of LoFi Kitten, where the soothing LoFi music meets the adorable charm of cats. Immerse yourself in a relaxing and heartwarming experience combining the challenges of puzzle games with the calming embrace of LoFi beats and melodies. Ready to let the music guide you?

name: Looking Inside Cells
summary: Looking Inside Cells is a set of interactive Virtual Reality simulations for learning about cellular biology. Users can build cells by arranging their organelles, as well as transform them into specialized cells, such as red blood cells and e. coli bacteria.

name: Loonicycle
summary: Craig is a delivery boy trying to save up tons of Dosh, despite what the forecast says! Deliver passengers to their destinations to earn money & stay on the clock. Don't get caught in inclement weather or your luck might just spin out!

name: Loop8: Summer of Gods
summary:
In this original coming-of-age RPG, step into the life of Nini, a newly earthbound teen who arrives in the quaint Japanese town of Ashihara in August 1983. Explore the town, befriend its people, and face off against the Kegai in turn-based battles where the outcomes depend on the relationships you’ve built and the decisions you’ve made. Use Nini’s special connection to the gods to reset the world, with each loop allowing Nini and his allies to relive the 8th month over and over until they get it right…or the Kegai overcome them entirely.
With one month until the world ends, how will you spend each day?

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Haru's Secrets
Loya
summary: Loya is an open world, multiplayer RPG with dynamic combat, crafting and a procedurally generated world! Play alone or with your friends with private servers!

name: Lootbox Incremental
summary:
Lootbox Incremental is, well, an incremental game built around opening lootboxes.

You get a $10 giftcard from a kindly relative and decide to start opening lootboxes in your favourite RPG and streaming you opening them to the world. The rarer the items you find, the more income your stream will get you and the more lootboxes you can open.

With upgrades, achievements and multiple collections to complete, Lootboxes Incremental should give you just as much dopamine as opening actual lootboxes, only without the crippling sense of guilt afterwards.

name: Logan Kart 8
summary: Satiricial Mario Kart 8 fangame featuring bizarre self-insert and parody characters, a wonky physics engine, and a melancholy soundtrack.

name: Lower? Higher!: Buy or Bye
summary: your pawnshop will usher in guests with different needs every day, bargain with them, let the income soar! With the expansion of pawnshops, activities such as sending shop assistants and responding to emergencies are also essential. you seem ordinary transaction may cause the butterfly effect.

name: Low Batt
summary: Step into the thrilling world of Low Batt, a heart-pounding Top Down Shooter that pits you against the formidable security forces of L.E.A.D. Industries. Navigate through intense challenges requiring a blend of skill and strength and embark on an epic robotic adventure to rescue your robo-dog.

name: Locked in my Darkness 2: The Room
summary: A psychological horror walking sim set between realities—where the past never truly stays buried.

name: Love Begins with Goodbye
summary: As a male exchange student at Norway's University of Bergen, you live with three girls: Chinese student Luo Xue'er, mysterious landlady Laya, and Inora, a Norwegian learning Chinese. Weave your love story with them over six months, starting from a "goodbye."

name: Lobsterpunk
summary: Lockpick your way through an abandoned city powered solely by the combustion of lobsters. Bring the dead machinery one last breath of life before their steel forms lay cold forever. As you do, see the memories of the last man on earth, and how familiar that might feel, however foreign the setting.

name: Love Letters: First Bloom
summary: Solve word challenges, clear locked tiles, and enjoy relaxing minigames while growing a beautiful garden with each discovery.

name: Lost For Swords
summary: Lost For Swords is a Roguelike Deckbuilder, where the cards in your deck shape the rooms you’re exploring. Make your way up the tower, equip weapons and armor, cast spells and scrolls, activate auras, collect loot and defeat monsters in tactical turn-based combat.

name: Lost Expeditions: Station One
summary: It all starts with a meteor crash, where an unknown alien substance starts spreading, thriving in a thick fog. Humanity sends in countless explorers, but none return. You, of course, are one of them. Repair a defunct radio tower, establish connection with the outside world and survive.

name: Love Spell: Written in the Stars
summary: A romantic comedy visual novel/otome game about spells, adventures, penguins and the greatest magic of all: true love! "Love Spell" is the debut project of Great Gretuski Studios LLC, a female-founded, female-run indie game development studio focused on bringing romantic & creative stories to life.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Valor of the 13th Battlepack
summary: Valor of the 13th is a Battle-pack expansion for Heroes of the Motherland from the Lock ‘n Load Tactical system. Included are ten brand-new scenarios and ten new map panels that are laid out to make 2 larger maps. It features fluid, impulse-based turns, squad-level actions, and individual heroics.

name: Low-Fi
summary: As the player, you are “low-fi”, the street name given to those who cannot merge with the platform, a ubiquitous virtual reality simulation where most of the population now live their lives. You are a police officer and have been transferred to a particularly crime ridden section of city-block 303. The only inhabitants of note in your jurisdiction are other low-fi, and the human intelligence (or lower) artificial life forms who have remained among the citizens after the AI singularity.

name: Loco Road
summary: Have you ever dreamt of participating in a deathrace where everbody blows up??! Me neither! But thanks to the sick minds of our Game Design students now you can do it! In this frenetic game you have to avoid beeing last in each lap or you will die and look bad doing it!

name: LoveR Kiss: Endless Memories
summary: LoveR Kiss: Endless Memories combines the full content of the original game with various updates, including an improved user interface, expanded photo shoot options, and nearly all previously released DLC. It also introduces new locations, costumes, and a “PRO Photo Session” mode for easier access to photo tools.

name: Love Root Zero Kiss Kiss Labyrinth
summary: PS2 otome game inspired by a Manga Walker series.

name: Lost to Time
summary: Lost to Time is a metroidvania focused around time manipulation. Play as different Magi (characters you can turn into) in order to overcome otherwise overwhelming challenges.

name: Lost Vulcan
summary: Lost Vulcan is a platform game that combines the adrenaline of roguelites with the spirit of classic arcade titles. Play as a brave treasure hunter and enter 'Vulcan', an abandoned interstellar ship said to be filled with legendary riches... and mortal dangers.

name: Looping Bravery
summary: Looping Bravery is a sci-fi deckbuilding roguelike card battler. Try to find a way to save the planet from an impending alien invasion by traveling back in time to stop an event knows as "The Marking" from happening. Fight in the past to save the future.

name: Logic World
summary: Build. Program. Simulate. Logic World teaches you how circuits do math.

name: Lone Pine
summary: Lone Pine is a single-player, 2D adventure set in the fictional Lone Pine National Park. You play as Izzie, who has come to Lone Pine to try to photograph some of its mysterious, undiscovered 'cryptids'.

name: Lots of Cats in Every Moment: The Whereabouts of the Photo
summary: “Lots of Cats in Every Moment: The Whereabouts of the Photo” is an expansion pack that contains the latter part of the story from the base game.

name: Lobstar: Arcade Version
summary: Punch through the cosmos! An arcade-inspired shoot-em-up where you play as an immortal lobster speeding through space.

name: Lost Galaxy: Echoes of War
summary: Build. Defend. Survive. Expand. A sci-fi base-building game on a hostile alien world. Gather resources, build a sprawling high-tech colony, and defend against relentless alien threats—then unlock new planets, new challenges, and the secrets of humanity’s last frontier.

name: Lost Wiki: Kozlovka
summary: Explore a wikipedia-like database and solve a small town mystery in Eastern Europe. Step into the shoes of a journalist in the 90s as you sprawl through articles and uncover the secrets that have been laid in front of you.

name: Lords of the Lockerroom
summary: In this 3D physics based "fighter", take control of Aniki, Kazuya, Obama, and the rest of the cast as you duke it out in famous gachimuchi locations to see who's really the boss of the gym!

name: Logistical 3: Portugal
summary: LOGistICAL 3 - Portugal is a DLC for LOGistICAL 3, taking you on a strategic journey across Portugal. Solve puzzles, fix complex road systems, and upgrade industries as you transport cargo through cities and islands. Tackle new challenges in this historically rich and diverse landscape!

name: Lost In Maze
summary:
Will you be able to fully explore each labyrinth and find the key that will get you out? 
Collect as many gold coins as you can to buy aids in the store that will help you defeat the stronger Slimes at each level.

name: Lord Ambermaze
summary: This world and all life in it have stopped. Only your steps can force the flow of time to move. In this adventure, time is your best ally and your enemy. You need to restore the flow of time - and for that purpose, you'll have to delve into the depths of the underworld and challenge the evil Lord.

name: Love at First Sight
summary: A love at first sight sparks a passionate quest. Make choices and shape her destiny in this visual novel.

name: Lost Sword
summary: Lost Sword is a 2D anime RPG published by Wemade Connect. Gather and lead a roster of unique and appealing characters in an epic fantasy world.

name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Misty Peak
summary: Ride above the clouds on the lost trail of Graterhorn in this free DLC. Master the new challenges to ride in style in the air elemental customization set. Misty Peak - New adventures await you on the Lonely Mountains.

name: Louie's Mansion
summary:
Louie wins a free mansion, AND IT'S FULL OF FREE FOOD?!
Help the President save Olimar and his debt from the wicked ghost!
Will Louie Survive the Horrific Ghouls?! (Probably, it's Louie we're talking about)

What Is Louie's Mansion?

An overhaul of Luigi's Mansion to replace everything Super Mario related with Pikmin.
That means, every ghost, treasure, characters, all Pikmin!!

name: Love Rhythm
summary: Behind the hustle and bustle of Seoul City lies many unique stories. It’s revolving love, ambition and even hatred and crime.

name: Loop My Crank
summary: A ridiculous clicker where cranking handles becomes a cult. Upgrade your cranks, recruit spinners, and embrace the infinite loop. Always spin. Never stop.

name: Love Is All Around
summary: The player becomes Gu Yi, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting six beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Six girls that are charming, innocent, intelligent, wild, sexy, glamorous, who will go to the end with you is up to you to decide.

name: Lots of Things: Collector's Edition
summary: Explore a variety of locations, from a farm to a pastry shop to a medieval castle! Serach loads of hidden objects and complete the levels in the new "Layers" mode. Complete the tasks in the order you prefer, starting with mini-games or searching for objects!

name: Logic Grid Puzzle
summary: Logic Grid Puzzle is a multilingual story-driven logical deduction game in which you have to discover the whole story by using partially given facts.A pleasant yet challenging recreation for lovers of logical games and mystery-solving games.Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Love 3: Love Cube
summary: Things are about to change for Ichinari Tsuzurigi, an adult comics artist living in poverty. Blessed by his "Fates", he is facing a turning point of his career, and three women are going to live together with him...

name: Lost City of Bardo
summary: A massive open-world maze adventure game.

name: Love n War: Warlord by Chance
summary: Warlord by Chance is a tactical RPG. Your destiny is to become a warlord. Build your economy, recruit gorgeous heroic girls, upgrade units, and immerse in stimulating love tales. Stand, Fight and Create your own dynasty, my lord.

name: Lodge
summary: You find yourself trapped in a strange place... Welcome to LODGE : A mini-escape game set in a seaside house.

name: Los Angeles 1985
summary: “Los Angeles 1985” is a yuri romance kinetic novel bathed in neon heat. Two intimate tales follow four women as they navigate desire, heartbreak, and passion under the electric skies of LA. Love burns brightest after dark.

name: Lost Prototype
summary: Lost Prototype is a walking simulator in which you have to find your way out of a maze under construction. But be aware, you're not alone in this place. Something is following you and wants to erase all your progress.

name: Long Since The Eschaton
summary:
It’s been five years since the apocalypse started, the zombies are slowly decomposing, even new zombies don’t last due to the lack of food source. The last two humans on earth find themselves stumbling upon each other. While one struggles to keep herself alive, the other just wants to end it all.

Long Since the Eschaton follows Kirana, a medic who switched between one survivor group to another until she’s all that’s left. She met Gabe, a self-sustaining survivor who stayed at the same town since the beginning of the plague. Slowly but surely, the two bond and perhaps help each other cope.

name: Lost Grimoires 2: Shard of Mystery
summary: Stop a terrible curse!

name: Logical
summary: Adds a distinctive puzzle game experience to the Game Boy Color. Each of the 99 levels starts with a unique arrangement of pipes and slotted gears. Balls of various colors roll through a pipe at the top of the screen, and they'll fall into the gear and pipe arrangement. The goal is to get balls of the same color to fill all of the slots of a gear. Once that happens, the balls disappear. But time is always a factor in doing this, so you've got to be efficient. As the game progresses, several complicating factors enter the mix: some pipes will only allow balls to travel one way, and other will only let balls of one color pass through. The biggest problem is that some levels require colors be removed in a particular order. Try to solve as many puzzles as you can with LOGICAL.

name: Lovepical-Poppy!
summary:
LOVEPICAL-POPPY! is a sweet, comedic visual novel from the beloved Japanese brand SMEE. In this game, you'll find yourself surrounded by a charming cast of heroines, enjoying the delightful and hilarious moments of everyday life together.

This title features a talented team of SMEE's best, with a story penned by Yakamoto Uto, Minase Takumi, Nanao Yuhi, and Nakajima Taiga. Hanamaru’s fresh and vibrant art style brings the characters to life, while the adorable chibi art from Ameno Ame adds a touch of lighthearted humor. Under the direction of Yakamoto Uto and production coordination of Asami Akira, the game achieves a perfect balance of character development, narrative progression, and audiovisual experience, offering players a deeply immersive story.

Through a series of strange coincidences, Yaotome Tetsuya finds himself the new manager of an all-girls dormitory. He looks after the residents by cooking their meals and tending to their daily needs, all while working a part-time job at the dorm's attached crepe café. This charming café, located on the first floor to give the girls real-world experience, becomes a place where he shares the sweet and sour moments of work life alongside them in their cute uniforms.

His tireless efforts do not go unnoticed, and the heroines come to hold his kindness deep in their hearts. And when so many bright personalities live together under one roof, isn't it inevitable that a single spark will ignite a flame?

name: Los Pingheros
summary: Duck, dodge and toss. Los Pingheros is a multiplayer brawler for up to 8 players online or local. Join hectic battles in various modes and strive to become the ultimate Pinghero in Mexico by snowing your opponents out of the arena.

name: Lost Hope: Backrooms
summary: Lost Hope, a chilling singleplayer horror game set in the eerie Backrooms universe, challenges players to delve into enigmatic locations teeming with bizarre and inexplicable phenomena.

name: Looty Dungeon
summary:
Outwit, outrun, and slay your enemies and in this never ending world of endless dungeons and epic boss battles. Play as a knight, an archer, a pair of dueling twins, a fairy, a wizard or any of the other 50 unforgettably unique characters.

Each room comes armed with spike traps, flameballs, catapults, flying arrows and a wide assortment of enemies to prevent you in your task of obtaining riches and glory from the depths of the dungeon.

We call on you adventurous souls, rogue warriors, clandestine cavern crawlers, and masterful mages: the dungeons are beckoning and the loot awaits!

name: Long Gone Days
summary: A modern-day JRPG that imagines a world of war. Overcome language barriers, forge unlikely friendships, and find hope amidst conflict.

name: Lottso! Express HD
summary: Match, scratch and bingo your way through five levels of goals! Match numbered balls on the gameboard to win scratcher cards, boost your score and advance to bigger goals.

name: Look Mum No Computer
summary: Music meets mayhem in this twin-stick shooter action-RPG! Craft synthesizer modules to gain new weapons and experiment with the original music of Look Mum No Computer. Meet quirky NPCs, complete quests and battle huge bosses.

name: Lord of Metal
summary:
Lord of Metal is a single player story-driven management simulator game about organizing Rock music festivals bringing a dystopian world back to life. Gather your crew, book bands, sign sponsors, claim festival grounds and bring some Rock to the masses!

In Lord of Metal, you're a disciple of the almighty Metal God, tasked with reviving the world's passion for hard rock and metal. To achieve your goal, you need to host festivals going from small roadside gigs to mega events for thousands of fans.

Get ‘under the hood’ of heavy music industry: gather your crew, book bands, land sponsors, build & manage fests and make decisions that matter. Travel the vibrant world of the game and enjoy the stories and mechanics based on real music industry experience brought to you by pros.

name: Lonely
summary: 《Lonely》 is a puzzle-platformer game, which contains 20 game levels. Players in the game have the ability to control time reversal. Players in the game should go back to the past, cooperate with themselves, and shuttle through parallel worlds in the game, so as to cross the platform, across the abyss and solve the puzzle switch to move...

name: LongStory 2
summary: Award-winning LongStory gets a sequel! The Weasel Heights gang continues to surprise and delight as you learn more about yourself, friendship and love. Play as the gender of your choice and date the friend you like best. Throw a big mystery in the mix and you’re in for an adventure!

name: Love n War: Warlord by Chance II
summary: Love n War: Warlord by Chance II is a tactical RPG. You are now an Emperor of a vast nation. Strengthen your leadership ability and lead your people to prosperity.

name: Love Limit
summary:
In an effort to support her sister's future career as a matchmaker, Eiren Reeves agrees to a blind date her sister sets up. Several hours later, when her date's a no show...

The planet is invaded!?

But wait... the invader looks rather familiar? No, it couldn't be. There's no way Eiren's date is an alien invader that just put the fate of the world in her hands, right? Unless...?

name: Loose Leaf
summary: Manage a tea room between worlds with the most in-depth tea brewing simulation ever. Experiment with ingredients and tools to find the best recipes for serving your haunted guests. Then read their fortune in the cards to help ease their worries. Will you become a true Tea Master?

name: Louis
summary: The Mouth is trying to take over Louis's place. Hold to rise and release to dive. Dodge obstacles, travelling from fruit to fruit, collecting seeds, buying clothes and battling almighty monsters to reclaim your home with style!

name: Longtail!!
summary: Longtail!! is a story-driven action-adventure game where metroidvania-style exploration meets puzzle-filled dungeons. Uncover secrets, master energy powers, and traverse a shifting world on the brink of collapse. A heartwarming, action-packed journey full of charm and discovery awaits!

name: Loan Shark
summary: The loan shark is coming for you. Catch enough fish to repay your debt before it is too late. Go fish.

name: Lost in MaLul
summary:
Lost in Malul is a community made game following a streamer protagonist. After preparing to start his stream one day, the unexpected happens and his house is taken over by vile beasts. Fight with a flurry of punches and kicks to take back the house from the creatures that wish to make it their own.

In this 2D pixel beat-em-up, you will fight against enemies with multiple attacks, and larger than life bosses. Defeat enemies to get temporary power-ups and search the house for inventory items to progress through the story. This game was made by a team of devoted stream watching community members.

name: Love Red
summary: This is an independent game! It's quite difficult! You need to have love, courage, and wisdom to pass the level! It has a unique gameplay. I hope you can experience endless fun from it! This is definitely worth it! Hope everyone likes it! I will do better!

name: L.O.L Surprise! B.B.s Born to Travel: On Vacay
summary: Set sail for a tropical vacay on Surf Island – and discover fierce fashion dolls, characters, stickers and local multiplayer fun only found in this colorful paradise!

name: Logan The Kid: How It Was Intended 1
LostMiner: Build & Craft Game
summary:
Open world game with mining, crafting and exploration elements. It has a side view camera, combining 2D and 3D effects, with refined pixel graphics!
You can do anything you want in a fully destructible, pixel-generated, procedurally generated world, with many different biomes and secrets!
Place and break blocks, build a house, a crop plantation, an animal farm, cut down trees, create new items, gather resources, go fishing, ride an ostrich, milk cows, face monsters, dig and explore the secrets of a random underground place, try to survive! The deeper you go, the harder it will be! The game has creative and survival modes, offline (you can play without WiFi), but supports local multiplayer.

name: Love Story Games: Teenage Drama
summary:
Love Story Games: Teenage Drama is an interactive story where you have to guide your character through her day to day life, where she'll find love thanks to your advice. Enjoy this fun teenage adventure where drama and amorous tragedy are the order of the day.

In this adventure you discover your personality by making decisions that will change your life in dozens of essential ways, turning you into one person or another and unfolding very different key paths based on your choices. Each small step you take will influence your feelings and you never know where you'll find love. You might fall for the hottest boy in your class who then rejects you or have to have a secret relationship you hide from all your friends. Think about how you feel and make the right decision based on your ideas.

Pick your own style in this adventure and start to discover all the future holds for you in your high school, family, friends, couples... everything that happens in Love Story Games: Teenage Drama can lead you in one direction or another. Recall that only your personality and your decisions will take you from one place to another, but you can start the adventure over again as often as you like, discovering what's happened in your life should you opt for a different path in a certain place. Move through the different life stages and discover the new world that opens in front of you in this fun graphic adventure.

name: LoopBreaker
summary: LoopBreaker is a story-driven time management plus turn-based combat game where you play as a high school student who discovers the loop and gathers power, defeats the bad guys, breaks the loop, and saves the world!

name: Lofi aquarium
summary: "Lofi Aquarium" is a gamified focus tool designed to enhance concentration and relieve stress. As you work, a group of adorable baby fish will keep you company, all set to soothing lofi music. Over time, the fish grow and can be sold for profit. ﻿

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 6
summary: The sixth season (also known as Double Trouble) of Love Island: The Game was released on May 24, 2023. Episodes will be made available weekly on Wednesdays.

name: Loot Shop Simulator
summary: Run the coziest shop in the realm by cracking cursed crates, selling enchanted junk, and helping weird customers with weirder problems.

name: Lost in Loss
summary: Welcome to the strangest case of your career, detective: characters have forgotten who they are! In this cozy hidden object adventure, find items tied to memories and restore lost identities — uncover the truth behind the loss.

name: Look Outside
summary:
Explore the warped interior of the apartment building you are stuck in. Fight hideous monsters that were once your neighbors. Manage weapons and ammo. Play video games. Craft bombs from household supplies. Cook. Answer the door. DONT let them in. Keep yourself alive and sane as the world just outside your window stops making sense.

Just whatever you do...
DONT LOOK OUTSIDE

A survival horror RPG by Francis Coulombe, with music by Eric Shumaker, made in one month for the Hawktober game jam.

name: LOLBeans.io
summary:
LOLBeans.io is a funny platformer battle royale game.
Play as a jelly bean trying to win obstacle race courses like in Takehi's Castle, It's a Knockout, Wipeout or Ninja Warrior.
A typical multiplayer game has multiple rounds where the slowest players are eliminated gradually. At the end, only one player wins and gets the crown!

Reach the finish line before the other players to qualify for the next round.
Avoid obstacles, escape traps, don't fall into the void.
Beat the chaos, overcome your opponents and be first on the last round to win!

name: Lost Eclipse
summary: After the city was shrouded with nightmares, you’ve been assigned to dive into this psychological survival-horror adventure to uncover its strange phenomenons that are affiliated to a certain science-tech corporation and bring them to justice.

name: Lonely Catgirl is the Purrfect Pussy
summary: Running home in the rain, you stumble upon a poor abandoned catgirl by the side of the road. Bring her home, take good care of her, and she might open her heart and legs for you!

name: Lock On: Flaming Cliffs 2
summary:
Lock-on: Flaming Cliffs 2 is an expansion and an evolution of Lock-on: Flaming Cliffs which was by itself an unofficial add-on to Lock On: Modern Air Combat. It is applied either to the base game or on top of the original Flaming Cliffs. It contains the content of the original add-on as well as updates to aircraft, sensor, and weapon systems.

This add-on allows users of Lock On: Modern Air Combat and DCS: Black Shark to fly together in online multiplayer games, either head-to-head or working cooperatively in missions. Overall this add-on offers improvements to the terrain, mission editor, AI flight models, 3D objects, artificial intelligence (AI), and multiplayer. The included aircraft are: Su-25 (new 3D model), Su-25T, A-10A, Su-27, Su-33, MiG-29A, MiG-29C, F-15C. It also includes several new missions and campaigns.

name: Logistique
summary: Logistique is a modification which brings a different point of view to the events happening during Half Life 2. It's the first part of a single player campaign developped by Elseware Experience featuring custom maps, textures, sounds and musics.

name: Low Battery
summary: A sokoban game with power restrictions. Plan your route carefully to find your way out.

name: Love n Dream: Virtual Happiness
summary: 《Love n Dream: Virtual Happiness》is a card-based puzzle game with RPG components. Your job is to lead different girls to advance their adventure levels in a Virtual Reality Game.

name: Look Inside
summary: Look Inside is a 2.5D narrative game based on the palpable interactions that the player makes in a book summarizing in images and texts the life of a French family at different times and periods of their members' lives.

name: London Blitz
summary:
