Looking Glass is a free RPG horror-esque exploration game made with WOLF RPG Editor released in 2019.
It features a 4-chapter story centering Aoi Yuuta, who experiences reoccurring nightmares taking place in a different world. However, things begin to change with the appearance of someone with almost the exact same face as him.

name: London Taxi: Rushour
summary: Collect customers and take them to famous London destinations within the time limit in order to get paid.

name: L'Odyssée Sibérienne: Le Rêve Utile de Nicolas Vanier
summary: A french game about Nicolas Vanier siberian odyssee

name: London's Aesop
summary: An urban LGBT furry visual novel

name: Losing CTRL
summary: Ctrl+C Ctrl+V your way through this little Puzzle Game and help a robot friend navigate through different levels

name: Love is in the Space
summary: It is Valentine's Day, and just as you were about to start celebrating, your spaceship crash lands on an unknown planet. You get separated from your boyfriend in the crash, and must now set off on a dangerous quest to find him.

name: LoveHacks: Book 1
summary: #LoveHacks, Book 1 is the first book of the #LoveHacks series. It is followed by #LoveHacks, Book 2.

name: Lord Democrat Strikes Out!
summary: Stop a donkey politician's vengeful plot to disqualify a baseball team that rejected him!

name: Lost Island:Battle Royale
summary: this a battle royale game many players drop in an island to fight and the last one wins.

name: Lotan
summary: Chaoskampf on the Stormy Seas

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Enemy at the Gates Battlepack
summary: Enemy at the Gates is a DLC module for the Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital series. It features a fluid, impulse-based turns, squad-level, and individual heroics, plus lots of armor and special rules to bring the fight for the city of Stalingrad.

name: Lovey Dovey
summary: As the #1 toilet fan, you visit an abandoned toilet factory in search of the legendary golden toilets. However, you're ambushed by the factory's friendly mascot, Lovey Dovey. You're at an extreme disadvantage since the only thing you brought is a rocket launcher. Collect all 69 toilets then escape!

name: Lost Astronaut's Fringes of the Empire
summary: Fringes of the Empire is a hybrid roguelike and top-down classic retrogame reimagined.

name: Lola's Alphabet Train - Learn to Read
Lohotronshchik: Crazy Loto
summary: Minigame kiosk from Rudolf Lachinov, originated from his school project. Earn money by playing any of 53 games in the kiosk with all graphics sculpt of plasticine. Fishing from aquarium, shooting gallery, variety of card games, Pac-man and Snake clones - this kiosk has it all to win!

name: Long Road
summary: Constantly create their own records, get more money, unlock the vehicle.

name: Loot: Strategy-Packed Bundle
summary: Get Loot Strategy-Packed Bundle, Strategy game for PS4 console from the official PlayStation website. Explore Loot Strategy-Packed Bundle game detail, demo, images, videos, reviews.

name: Lost Letters
summary: Lost Letters (of Seraphina) follows the journey of a young woman named Elle, a scavenger of electronics, through a post-internet world, taking place in the township of Seraphina. As she explores each environment, she uncovers more about the history of Seraphina.

name: London Racer: World Challenge
summary:
This high speed racing game takes gamers on races across 18 cities around the world including London, Paris, Berlin, New York and Los Angeles.

Enhancements like nitro boosts emulate the sensation of speed. Compete in championship mode unlocking new cars and tracks. Race against lifelike A.I opponents in single player mode or challenge friends in the two player and multiplayer modes.

While racing you will have to try to lose the police and watch out for traffic, which you can use to your advantage in causing crazy accidents. Breaking through roadblocks and rules will help you win.

Gameplay is in the style of Midtown Madness.

name: Logic Pic: All DLCs Pack
summary: This pack contains 3 DLC with a total of 810 new puzzles for Logic Pic!

name: Love Witches
summary: History is told from the face of a tentacle, who has to survive in a world hostile to him. But he is rescued by a chance encounter with two beautiful witches. Will he accept the offer from them or will he remain alone?

name: Lock & Key
summary: You are locked in a cell, a position that is not unfamiliar to you- it's one of the hazards of the job. You decided to try one last, big job, and now you are locked in the deepest, darkest dungeon of King Tyrak II. This time they seem to actually be taking your incarceration more seriously than usual. There also seems to be no intention of ever letting you out, even for a rigged trial, so you will need to take your escape very seriously.

name: Loot Slider
summary: Loot Slider is a tricky, but relaxing puzzle game, where you place and aim cannons on a grid in order to push treasure chests to their locations. The better solution you find on each level, the more stars you get. Can you collect all 168?

name: Louma
summary: Louma is a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler. Fight through the procedural generated floors and save the World of Louma.

name: Lost Sector
summary: Explore the sci-fi world of Lost Sector and master the souls-like combat. Defy overwhelming odds to overcome evolving creatures and gradually changing environments in this unforgiving third-person action-roguelike.

name: Lost Souls: Timeless Fables - Collector's Edition
Lost Contact
summary: LOST CONTACT is an exciting realistically designed space station shooter. As the main character of unflinching Nil Heard you will experience soul grabbing horrors of facing the mutant monsters of the Universe.

name: Love two balls
summary: Love two balls is the best brain & dots puzzle game! 300 free levels to play!

name: Lost City of Z
summary: Explore the exotic rainforest to find valuable clues and follow the trail of a missing National Geographic researcher! Using the tools you discover along the way, trace the paths of past explorers who searched for an ancient civilization and find the missing adventurers. Use your Hidden Object skills to decipher mysterious messages and uncover the trails of generations of explorers in Lost City of Z.

name: Lonely Knight: Key Pass
summary: Lonely Knight's Key Pass. The number of keys obtained daily is doubled.

name: Lost in the Forest
summary: A difficult romhack for Super Mario World with 111 exits.

name: Lord of the Race
summary: Welcome to a Horror Open World, Story-Driven, Racing RPG Game. You have shipwrecked on Carbon Crest Island. The Deal is Sealed. Either, Race and Win through the deadly race trials set up by the deranged Count Levoy OR Lose & Suffer an eternity under his mercy.

name: Loved by King Bs
summary: A sequel to Marked by King Bs.

name: Lost Soul
summary: Find your way through five puzzly levels, guided only by sounds!

name: Lost in the Amazon
summary: Lost in the Amazon is an interactive CD-ROM based on the book of the same name by Toni Brandão, which provides lots of information about the region's indigenous people, animals, and plants. It also includes two games: a matching card game between animals or plants and a Frogger-style where you need to bring items back to the tent.

name: Look and Find: Curiosity
summary: A game of searching scenes, finding objects, earning coins and unlocking new levels. The objects you find will be added to your collection and can be viewed at any time.

name: Lovely Fairy Action
summary:
Made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 4 (the Pride Month one!). 
 
A short ~5 minute shooty game. The danmaku is quite light by Touhou standards, so newcomers should be fine here.

name: Love Signal: D-Mate
summary: A story of an Android Girl who's learning new emotions. Who will be her true love?

name: Logic Games Bundle
summary: Three Logic Games in One Bundle!

name: Lost Tracks
summary:
Lou, a young man in his early twenties, is on his daily commute in the train. He is soon after breath-taken by the sight of a young woman. Lou wishes to talk to her but his self-doubt holds him back. He is torn in two and gets lost in his inner world. 
 
In this poetic art/adventure game you are in the pursuit of courage and try to mend your conflicting self. A journey through your subconscious world makes you deal with the fears and doubts that hinders you from talking to the stranger. Glimpses of your own courage leads you through dark forestry, dense fog and empty spaces where you are faced with the difficulties that prevents you from talking to the woman on the train.

name: Lonely dog lost in space
summary: a contemplative pup floating through endless outer space

name: Loka: League of Keepers Allysium
summary: Players control a single mercenary armed with a simple shotgun.

name: Lovelorn Sanatorium Ⅳ
summary: This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts.

name: Lovely Warriors
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: LongHead
summary: Elliot and Logan are neighbors. They don't like each other's company, but they can't live without each other. but they like a challenge! Game rules: turn on the taps to relieve pressure in the pipes.

name: Lost Frontier
summary: Lost Frontier

name: Love, Kyoko
summary: Help Kyoko defend her lab in this cute rogue-like! Control randomized Mechs to defend against attacking monsters, and unleash special attacks to DESTROY THEM ALL. Read up on enemies using the Notebook, but be careful not to run out of fuel! Simple controls, with a little RNG. Written in pure Batch.

name: Lost Continent
summary:
Lost continent is a MMORPG, reminiscent of the great classic.

Play in synchronous real-time players from different places and experience the adventure on the Lost Continent from anywhere, anytime.

name: Lost Pages: The First Cycle
summary: Lost Pages is a game with a unique gameplay that features a completely new type of turn-based deck building system. It's unlike any other card game where you simply draw cards randomly and play them each turn by consuming energy.

name: Long Count
summary: Sierra-style Point & Click Adventure

name: Love Cooking at Home? Turn your Hobby into a Business!
summary: Cook dishes of Russian cuisine with characters from your favorite fairy tales and run a small bakery in a mall.

name: Logic Pic: Love to Solve by Numbers
summary: 260 new puzzles to solve and 10 new themes!

name: Lost in Translation: Silly
summary:
Lacking memories and a purpose you take control of a recently awakened Resident inside Traumathos, the hereafter world. Your goal: fight your inner demons and face your past. Investigate the Sorrow's Polis, find your way through The Shyness Forest, and mostly important: unveil a mysterious language known as Murmure. Remember, you will die, true redemption requires sacrifice.

Lost in Translation: Silly is an investigation game with turn-based combat and bullet hell elements. Despite being an RPG at its core, the game has different mechanics depending on which plane of existence is being explored.

name: Logicality
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting journey on the island of dreams. Explore the open world and interesting places, while solving various puzzles that use environment.

name: Loot Box Simulator: Crimson Fire
summary: Be rich for once and buy all the loot boxes. Earn gold and spend it on awesome loot boxes filled with more tahn 1.000 amazing rewards.

name: Lofi Checkers
summary: Lofi Checkers is a cozy take on a classic game. Play with the AI or a friend for a light, refreshing game of checkers. Nothing beats the simplicity of a straightforward game when you have a few moments.

name: Lovengrad
summary: Become a Hunter in the terrifying Forest of Lovengrad. An unforgiving environment hides a monstrous Werewolf with different threads and mysterious creatures. Survive the Night against different Enemies and hunt the Werewolf down.

name: Loud: RockStar Edition
summary: Get ready to rock & roll with this bundle in a heartwarming music arcade rhythm game!

name: Love Island
summary: Tired of the hustle and bustle? Take a tour to Love Island! Play this match-three game with RPG elements to seduce all those charming anime girls!

name: Loren the Amazon Princess: The Castle Of N'Mar
summary: Amazon scouts are missing! All clues lead to the vampire-infested Castle Of N'Mar.Find out what happened to them and try to save them from Zachary and Valery N'Mar.You'll met other bizarre characters like Mother Morte and Zeal.

name: Lords of Strife
summary: The game of intrigue, tragedy, and armadillos!

name: Lost Frequency
summary: Using your deep space scanner, you inadvertently make contact with Captain Paul Renzo of The Orion Project. A space explorer of the Allied Space Exploration Cooperative, who is stranded on a foreign world and has lost his crew. His life is on the line and he needs your help! Why is he there? What happened? How will he escape the predicament he is in? Only you can help him navigate the dangers he faces on this foreign planet where he has crashed. You choose the adventure he will have. Play the game over and over picking new paths each time, you never know where Captain Renzo will end up.

name: Looney Toons Dash revived
summary: Looney Toons Dash is back,bugs bunny spiele,looney,subway escape,the bus,tune

name: Lords of EverQuest
summary: Lords of EverQuest is a spin-off of the EverQuest franchise featuring real-time strategy.

name: Logistics Tycoon Simulator
summary: Start small, think big in “Logistics Tycoon.” Begin with a single vehicle and expand your freight empire across challenging terrains. Manage a fleet, tackle challenging deliveries, and optimize logistics to grow your business. Are you ready to become the ultimate logistics tycoon?

name: Loot Hero
summary: A side scrolling action RPG.

name: Lowrider Hopping
summary: This indie game is inspired by the lowrider and hip-hop subcultures. Feel the vibes of the neighborhood with hip hop beats. Ride a lowrider around the block and improve your skills in controlling the hydraulic suspension to pick up items.

name: Lost Connection
summary: The main hero is a rare luck - to hack the site of the terrorist organization IT-Vira. But such an invasion can not go unnoticed, and from the hunter he becomes a victim. What's next you can learn from the comics that are shown before each level of the game.

name: Lovely Girls Puzzle
summary: Lovely Girls Puzzle - a puzzle game in which you have to find pair of elements with the same images.

name: Looney Tunes: Dizzy Driving
summary: Dizzy Driving is one of two games released in the "Looney Tunes Double Pack" Bundle. It's a top down racing game using Looney Tunes Characters.

name: London Craft: Crafting & Building Exploration Game
LoveBug
summary: Sleepless nights. Blood, sweat and coffee. Survive your first game jam while developing a game in just under a weekend and maybe, just maybe, in the end of this all, you will find true love!

name: LonQ! Highland in DS: Puu Puu Seijin Arawaru!! Shukketsu Dai-service! Onara no Saiten SP
Lord of Dwarves
summary: Gather resources, craft weapons, and build a castle. Then defend your castle against monsters who will try to siege, sap, and smash their way in. All in a procedurally generated 3D block world that allows for extensive crafting and total construction and destruction of the terrain.

name: Love of Renai Koutei of Love!
summary: School president (emperor) Lukina wins at everything no matter what it is. However, there’s one exception: love. She proclaimed her love for her childhood friend Akito in front of the whole school, and now many other girls are after him as well!?

name: Love Season
summary: This fantasy visual novel tells you a fun and erotic coming-of-age story in which you can make choices that change the way you get involved with different characters, allowing you to build relationships with beautiful women and watch lots of sex scenes!

name: Love Hina: Ai wa Kotoba no Naka ni
summary:
Keitaro Urashima promised a girl when he was young that they would meet up again at Tokyo University in the future. Sadly, in the National Practice Exam, Keitaro ranked 27th from the bottom. Knowing his grandmother owned a hotel, Keitaro intended to stay there while continuing his studies for Tokyo U, only to find out the hotel had long been transformed into an all-girls dormitory. Through an odd twist of fate, Keitaro eventually became the manager of the dorm, beginning his life of living with 5 other girls.

With over 500 phrases to collect, be sure to visit all the girls' rooms, but be careful and make sure you don't peek when you should not be looking!

name: Love Furry Boys: Zodiac Dating App
Love Island: The Game - Season 5
summary: The fifth season (also known as Ex in the Villa) of Love Island: The Game was released on August 1, 2022. A new volume was released every Wednesday.

name: Lotus: The Self-Made Witch
summary: Brew potions and graduate with your best friend(?) in this small visual novel with drag and drop crafting elements!

name: Long Road
summary: Long Road is an after apocalypse story based game which player should make decisions to survive. You must fight to find a cure and save the world from infected people. It contains real world images.

name: Lords of Solgrund
summary: Lords of Solgrund combines elements of city building and slow-paced tactical battles. The game features detailed animations and systems inspired by the early middle ages, combined with magical, spiritual and other fantastical elements.

name: Lost Chiko 2
summary:
The 2nd game in the Lost Chiko series, this time with a different adventure, a different story and a different gameplay!
One day while we were sleeping under a tree, a bird comes and tells us that our mother has been kidnapped.

name: Lost Perspective
summary: Lost Perspective is a turn-based first person horror rpg with grid based movement.

name: Lost in the Space
summary: Lost In The Space combines frantic top-down action with fast, fluid and very addictive gameplay, with instant response to player commands

name: Lovely Kitchen
summary: Lovely Kitchen it's a time management game set in a restaurant. The player must carry out the orders that the different clients make to him to earn money that can be used to reform and expand the establishment.

name: Lotsa Blocks
summary: Block-stacking puzzle game for iOS with several different modes.

name: Love and Betrayal
summary: An online and local team work and betray game of 4-10 players.

name: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw
summary: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw is puzzle game in which you have to combine pictures of sexy anime girls into one image using jigsaw pieces. Relaxing gameplay with beautiful artwork and original lofi music will help you calm down after a hard day at work or study.

name: Lost Oath
summary: A Souls-like platformer with Roguelike elements.

name: Love Ice Rink
summary:
Originally released in 2017.

A perfect prince, an underachieving genius, a kinky coach...

Which ikemen ice skater will you pair up with?

Now included in the Otome Games Romance Box app.

name: Love in the Distance
summary: A word adventure game based on a long-distance relationship. On high school and college campuses, pick up memories that belong only to that time. Ideal and reality, if we can chose it again, can we not have regrets?

name: Loner
summary: This is a story about one student Aline who sincerely believes and dreams to prove everyone - aliens exist. But all that she gets is insults of her mates that don’t take her seriously.

name: Lost Empire: Immortals
summary: Lost Empire: Immortals is a 4x turn-based strategy game, featuring multiple star maps with up to 5000 star systems, 6 different races and an extensive research tree. The battles are rendered in 3D - although the player cannot control them - and the final objectives can be domination, diplomacy, research or exploration.

name: Lots of guns
summary: Lots of guns is a purely FPS game. It is about a story of a dark hero, who was planning to steal the power of 2nd God.

name: Lost Ascension
summary: This mod takes up the mantle of expanding and perfecting the recipe that DDLC created back in 2017. With a precise focus on character development, world building, and psychological emotions, you won't find another mod quite like it. If you're after a mod that gives love and care to its characters (both literally and metaphorically), then you've come to the right place. This is an 8-9 hour experience, best suited for readers who are after seeing the dokis grow into better people, all the while facing off against impossible challenges, and plenty of sweet moments to truly cultivate into something memorable. The Silence Will Be Broken.

name: LotAtc
summary:
LotAtc is a complete simulation environment with client & server software which can connect with DCS World Simulator or work standalone with LotAtc Generator. It provides users to get an ATC/GCI view of the battle.

Play the role of a tactical or air traffic controller and provide help to human pilots so that they better accomplish their missions, by radioing them a picture or guidance instructions!

name: Love Anime Boys Club: Language and Date Zodiac Signs
summary: Discover this adventure through the city, where your mission is to win over the 12 most irresistible guys, each with a unique personality guided by their zodiac sign.

name: Locked Room on Rails
summary: A Murder Mystery visual novel starring homicide detective Santiago Moore, as he tries to solve a sudden murder on the luxurious Jacob's Ladder Express Train.

name: Lords of Thunder
summary:
In the once peaceful land of Mistral, legend holds of a brave knight named Drak who has sealed an evil god named Deoric beneath the six continents of the land. However, peace never lasts. The Garuda Empire has invaded the lands of Mistral, and the six Dark Generals, led by Sornbul, have conquered the continents. Sornbul's ambition is nothing less than to resurrect Deoric and plunge the land into chaos.

Duran, descendant of Drak, is the only one who can stop the Garuda Empire's mad plan, and with the power of Drak's mystic armors, he heads off to stop Sornbul at any cost.

name: Love Hotel
summary: Love Hotel is a simulation game by 3 Silly Hats. The game let's you build and manage the best hotel for couples.

name: Lowlife
summary:
All you gotta do is heal.
Take control of Lowlife and heal your downloaded Scripts as you scour a corrupt, dystopian future. Your goal is not to hurt the countless Villains you will face spanning across several dungeons, it is to keep your party alive so they can do the hurting, by any means necessary.
Throughout your dungeon dives you will incept Memories which can be used to trade for new Scripts - or if you have downloaded Scripts with their own god rolled skills, level them up too! Sell your extra Scripts in the Auction House for extra Memories to spend.
There are 35 uniquely skilled subclasses of Scripts to be found, including Tanks and Melee DPS to place on your front line, Mages and Ranged DPS for your back line, and Shamans - a wildcard class that can be placed anywhere in your party setup.
Lowlife places you in battle with a variety of weak and powerful Villains, equipped with only a variety of healing spells to keep everyone (and yourself!) alive. Spend your gained Parameter Points to build the perfect healer and fit your play style and sprinkle a little icing on top by spending Node Points in one of three skill trees.
Complete Quests and level up to gain access to a variety of dungeons with Bosses and challenges that await you. When you feel confident enough, team up online to take down a Raid Boss or two.

name: Long Drop
summary: By the power of POOP! Solve challenging puzzles in this medieval-themed casual puzzler. Unlock new poops and harness their power to overcome the challenges of the Long Drop.

name: Love Rewind: A Magical Time Travel Romance
summary: What would you do with a second chance at life?

name: Lonely Yuri
summary:
"First with a kiss... the girl is etched in the protagonist's mind.

It was first year in high school. The budding of summer.
Fusa Konno met a shut-in girl named Seri.
Persecuted by her yearning eyes, her heart gradually opened...

Night-time Sheep presents a highly atmospheric romance yuri visual novel"

name: Local Network
summary: Virus free virtual network.

name: Looping Art Museum
summary: "Looping Art Museum" is a single-player adventure game where you wander through an infinitely-looping art museum, finding changes in the paintings to progress. Interact with a talking "Mr.Cat" and uncover the mysteries of the strange art museum.

name: Louise Kills The Belchers!
summary:
An afternoon nap interrupted by orders...to kill!
It's a bloody day on Ocean Avenue as Louise takes down the Belcher family. Her favorite toy Kuchi Kopi speaks to her and demands sacrifice. Armed with items found around the house and a dangerous mind, she's serving up murder and its a taste that can't be beat!

name: Lonepath
summary: Lonepath is an atmospheric mystery game with a 1940s-inspired aesthetic, in which retired police officer turned detective Elric Greenhill sets out on the tail of a serial killer.

name: Looney Tunes: Road Runner & Wile E. Coyote
LOTL
summary: Unleash legendary Axolotl warriors in an isometric hack and slash. Crush mind-controlled beasts, defy Lord Voidborn, and free the Known Worlds. Solo or co-op, the battle for light begins. Ready to fight "a-lotl"? Wishlist now!

name: Longleaf Valley
summary: Longleaf Valley is in danger and it’s your job to save it! Design and create your own wildlife reserve: build habitats, rescue animals and restore the forest.

name: Loopush
summary: Unleash intriguing reactions in the fusion of Sokoban and time loops in "Loopush". As a rabbit delivery worker, cooperate with your shadow friend to complete orders within limited steps. Solve puzzles with wit, fulfilling the rabbit's dream on a surprising and creative journey!

name: Lost Tenet
summary: In a war-torn 13th century, the once protectors become the predators. After the razing of the sister city of Romne, the Knights Solomin have tasked themselves with the extermination of the alleged party responsible, the Clergy.

name: Lost Head
summary: Lost Head is a puzzle game using Franken-Stitch's head.

name: Lost Route
summary: Lost Route is a driving thriller video game made for room scale VR.

name: Love in Belarus
summary: Love in Belarus is a fascinating love story with a Belarusian dictator. Melt the heart of the usurper of power!

name: Louie Cooks
summary: Your cat Louie is one of a kind: He wants to become a marmalade-cook and expects your help protecting his fruity ingredients from the onmarching waves of enemies, called cuties!

name: Lone Traveler
summary: Lone Traveler - A story about a lone traveler, you have to dig, explore the location, fight monsters in order to survive on the island! Build a wooden ax or a stone pickaxe and go on an adventure!

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Nam Battlepack 2
summary: Heroes of the Nam Battlepack 2 includes 11 scenarios, bringing to life powerfully armed Squads are at the vanguard of all actions, spurred on by daring Leaders.

name: Loving Life
summary: A short non-fictional visual story about a near-fatal experience that forever changed the life of an 18 year old.

name: Logos
summary: Here is a planet whose Supreme Lord, Main Logos can be You! The fate of mankind and fauna who inhabit the planet and that of the wandering extraterrestrials may be in your hands. Teach them or destroy them, set the army of the undead on them, or blow them up with an alien invasion. It’s up to you what future brings for your mortal proteges.

name: Lost in Space
summary: A lone spaceman is on a mission to get back to his ship- and he's out of control.

name: Lokaa
summary: A first-person adventure game about Lyra, a woman who travels to a fabled tower in hopes of fulfilling a wish.

name: Love Bakudan
summary: Love Bakudan is an 18+ yuri visual novel about Haruka Mishima, a young woman who inherits an erotic bookstore - and all of the drama, romance and daily life that comes with it.

name: Logistical: Brazil
summary: Logistical: Brazil is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country. Over 1000 towns to complete including cities like Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paula, Salvador and Belo Horizonte and many, many more.

name: Love on Beach
summary: Some things won't happen again. Everybody has their future.

name: Lords of Nysera
summary: Lords of Nysera is a Tactical RPG inspired by games like Fire Emblem 4, Shining Force, Final Fantasy Tactics, and D&D. As the player, you will recruit beautifully rendered characters each with rich personalities, thoughtful story arcs and unique abilities to aid you in battle.

name: Lost Lost Lost
summary: An adventure puzzle game where you explore a colorless city to find hidden red, green, and blue color balls, solving challenges to restore vibrancy to Relax City.

name: Love Games
summary: Love Games is a new Visual Novel by Hanae Novels. Main character Mr. Stevens found his uncle's computer that may make any dream come true. Mr. Stevens is in love with his daughter's friend Mikayla. Enjoy the story and find out what kind of dreams Mr. Stevens wants to come true.

name: Lovely Pop 2-in-1: Jan Jan Koi Shimasho
Lovely Animal Stories
summary: Lovely Animal Stories is a short game about cute animals. You have to complete 30 levels with simple tasks. Duration of the game: 20-30 minutes.

name: Lost Dream: Overgrown
summary: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Lost Dream: Overgrown, a serene walking simulator that will take you on a tranquil and introspective journey through a mystical overgrown realm.

name: LotR: Realms in Exile
summary: A total overhaul mod for Crusader Kings III, based on the works of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings.

name: Lose Control
summary: Use your faulty spaceship to survive space... Until you lose control...

name: Lowsy
summary: Lowsy - a game whose main goal is to complete the level in such a way that each eyelid gets an eye. The eye has several parameters: color, speed, temperature, height, and you can change them with the help of objects.

name: Love Story: The Way Home
summary: After being passed from one orphanage to another, all Katherine wants is a family to call her own.

name: Love Thyself: A Horatio Story
summary: In a society where everyone is a clone of the Emperor, can you survive long enough to find out who you truly are? Try out the brand new visual novel set in the Endless Universe!

name: Lord of the Sea
summary: In this world you have to play as a navigator, you will go to the ocean, get money, upgrade your ship to defeat the behemoth in the depths of the ocean.

name: Lower Forecourt
summary: A big, open, twisted, confusing, hard and unconventional coagula map. Sweet id texturing and a lot of fresh gameplay ideas. Can be frustating.

name: Love Angel Syndrome
summary:
"Ah… the binary… it's beautiful. You're beautiful."

Yuuna, our protagonist and mentally ill NEET, spends most of her days browsing forums about her favorite anime, Ai no Uta ★ Tenshi Senshi 𝄞. One day she stumbles across an ad claiming to have a desktop assistant modeled after Ai, the main character of Ai no Uta.

Unable to resist the allure of talking with her favorite character, Yuuna downloads the program. Ai-chan turns out to be the girlfriend Yuuna’s always dreamed of– but can a relationship with no boundaries really flourish? Can an AI program actually feel real human love?

name: Love, Election & Chocolate
summary: Love, Election & Chocolate is a romance visual novel that puts the player in the shoes of a male student named Yuuki Oojima. The game is mostly driven by dialogue, with a limited amount of illustrations to accompany the story narrative.

name: Locks
summary: Locks is a horror puzzle-platformer set in a puppet show. The game features a new type of puzzle and a fresh way to scare you. Are you a spectator, participant, or victim?

name: Lost Hotel
summary: "Lost's Hotel" is a 3D horror adventure puzzle game which make you explore and find the way out from this mysterious hotel.You have to find the 4 codes that are hidden in different rooms to unlock the way down to the next floor. The last exit is on the lowest floor.

name: Lotus Challenge
summary: Racing game, featuring 37 cars licensed by England's prestigious manufacturer, from vintage roadsters to high-tech concept cars designed by Lotus Engineers exclusively for the game. Players compete on 15 race tracks, ranging from highly detailed real-world city locations to exhilarating custom circuits and speedways. The game features five modes. In addition to standard racing challenges, Lotus Challenge there is also an innovative Story mode, requiring the player to perform a variety of stunts, missions and challenges -- weaving through oncoming traffic to escape the paparazzi, hill-climbs on treacherous, snowy alpine tracks, being filmed jumping lines of school buses for adverts and many others. The GameCube version, previously referred to as Lotus Extreme, is based on the Motor Trend-licensed game of the same name on Xbox.

name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Riley's Return
summary: Ride into uncharted territory and discover the lost trail of Mount Riley in this free DLC. Prove your skills in new challenges to unlock the brand-new earth elemental customization set Riley’s Return brings you a fresh adventure to the Lonely Mountains.

name: Lotus Turbo Challenge
summary: This sequel to Lotus Esprit Turbo Challenge is again a behind-the-car viewed racing game. It takes place in eight distinct circuits, adding surface and weather effects such as desert and snow. Later in the game, you must race through two-way motorways with oncoming traffic, (incorporating civilian cars and trucks), and face tough levels aided by speed and time boost pick-ups.

name: Love Stories: Sex and the Furry Titty
summary: Love Stories: Sex and the Furry Titty goes to town on the city! There are foxy ladies out and about, hung plumbers visiting some wet and wild kitties, gloryholes waiting for the connoisseurs, and much more! Five all-new, original stories, each one ending up in hot sweaty sex!

name: Lovely Moments: Dad and Daughter
summary: Jigsaw puzzle with 6 images, about day life of family and fatherhood. Enjoy playing theses scenes in 5 levels of difficulty and play minigames to increase your experience.

name: Lost Dream: Memories
summary: Lost Dream Is back bigger than ever! Explore the world as a cute little fox and go on a mission to find your forgotten piece.

name: Lost Assassin
summary: The year is 3043. You are an AI-AGR (Assassin Grade Robot). Your mothership was destroyed by an unknown force (Spoiler: Evil robots). Engage in intense platform-shooting action while seeking vengeance, 12 satisfying weapons, powerups, jetpacks, bionic legs and more.

name: Love Smash! 5
summary: Love Smash! 5 is an all-female tennis simulator.

name: Locole
summary:
Let's connect railroads and lead the train to the terminal station!
Many passengers are waiting for your train in the way station.
Please do not leave them. It's important to carry them all to get a high-score!

name: Loppy: Planet Hopper
summary: Join Loppy, and her friends, on a 16-Bit Sci-Fi Themed 2D platforming adventure (All with a tasty twist!) where you'll travel through various themed planets, run through levels, jump over obstacles, use your Telekinesis powers to defeat evil businessmen, eat pastries, discover secrets, and save the galaxy from the clutches of an evil corporation!

name: Love & Friendship
summary: An Interactive Regency Rom-Com

name: Logout
summary: Quinn is a citizen of the social media obsessed society of Outpost 72. As Quinn, send messages and emojis to others in the city to affect their behavior. Use these methods to solve puzzles, distract guards, and explore the world through the short narrative stealth action adventure game of LOGOUT.

name: Lost Cosmonaut
summary: Rejoice comrades! For you have survived the crash landing! Become lost on a randomly generated planet in Lost Cosmonaut, an action platformer with roguelike elements.

name: Low Grav Racer
summary: Low Grav Racer is a sci-fi antigravity racer for iOS.

name: Loons: The Fight for Fame
summary: Every once in awhile a game comes along that whether you love or hate it ? you'll love something about it. Loons: The Fight For Fame is one of those games. Coming from the fine folks as Infogrames, Loons: The Fight For Fame lets you play as one of the classic characters from Warner Brothers as they battle for the spotlight. If you love the franchise you'll enjoy playing as your favorite Looney Tune and, if you don't, you're sure to get a kick out of killing them hundreds of times over. The game makes use of the increasingly popular cell-shade animation in addition to multiplayer modes supporting 1-4 players.

name: Lover
summary: Lover is a first-person psychological horror game. Presented in a nostalgic and retro environment, player will uncover the cause of the illness through reincarnation and overcome psychological issues. Before darkness consumes your world, find those unspeakable secrets as you face shattered reality.

name: Love is... in Bloom
summary:
Love Is... playing together. Now heres your chance with Love Is... In Bloom on the Nintendo Wii. Plant, nurture and sell flowers to build your own floral empire and a great relationship at the same time! 
 
Take on the role of the popular Love Is... characters in their goal to build the best Florist shop around. Start with the basics of preparing the soil and planting seeds to grow magnificent flowers that you can then sell them in your very own Flower shop to earn money and grow a little empire. 
 
Full of the same endearing charm as the original cartoons you get to work on a blossoming relationship as well as a growing business. 
 
* Twelve varied and unique arcade-style games provide fun, long-term challenges. 
* Build your own floral empire. Starting from the very first seed and building up, upgrading the garden and stocking the shop to supply made-to-order bouquets to the public. 
* Unique Wii-remote controls with gameplay specifically designed to take advantage of the extra level of control. 
* Single and Multiplayer game modes.

name: Lost Trials
summary: Lost Trials is a Punishing Platformer, you charge your jumps and accurately estimate the charged timings to travel upwards as fast as possible. There is a running timer for speed running purposes and leaderboard records.

name: Lou's Revenge
summary: Lou's Revenge is the first satirical action-RPG in which you can play Lou, Satan's son! Drink milk, kill the traitors, save Hell and rescue the hottest demoness from the clutches of those nasty people and mega-corporations!

name: Loopy Ball
summary: Fun little game where you must avoid the spikes to live longer.

name: Lost Coffee
summary: A coffee shop simulator that's not a simulator game. Something strange is going on in this shop.

name: Lot'zAmonsters
summary: An arcade wave game, shoot, kick upgrade and eat watermelons.

name: Lost Horizon
summary: Designed and developed by the renowned adventure specialists of Animation Arts – the studio behind the best-selling Secret Files series – Lost Horizon takes its players back to the glory days of the point ‘n click adventures. Enjoy clever riddles, beautiful graphics and full voice acting. Visit exotic locations all across the globe and follow a riveting narrative that keeps you hooked for hours and hours on end!

name: Lose95
summary: Lose95 yourself to the depths of your folders and try to make space for the downloads!

name: Love Mystery Club
summary: This game is based on the theme of love & light reasoning. Even if you choose the wrong option, it will not lead to game over. It is very suitable for casual players who like love reasoning but don't want to waste their brain cells.

name: Loco Shortline Operations
summary: This is an open world rail builder simulator with physics based Locomoves, trucks, cranes or boats.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of Normandy - Battlepack 2
summary: Heroes of Normandy Battlepack 2 has 12 scenarios. The scenarios cover battles spanning the D-Day drops, fighting the Norman hedgerows, and Operation Market Garden.

name: Love's Fiery Imbroglio
summary: A romance themed text adventure game.

name: Looking_for_food
summary: Simple RPG games, go maze, destroy monsters, upgrade, get props.

name: Lost In Sweets
summary: An easygoing, workshop simulation game. Jolting awake to a sudden shaking, you find yourself in an unknown world... Team up with a remarkable robot and some fantastic creatures to craft delectable sweets and find your way back home!

name: Lost Civilization 2
summary: 7 maps with ending scene and a secret map.The gameplay is mainly exploration with small fights here and there. More shooting in the end. You can solve some puzzles or not, those are mostly optional. Gameplay is easygoing. Nothing for Doom-veterans (easy). Has a little scarier moments to spice things up.

name: Lost Fragments
summary: Move between reality and memories, changing the shape of fragments of the past.

name: Lords Mobile
summary: Lords Mobile is an online strategy game that combines the excitement of clanwars

name: Love Decision
summary: Kingdoms rise and fall. Everyone has their goals.

name: Lovely Day
summary: A sweet contemplative game

name: Lost Gems
summary: Lost Gems is puzzle game. Try remove all gems from level ;) Play 60+ levels. Challenge your brain! Good luck!

name: Lore Masters: Pathfinder
summary: A Pathfinder trivia game drawing from the lore, rules, and mechanics of the Pathfinder Second Edition tabletop roleplaying game.

name: Loot Hound
summary: A scavenger hunt with your dog, what will you find today? Loot Hound is a casual exploration game with elements of sim and strategy.

name: Logistical: USA - Florida
summary:
Logistical: USA - Florida is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country with over 700 towns to Complete.
Logistical: USA - Florida game covers the US state of Florida including cities like Tallahassee, Orlando, Miami, Tamp, Jacksonville and the Keys.

name: Lost and Flounder
summary: Wake up in a forest. Meet the locals.Solve their problems. Go fishing and find upgrades. A chilled and short adventure that can currently be completed in under one hour. Planning a bunch of fixes and more content in future updates.

name: Lost Lands 3: The Golden Curse
summary: An exciting adventure of a brave girl who found herself in a fantasy world. She has to find a way to stop the cursed beasts awakened after sleeping for a thousand years and coming to life for reasons unknown. Lost Lands: the Golden Curse is an adventurous hidden object game-quest with puzzles and mini-games scattered through the boundless spaces of the fantasy world – from the volcano valleys to the Druid forest, from the deep caves to the floating islands. One fine day an ordinary good-looking housewife, Susan, while visiting the museum of arts drops by an old looking glass which, for whatever reason, starts to beckon her up. When she touched the looking-glass, Susan was immediately transported into a magical fantasy world of the Lost Lands. She has been known for her heroic deeds as Susan the Warrior there. Susan meets a child named Fiora, and the girl takes Susan to her great-grandfather, Maaron. Susan recognizes the Druid as an old acquaintance. Maaron explains that the village was attacked by a Harpy, the legendary winged beast. The strangest thing is that the demon has been a stone statue in the abandoned old fort for thousands of years. Along with her friends Susan is ready to set forth into a volcano, go to a dungeon and climb floating islands to find out the reason why the Harpy, Naga, the Minotaur and Solidus, one after another, began coming to life from the stone prison and causing chaos in the Lost Lands. Naturally, the creatures must be stopped...…

name: Loopback
summary: Loopback is an arcade-style scrolling shooter game where you will battle through waves of enemies, fight unique bosses, and build new weapons as you make your way back home.

name: Lost Fleet
summary: Lost Fleet is a co-op space shooter. Every ship in your fleet is flyable, from the smallest fighter to the largest battleship. Protect the Mothership, mine resources, crush your enemies.

name: Lovecraftian Bundle
summary: Immerse yourself in the terrifying universe of H.P. Lovecraft with this bundle.

name: Looney Tunes Racing
summary: Has fewer playable characters then the home console version.

name: Logic Mahjong Souryuu
summary: A mahjong game where you can play against original mahjong players using the "character creation" function. In the story mode "Tile of Destiny," the hard-boiled world view and formidable mahjong players will draw you into the story.

name: Lode Runner
summary: A remake of Lode Runner, developed by Tozai and Southend Interactive, was released on April 22, 2009. The game features revamped 3D graphics, additional game modes, cooperative and competitive multiplayer support, six new block types and a level editor, as well as live leaderboards and a timeline of the game's history.

name: Lover
summary: Lover is a short visual novel about being hunted by a beast in the woods. It can be played in under an hour.

name: Loyalty for Love
summary: You are an independent young woman who runs a homely, old-fashioned bakery together with your grandmother. Your peaceful life is shattered when a few suspicious customers show up at the bakery: three handsome men dressed in black.

name: Looper Tactics: Tower and Sea
summary: In Tower and Sea DLC, you will unlock the Human race cards, featuring the new hero , along with new cards, treasures, keywords, and challenging dungeons. Explore exciting gameplay elements in this expansion!

name: Logos Quiz
summary: Logos Quiz is an entertaining game where you guess the logos of popular companies. Advance through levels of difficulty and strive for the highest score possible. The more logos you guess the more coins you will earn. If you get stuck and don't know an answer, don't give up! use the coins you gathered to get hints or remove unnecessary letters. If you are still stuck try asking your friends on Twitter or Facebook.

name: Lobby 2
summary: Play as Fallenshadow by taking on the form of 12 girls and access 70 perks to help you fight off your husbands.

name: Lone Planet
summary: A sci-fi adventure with RPG with puzzle platform elements

name: Lovely Goddess
summary: Super easy to really hard to solve puzzles. It's your choice.

name: Lost With You
summary: Lost With You is a survival game with a visual novel added to it. You must use all available resources to survive on a deserted island, and also maintain good relations with your companion.

name: Love Finds A Whey
summary:
Which cheese will you take to the summer festival? And will you achieve your dream of becoming an artisanal cheesemaker?! Get ready for a romance that will make you melt.

"Love Finds A Whey" is a short parody dating sim.

name: Loco Looper
summary:
Trains. Fluffy Clouds. Planets. Stars. Even a seagull. Cute, tricky cerebral fun.
Get on the brain train with this original puzzle game!
Make a perfect track using all the pieces.
The harder the level, the more ways to solve.
Handcrafted levels, each a pen & ink style love letter to mini dioramas and trains.
A neat 3D effect makes the game naturally POP when holding your device (no face tracking required).
Loco Looper is designed and written for iPhone & iPad using Swift and Metal.
Move fast and make nice things!

name: Lost Shipwreck
summary: You wrecked on a deserted island, alone and desperate to survive, you will have to get food, water and build your shelter. Explore the island, its surroundings, you will fishing, hunting or collect fruits. Protect yourself from wild animals, make weapons, build your home with branches and sticks.

name: LooWarVR
summary:
《LooWarVR》 is a casual shooting game,
Background, a boy went to his grandpa’s house in summer vocation, in the toilet he got many unexpected visitors- flies. So the battle began.
we exaggeratory restored the battle filed just as we are in the toilet shooting the flies when we were young, to help players to remember their childhood .
The game was formed by Q version settings, Realistic scenes

name: Lost Cities
summary: "Officially licensed version of the award winning Lost Cities by Reiner Knizia. Plan your expeditions wisely to outpace your rival's pursuits! After 3 rounds of adventuring, the player that had the most successful expeditions is the winner!"

name: Long
summary: Will you be able to get out of this long corridor? A long road with death on the prowl will stand between you and the exit. There is no other way, you are already inside.

name: Low Oxygen
summary: A short linear puzzle platformer about an astronaut on an alien planet. Explore this strange facility by solving strange puzzles which include but not limited to pushing plants, throwing plants, growing plants, bouncing plants and last but not least bouncing plants on other plants.

name: Logistical 2: Washington
summary: Logistical 2: USA - Washington is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the state or country. Hundreds of towns and over 10,000 businesses to complete across Washington, USA. Cities like Seattle, Spokane, Vancouver, Tacoma and many, many more.

name: Lootem
summary: Drop into a firefight, run over enemies, and explode your friends on one of the two wild islands! The action only ramps up as the zone shrinks and the enemies move in. Download Lootem and play today!

name: Lost City of Vampires
summary: Sent by the Council to hunt the "lost city" factions... You must destroy an entire bloodline and put an end to an unsanctioned blood war by remaining the last vampire standing in this single player Battle Royal shooter challenge.

name: Lollipop!
summary: LOLLIPOP! Is an addicting hentai puzzle game with delicious, sweet candy combinations! In LOLLIOP! You will find many bright levels with hot girls and various visual effects, from this game you will just have a real BOOM!

name: Love is a Game
summary: Romance is in the air when otome characters come to life!

name: Locus Solus
summary:
This game is a massively multiplayer online game focused on freely searching, adventuring and life.
Experience real-time social interaction with thousands of people in the same exciting game world.
Meet new friends and foes, engage in group combat, venture off to uncharted lands, or visit a tavern and chat with players from around the world.
It's an ongoing, ever-changing world of adventure.

name: Lost Technology
summary: Lost Technology is a simulation game in which over 100 characters comprising a total of 12 different factions battle to conquer each other’s territories. The faction chosen at the beginning will determine the conversations and events that occur throughout the game between the player and the other factions.

name: Loveless cat
summary: Return the spring and prove to your girlfriend that you can withstand all the trials.

name: Lord of Demons
summary: Raid villages as Evil Lord by utilizing dark magic and your army of demons and undeads. Conquer the world, one island after the other, until everyone kneels before you.

name: Lovebrush Chronicles
summary:
The world of Lovebrush Chronicles is based on the concept of “parallel time and space”. A mobile dating simulator with a conceptual plot, the player is both a painter and a person with the ability to travel through universes and go to and from parallel worlds.

The player plays the role of a freshman art student who’s just entered university, with one side of life being the warm daily activities of the real world’s campus, and the other side being inadvertently involved in the doomsday crisis of another world.

Parallel universes, similar faces, and different personalities. This proposition about “love and salvation” waits for players to paint their choices with their brushes.

name: Loose Nozzles
summary:
Built by a veteran game developer around his young son’s artwork, Loose Nozzles is a slapstick arcade game of flight and rescue. Use simple, two-button controls to pilot your rickety rocket and save endangered colonists over 25 levels of increasing intricacy and menace.
The child-like look masks a grown-up challenge; each collision risks losing a piece of your rocket, turning a mission of precision flight into a chaotic struggle to survive. Master the controls and learn to fly “smooth” – fast, close, and free of injury – to make your way up the leaderboards.
Loose Nozzles is free to play to completion, and a one-time purchase unlocks: unlimited lives, restarting from any level, rocket upgrades, skins that look and fly differently, and alternate play modes for even greater challenge.
Loose Nozzles is a labor of love from Foster and Family Games. We hope you like it!

name: Lodoss-tou Senki: Fuku Zinduke
summary: A Record of Lotoss War turn-based strategy game for the Sharp X68000 and MSX.

name: Lovecraft Tales
summary: Atmospheric, dark adventure set in Lovecraft's universe.

name: Loona Landa
summary: Gotta save all them cute little bunnies!

name: Love & Dehumanization
summary: This is an adult visual novel that takes place in a fantasy RPG world. A girl willingly becomes a monster and is subject to brutal violence. Though she doesn't realize it, hope is somehow waiting on the other side of this cruelty.

name: Look At Me
summary: Stealth into social media life in the humorous universe of "Look at Me" which takes you on an adventure to destroy the fake posters of his notorious Uncle who became an evil influencer.

name: LovePlus Every
summary: LovePlus Every is a mobile dating sim with VR function. The system is separated into three main sections, School (スクール), Date (デート), and Girlfriend Plus (Kanojo Plus – カノジョプラス). In each section, players are able to interact with the three heroines.

name: Lords of Xulima: The Talisman of Golot
summary: With this extension for Lords of Xulima, you will start the adventure with a very special artifact: The Talisman of Golot. Known as "The Voice of Golot", this artifact not only can speak with you but also has the ability to aid you by granting wishes when you need it the most.

name: Lone Bastion
summary: A top-down space shooter where you switch between the wings of the space station you are trapped in to fend off endless waves of enemies.

name: Lost in Blue: Shipwrecked
summary: The Lost in Blue series debuts on a new platform for the first time ever with Lost in Blue: Shipwrecked. Experience a survival adventure like never before through colorful 3D graphics and the uniquely interactive capabilities of the Wii. You find yourself stranded on a mysterious island filled with lush forests, a sunken ship, ancient ruins, and an active volcano. With the help of a trusty pet and a new friend, you’ll explore the mysteries of the island to find a way out or make a new life for yourselves there forever. The first console version of the series greatly upgrades the visual quality and depth of the game, immersing the player in a survival adventure like never before. Vibrant 3D graphics paint the island environment, weather systems, and various items as more life-like than ever. Full use of Wii-mote and Nunchuk controls allow you to experience realistic movements with a variety of mini-games including fishing, carpentry, fire-making and more. An island tutorial and a greater focus on exploration enhances the accessibility and fun factor for new players. Dependable pets improve item gathering and provide entertainment by playing music or dancing with you. Recruit a friend for around 40 mini-games, including new, cooperative games - the better you play, the bigger your reward

name: Londonian Gothics: Meikyuu no Lolita
summary: Alice's father has been kidnapped by creatures of the night, and it is unknown whether he's alive or dead. You, as Alice, insist on following down into the labyrinth via a hole in the basement to find and rescue him. Your lolita dresses contain the powers needed to protect you from the dangers that lurk within.

name: Love Doki-doki! Yakusoku no Basho! Sweet Melody!
Lock 5
summary: Lock 5 is a game for the Game Wave

name: Loptice
summary:
Loptice is a first person shooter defense game. Shoot balls and match three or more of the same color to eliminate them.
Unlock special skills and explore different kind of strategies and play styles.
Upgrade skills and combine them to create even more powerful skills.

name: Lost in Tomorrow
summary: The protagonist is an early AI robot sent to explore outer planets many years ago. When it returns to the earth after completing its mission, the earth at this time has changed. Click on the hidden props on the screen, and then drag the props in the props bar to the target position .

name: Love
summary:
Love is a reductive platforming game with a retro aesthetic and a focus on a challenging difficulty. It has an custom respawn system, 16 levels, 12 track soundtrack, and competitive scoring.

The game includes a standard Arcade mode for players who want a little challenge, Unlimited Mode for players who just want to have a good time, a dedicated Speedrun mode for players who want to prove they're the fastest, and YOLO mode for players who have something to prove.

name: Lost Kingdom
summary: "Lost Kingdom" is a unique action adventure big open world 2D platform jumping game, as an epic game, it has different characteristics, jumping feel is its most distinctive feature, traveler ah, go quickly to the mysterious kingdom, where there are magical and ancient secrets waiting for you!

name: Long War of the Chosen
summary: Long War of the Chosen is a port of the original Long War 2 mod by Pavonis Interactive to XCOM 2's War of the Chosen expansion. It is a complete overhaul of the vanilla game that attempts to make campaigns more engaging, longer and more challenging. Overall, you get more tools (items, abilities, soldier class types), but you have to deal with more enemies and a greater variety of enemies.

name: Lost in the Forest
summary:
Join the adventures of a little boy that is lost in the forest.
You must avoid all the forest creatures, like the fox, the frog, the hedgehog and many others (even a shark).
Travel through many locations and try to find your way back.

name: Lost Memory of Angel Frane 2
summary: The 2nd entry in the Frane series of action RPGs.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Pledge of Honor - Battlepack
summary: Pledge of Honor Battlepack includes 9 scenarios, bringing to life powerfully armed Squads are at the vanguard of all actions, spurred on by daring Leaders.

name: Lost Between the Lines
summary: Romantic Novel "OshiKano" Vol. 1! A large-volume romantic drama with beautiful illustrations by a popular artist!

name: Lorne
summary: In a wartorn world you are key to restore peace and order to the lands of Lorne. Equip Evelyn with the right tools you can find, craft or upgrade in this ARPG featuring interactive combat, open world exploration and intimidating temples filled with puzzles. End the corruption and keep Lorne safe.

name: Lordian: karma
summary:
Destroy waves of monsters with your powerful magic crossbow and alchemical traps.
Freeze, blow, trample, even burn your enemies with various traps available.
From extreme difficulty which can only be experienced through multiplayer to various stages of difficulties for single player.
Test your skill and challenge your limits in the highest quality action defense VR games, Lordian: Karma.

name: Lost Bros
summary: In Lost Bros simultaneously control three independent characters as they travel through time to save their kidnapped friend. Gunman, Shieldman, and Swordman must cooperate with unique abilities to solve puzzles and fight bad guys.

name: Looney Tunes: Acme Antics
summary: Acme Antics is one of two games released in the "Looney Tunes Double Pack" Bundle. It's a side scrolling game. The player takes control of Road Runner trying to avoid Wile E. Coyote.

name: Lost Bits
summary: Lost Bits is an abstract precision platformer, where your goal is to collect all the small cubes and avoid different obstacles. If you touch any obstacle your hero will decay into bits and you will start over again. Guide the cube through the deadly obstacles and collect all the lost bits.

name: Loving Flesh
summary: Stalked from the shadows, you must retrieve items from your abandoned school.

name: Lovestory
summary: Lovestory is a hurricane shoot 'em up 3D shooter with a large range of weapons and a huge number of enemies. Help the hero to blow a path, gaining the upper hand lot of corpses and tons of twisted metal to save his love.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: We Stand Alone - Battlepack
summary: We Stand Alone – Battles of Easy Company is an expansion module for Lock 'n Load Tactical: Heroes of Normandy. Formed in 1942, and after almost two years of rigorous training, Easy Company, dropped into Normandy, France, on D-Day,

name: Long Journey Home
summary:
Long Journey Home is an interactive fiction game about grief, friendship, and decomposers with two endings. Made in Twine. Music by @lunatunes.

Content Warnings: Death, Grief, Weird Mushroom Illness, the Void of Space

name: Lovesick
summary: A bride. A groom. And special guest: food poisoning.

name: Lost Lives
summary: Lost Lives is a 2D multiplayer shooter with RPG elements, where you will find yourself in the conditions of post-Soviet devastation. As you progress in the game, you will level up, unlock equipment and customize your character. Choose your gear wisely and go into battle against enemies!

name: Loop Chain
summary: Solve infinite levels of create loops with this amazing Loop Chain Puzzle game. Create closed shape patterns of loop and play different modes to connect your brain with creativity, making it one of the best time pass puzzle games ever.

name: Lost Dream: Darkness
summary: Once the Darkness rises above all, It's your time to take the reins and hit the ground running on a mission to discover the light once again.

name: Logres: Japanese RPG
summary: Logres

name: Lost In 80s II
summary: Feel all the nostalgia of the 80s in a special arcade game.

name: Lost Hellden
summary: Lost Hellden is a unique 3D hand-painted J-RPG from Artisan Studios, enhanced by dynamic lighting and weather effects. Follow Cyphel and his allies as a mature story unfolds. Customize your characters as you see fit and dive into a battle system that mixes action and strategy.

name: Lost In Parallels
summary: Explore the infinite dimensions of Lost in Parallels using your flash light ! Collect key objects to access new dimensions ! Challenge your friends and try to put the best score on the speedrun leaderboard !

name: Loop Theory
summary: Loop Theory is a horror game in which every minute spent in the game changes your idea of the story. Take on the role of a character with a mysterious past and find out about what happened.

name: Love Talks
summary: This is a dating sim where you explore the school to find conversation topics and talk to the heroine. The goal of the game is to ask the heroine to the school festival within 7 days.

name: Lolly Joe
summary: A dog's journey to reunite with his best friend. Lolly Joe is a 3D-platforming adventure that takes you through the surreal worlds inside a boy's subconscious mind. With his magic lollipop, Joe must overcome a variety of challenges crafted from his friend's dreams and memories.

name: Locked Fears
summary:
Locked Fears is a first person puzzle/horror game with platforming elements and creepy atmosphere.  
You play as Samuel Custer, a late worker at UNIVERS HORIZONS, when things at the office start to drift into a dreadful situation.  
With the help of an unknown Individual you try to survive and escape this nightmare.

name: Lost Keys
summary: In Lost Keys, you are a boy who is lost in a place full of dangers, find the keys to open all doors and get to the exit.

name: Lost Ethereal
summary: Save your dead family from the spirit world

name: Low Gravity
summary: Two-day speedmapping event following a "low gravity" theme with 10 small to medium-sized levels and a start hub. It runs on the SMP mod (included) and comes with a custom skybox and a music track.

name: Locked Inside: Rebirth
summary: Locked Inside: Rebirth is a horror PT-like game about a girl locked inside her mind.

name: Lost Gold
summary: Lost Gold is a 2D platformer where you need to work hard to kill enemies and find hidden gold. Each level cannot be repeated in its own way, collect gold and carry it to the cart as soon as possible. Do not forget that along the way you need to clear the levels from enemies.

name: Love Meeting
summary: This is a casual draw line game. The girls in the game have different stories. You can chat with girls. The secret hidden in the girl is waiting for you to discover.

name: Lord Temin's Fortress
summary: Lord Temin's Fortress by Neil Carpenter is a new first person puzzle/adventure game from Gnarlewood. Experience grand scale architecture, epic music and a deeply immersive atmosphere with contantly new and compelling gameplay.

name: Love and Order
summary: In the smallest district of Montreal, the Crown Attorney relies on the legal expertise of its lawyers; backed up by the support of a single hard-working secretary. Love And Order is a dating sim with 4 love interests.

name: Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream

name: Love: Spice!
summary:
Love: Spice! is an otome/dating sim game created in two weeks for My First Game Jam: Summer 2023.

In a world where everybody (yes, everybody) is some kind of spice, a regular black pepper, weighed down by the mundanities of life, engages in an interesting hobby to destress: people -- no, spice watching. In a completely respectful manner, of course. It's always cathartic to see hot men just existing. But at some point, these men have begun to take an interest in our unassuming little black pepper! And maybe, just maybe, it'll develop into something more...

California has a wide range of environments from forest, through farmland, huge cities, coastline, oil fields to desert mining.

name: Low Poly Racing

The game itself is an arcade racer and it implements AI and different tracks in the mix to make the game fun to play and competitive. Things in the game, custom AI, different tracks(new one just got released), 3 different cars(more coming soon), TimeTrial Mode and Racing Mode against Bots. Local Multiplayer is still on the works and possible coming within the next month. It will also be coming to mobile some time in the future. You can download and test the game for free and don't forget to let me know what you thought of it, it helps a lot with further progress in development. The game should be played with a controller for better experience.

You start with 25,000 FREE coins and win more with free bonus spins and level up rewards. Plenty of big wins, free spins. Just take a seat in the casino and spin, spin, spin while you win, win, win!

summary:

This game consists many different kinds of puzzles like Japanese phase puzzle, math puzzle, room escape puzzle, finding item puzzle, etc.

The player must solve all puzzles correctly in order to progress the story. For example, if you fail the first entry level word puzzle, you will immediately reach the bad end.

name: Lockdown

name: Lovers in Playa Rosa
summary: “Lovers in Playa Rosa” is a Romantic Comedy Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim where you play as barkeeper Tina Lee as she takes a trip to Mexico to improve her fortunes and explore lesbian love!

name: Locker of Death
summary:
At your school, people whisper of a mysterious locker known as the Locker of Love. If you write down the name of the person you love and put it in the locker, they’ll fall in love with you.

But after you and your friends find the locker and experiment with it, you soon learn the terrible truth. The Locker of Love is actually the Locker of Death, and anyone whose name is placed inside will die a week later.

When you find your own name inside, you team up with your best friends and a mysterious transfer student investigating the locker in order to break the curse.

Can you break it in time to save your life?

name: Love on Paper

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Complete +
Love and Formaldehyde
summary:
Nineteen year old Prince is terrible at telling almost anyone how he feels, and even worse at showing it. Without the ability to let his emotions show on his face, he's always had a hard time making friends — even in the mortuary program at a welcoming technical college, Prince only spends time with roommate Daniel while nursing a distant crush on classmate Aodh.

When their professor assigns them to do a temporary internship together at a local funeral home in the two weeks leading up to Valentine's Day, will Prince finally have the chance to confess his feelings?

Or will life — and death — get in the way?

name: Loot Box Simulator: RPG Anime Girls
summary: Live your life like there is no tomorrow. Earn money by finishing crazy jobs from a random selection, just to spend all of it on loot boxes. "Loot Box Simulator - RPG Anime Girls" brings pretty anime girls and exciting loot boxes to your console.

name: Love Mochi
summary:
"Love Mochi", a fun, simple puzzle game!
Align your mountain of sweets together and make them disappear!

Aim for exhilarating chains and reach for a high score! Simple, intuitive controls, easy to use with both hands or just one. Perfect to play anywhere, anytime.

Play with the puzzle and enjoy the story of sweet-toothed Ai.

name: Lost Crystals
summary: Unearth the hidden gems waiting to be discovered in the foggy valley. Immerse yourself in the calm and let the magic of Lost Crystals wash over you. Are you ready to embark on a tranquil adventure like no other?

name: Lords of Kingdoms
summary: Lords of Kingdoms is a multiplayer online war game. Turn your small castle into a mighty fortress and become ruler of the greatest realm.

name: Lost in Cairo
summary: An open-world action-adventure RPG. You play as Soren on his journey through the desert to cure a rare mutation that prevents him from controlling his emotions. Explore a mysterious world where your actions impact your emotions, and discover what happens when you unleash them.

name: Lost Qubixle
summary: The Lost Qubixle is a perspective puzzle game. Your task is to reconstruct a figure from three perspectives. This game requires that you use your perception skills and that you make the best use of your logical thinking. Overcome the barriers of your perception and improve your logical thinking by solving mind-blowing puzzles.

name: Locomancer
summary: Build and ride the model train layout of your dreams without the cost and excessive model foam dust getting in your nose!

name: Loopdio
summary: Loopido is a minimalistic platform puzzle game where you need to get a ball through a warp field. Depending on the game mode you either control the ball or the world.

summary: LovePlus is a dating sim where you can choose 1 among 3 girls to enjoy an intimate relationship.

summary:
Lost Lands has a treasure hunting theme with a simple goal in each level - picking up a gem to accumulate collection value. But you need to find your way through doors that open one way but block another. It starts with 4 doors, but as the number of doors increases, finding your way could be mind-boggling. You are challenged to accumulate more than one million dollars of collection value.

Seeking more challenge? The game provides a second play mode where you are awarded with stars for shorter routes.

name: Lost Nomad
summary:
The game takes place in the setting of Turkic mythology in ancient times. The events unfold in the country of Ellir, in the lands of the Turkic blacksmiths, Ordos of the Main character and his tribe.
The main character is a 16-year-old boy named Lachin. One day, a civilization desiring greater power attacked and ravaged his house, for the sake of the riches of the mines of his homeland.
The best and most expensive metals, minerals and stones are mined in the Hellirian Mountains. The region is known for the abundance of magical rocks and the strong connection of the inhabitants of the region with magic and spirits.

name: Lost Station
summary: You are a member of a special task force tasked with protecting the galaxy from a notorious pirate crew who have set their sights on capturing the most powerful source of energy in the universe: the spaceship's reactor. The consequences could be catastrophic.

During adventure mode, you can check certain predefined locations and speak with characters you meet, sometimes selecting your answer during conversation. Sometimes during the story, the girls in Hinata apartments will ask you quiz questions about the Love Hina anime. The action mode in the game is done via four different mini-games which, unlike the adventure mode, use 3rd-person perspective.

summary:
You are Keitaro Urashima, who has 7 days to do various things in the game, and win the heart of the girl he wants to get. The first six days, Keitaro does various things, such as talk to the girl and say the right thing or do the right thing to make the girl happy. The player can choose any of the girls living at the Hinata-sou: Naru, Mutsumi, Shinobu, Kaolla, Motoko, Kitsune, Sarah, and even Haruka.

As the girls feelings increase toward Keitaro, they are likely to do nice things for him. But be careful because if you upset them, there will be hell to pay.

Being one of His Great Unholinesses sons, you are about to set on a quest that will lead you to various places until you finally have the chance to help your father defend the realm against its enemies. If you want it or not. So, do as you are commanded, naughty brat.

Develop relationships with quirky allies and improve your stats by inspecting your surroundings and making difficult choices. Will you explore and alter memories for a chance at a better life? Will you risk looking back?

Jacqueline struggles to remember what happened to her, and as she sifts through her memories and reflects on her life she comes to the realization that someone close to her is a murderer.

name: Lone Vessel
summary: Prepare for the invasion! Explore the void, complete missions for credits, and collect items to arm yourself. Unlock new load-outs and face exotic enemies in the face of impending destruction!

name: Loop
summary: Put your puzzle-solving skills to the test with Loop, the addictively fun game. Move stones around a grid system to their correct positions and challenge yourself with exciting gameplay!

name: Lord of the Dungeon
summary:
A homebrew ColecoVision game from 2011.

Aux Armes! Aux Armes! The cry is heard throughout the village to lead another brave quest into the Dungeon!!! Many have entered; few have emerged!!! Will your party be able to conquer the dungeon and return to the village? What evil lies within? What TREASURES are for the taking? What GLORY lies ahead? Thanks to a few successful forays into the dungeon, a partial map of the first level and a Tome of Dungeon Monsters exist. Armed with this information, it is your job to lead your meager party of adventurers through the Dungeon, to add to the knowledge of what lies below, to claim the money and treasures of the depths, to go for the GLORY! As your party gathers as Diane's Drinking Depot, the blood chilling cry still lingers in your ears, “Aux Armes! Aux Armes!” Will you survive?

name: Looping

On your way to your goal you have to evade/shoot down enemies and navigate through a pipe maze. You earn points not only for shooting down the enemies but also for staying in the air as long as possible. It is therefore possible to fly through the maze over and over again before flying to the docking station in order to get a beter high score. After having reached the goal the game starts again on a higher difficulty level.

name: Lovey-Dovey Lockdown
summary: You and your former college crush have been locked in a room through divine intervention. The only way out is for you to…

name: Louny Balloony
summary: Fly through the exciting skies in this unique side-scrolling platformer! Collect balloons and feathers to gain the ability of flight as you navigate dazzling landscapes and face off against surprising obstacles and enemies during your aerial journey across the world!

name: Lolo: Puzzle Game
summary:
Dangerously addictive! Join the world's new puzzle craze now!

LOLO is a highly addictive block puzzle game. Gather same color shapes into a single cell. Gathering more blocks into a single cell unlocks dark blue which helps you clear the board and keep going.

Simple yet with many strategies to consider, LOLO surprises you with different tricks you discover the more you play. Pay close attention to where you gather your blocks and THINK TWICE before choosing a cell.

How to play:
- Tap on a cell in the grid to gather same colored blocks. At least three cells of the same color are needed to do this.
- Every block you gather increases the value of that colour.
- Reach 50 for each color to unlock dark blue.
- Reach 150 with dark blue and clear a 3x3 area.
- Challenge your friends! Whoever has the best LOLO strategy will dominate the scoreboard!
- Different game modes, different challenges. Try the ENDLESS MODE to RELAX

Features:
- Easy & intuitive gameplay
- Colorful puzzle game for all ages
- No life limits
- Check out your friends’ scores!
- Worldwide high score rankings
- Nice design and beautiful colors!

Enjoy LOLO!

name: Lord of Bones
summary: Lord of Bones is a classic action - adventure platform game. Your mission is to pass through an unknown place full of monsters, mysterious passages, doors, secret traps, artifacts and spells and defeat the evil Lord of Bones and find your way out.

Break the curse quickly because malevolent islanders lurk in the lush landscape and are dead set on making you their next victim! Find a way to return home before it's too late.

It sounds simply but in fact you'll discover it's really hard because you have to play and solve level puzzles in a full 3D world with many elements which ones of them help you get home and other not.

name: Lost Forest
summary: Experience the beauty of nature and embark on a serene adventure in Lost Forest. Uncover the mysteries, find solace, and immerse yourself in this enchanting world. Are you ready to get lost?

Love Season: Sharing Fantasy
summary: Share the love! See the female main cast having sex with other characters besides the main character. All interactions must have the approval of the player to happen and no one will fall in love with someone else, or cheat on the main character.

summary: The Lord's journey is a strategy-based large-army auto chess game, the great demon lord fell in love with the human princess at first sight, but the evil prince kidnapped the lord's beloved. In order to save the princess, the lord embarked on an expedition!
