summary: Love, Internet, and Murder Magic is a Roguelike game. You will role-play an agent of a streamer who died because of a murder. You are trying to "bring her back" through AI technology on the Internet, making her the unique creation of the Internet.

name: Los Páramos
summary: Los Páramos is an unique experience in which magic and fantasy converge in a mysterious house with secrets to reveal. You will embody Ágata, a young girl who loves to read antique books, in a place far from all civilization.

name: Lost Dungeon
summary: Lost Dungeon is a dungeon exploration game with randomly generated elements, by collecting treasures, matching equipment, to defeat the evil creatures that occupy the depths of the dungeon.

The narrative adds depth, capturing intrigue surrounding Hinode's encounters with potential cousins or impostors.

summary: Sound in the Silence is a horror game where you must find and destroy 10 Totems in a quiet, ominous environment. With each Totem destroyed, more monsters appear and eerie sounds increase, raising the tension. Survive the growing fear and complete your mission before it's too late.

name: Lost Dungeon
summary: You can talk to all NPCs in the dungeon, shop and even kill them. Experience simple planting, forging weapons, refining pharmaceuticals, making food and brewing functions in dungeons. You can also explore the whole dungeon to find the secrets hidden in it, or go to the lost dungeon as an adventurer.

name: Loop Timer
summary: A timer cycle permanently

name: Loot List
summary: Loot List is a thief simulator and action game about robbery. There's one difference though — here, every heist has to have a list.

name: Lost Legend
summary: Embark on an adventure lost in time: a tale of Alchemists being oppressed and trying to figure out what side you are truly on. Dive into Lost Legend and let the story unfold as you journey through the land of Alcomby.

name: Lords of the Void
summary: Lords of the Void is a turn-based strategy game set in a fantasy world on the brink of extinction, shattered by a devastating magical Calamity. Lead your people to victory through tough battles, uncovering unique stories behind each faction.

name: lone.AI
summary: lone.AI is an upcoming space RPG roguelike. With difficult, relentless gameplay, each run has the potential to increase your ship's power, speed, and more. Explore the solar system and find out the secret behind the ZOSMA, an alien race that holds power over the system.

name: Love is Our Specialty!
summary:
You've been working hard at a restaurant to put yourself through high school, but work's not all bad when you’ve got cute coworkers and a good boss! One day though, on your way home from work, you come across a girl that's being bothered by a group of delinquents. You jump in to help, but it looks like she's an expert fighter and barely needs your assistance!

You're definitely surprised by the whole event, but life goes on… Until your boss tells you that a new staff member will be joining your team. It just so happens to be the girl from before! Will you be able to train her? How will it affect your relationship with your childhood friend and coworker? And let's not forget that guy that wants to take over your restaurant…

Who thought working at a restaurant would lead to all these crazy events! But you might just get a nice reward for all your hard work in "Love is Our Specialty!"

name: Loot Box Quest: Mystic Maidens
summary:
The mystic anime maidens are waiting for you.
Don't let them wait for too long.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes in Defiance Battlepack 2
summary: Heroes in Defiance Battle Pack 2 takes you to May 1940, and the Germans launched Fall Gelb (Case Yellow). Scores of German divisions flooded through the Ardennes and across the borders of France, Belgium, and Holland.

name: Looking Glass
summary: A ram finds himself trapped in a room with no memories. How will he get out?

name: Lost in the tomb
summary: An adventurer lost in the crypt of the ancient Egyptian pyramids. He needs to go through many dungeons to get to the surface.

name: Lowpoly Hero
summary: Play as the hero of the story, Hero. In this generic adventure inspired by classic RPG's, take on the role of Hero and save the princess from The Kingdom's many enemies. Completely open-level based intended for level crawlers and casual players alike.

name: Lokam Dating Sim
summary:
In the dawn of time, there was only one thing to look forward to in life: romance. Where did I pull that fact from? Out of my ass, of course- but that isn't the point. The point is- love is pretty fuckin' cool, and has been around for the forevers.

Anyway, since Valentines Day never gets any romance games, why not have a dating sim for this particular day of celebrating said romances? Oh wait, the game wasn't released on Valentine's Day? This ruins everything.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of Nam - Battlepack 1
summary: Heroes of the Nam Battle Pack 1 includes 12 scenarios, bringing to life powerfully armed Squads are at the vanguard of all actions, spurred on by daring Leaders.

name: Lockdown Hero
summary: The perfect video game to play during Lockdown!

summary: Lots of Balls is a crazy new game coming soon!

name: Lords of the Darkreign
summary: Descend into the sunless lands! A three-way civil war ravages the realm, while an enigmatic order tries to conquer all for their draconic master. Take the role of a lord leading an army, and bring triumph to your cause! Annihilate all who defy you, and stand alone beneath the swirling sky!

name: Lords of Time
summary: You are a time traveller and have to find nine objects from different time periods in order to prevent the Time Lords to alter human history.

name: Lost Chapter
summary: In the abyss, she is awakened by the cold. She has nothing to hold on to, as everything is left in the darkness. The girl moves on with a little light, and leaves all the choices to you. Guide her and find her lost self.

name: Long Truck Simulator
summary: Long Truck Simulator is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful long-haul truck.

name: Love+
summary: Love+ is a minimalistic platforming game with a retro aesthetic and a focus on a challenging but not unfair difficulty.

name: Lord Monarch: Tokoton Sentou Densetsu
summary:
Lord Monarch is a 1991 strategy game for the NEC PC-98 by Falcom and the seventh main title in their Dragon Slayer series. Sega Falcom remade it for the Sega Mega Drive in 1994, this time called Lord Monarch: Tokoton Sentou Densetsu. This version was not released outside Japan.

The object is to destroy all the camps and peasants of all the player's rival kingdoms under a strict time limit. Alliances can be formed near the beginning of the game to help the player. However, the alliance is only effective until the enemy alliance is defeated. Then the former allies declare war on each other. Victory through a cunning alliance is impossible because game rules dictate that there can only be one winner at the end of the game; that is why the two former allies need to go to war in order to claim the victory. Peasants have to do engineering tasks as well as military tasks. For example, bridges, monster-filled caves, and fences can be created or destroyed for the purposes of strategy. Peasants may also merge their units to become soldiers and eventually knights when there are enough units in that army.

name: Lords of Magic
summary:
In the fantasy world known as Urak, supporters of eight different religions constantly fight each other. One of them is Balkoth, known as the Lord of Death, who worships the dark deity Golgoth. Balkoth has sworn to destroy all other faiths in the name of his own god. The other lords have to expand their ranks and defend themselves against the mad zealot.

Lords of Magic is a strategy game that combines turn-based exploration and resource management with real-time combat. The player can choose to control any of the lords who oppose Balkoth. Each nation (faith) commanded by a lord has its own specific units. Before engaging in an offensive, the player must liberate a Great Temple for the faith of his/her choice. It is also necessary to build a stronghold, develop the nation's capital city, and recruit troops.

The troops are led by a champion, representing the "hero" of the game. This hero can be either a warrior, a thief, or a mage, possessing the classical advantages and disadvantages of these classes: the warrior is good in close combat, the thief can sabotage enemy armies, and the physically weak mage can cast devastating spells. The isometric combat proceeds in real-time, with an option to simply calculate the result of a battle immediately, depending on the participants' statistics.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes Against the Red Star - Battlepack 1
summary: Heroes Against the Red Star Battlepack 1 includes 10 scenarios from the first probes by Soviet infantry to the ultimate, desperate clash for the Important road and Bridges. This is modern street fighting., in the buildings, on the deck of the tanks.

name: Loopy Particle Simulator
summary: Construct a particle accelerator in this open-ended puzzle game

name: Lost Robot
summary: Lost Robot is an action RPG concerning a robot named DR-32. DR-32 wakes to a distress signal that he must save the princess. He decides to take on the task as he defeats the other sentry robots. A real hack and slash. He continues his search jumping into the nearest portal.

name: Long Long: A Snake Lies in the Past
summary: Go on an epic long adventure puzzle with Long - the ridiculously long and always growing snake.

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Yuina's Secrets
Lost Tomb
summary: A procedural 3D Horror. Can you escape the Lost Tomb?

name: Locked In VR
summary: Locked In VR is an escape room type experience. The player must use his wits and senses to find his way out of the basement and uncover the terrible truth about his imprisonment.

name: Loco Motion
summary: reinvent the wheel

name: Love on the Edge
summary: Orphaned at a young age, you were lucky enough to be taken in by the Faruta crime family and trained in the ways of assassination. But when your compassionate nature stops you from fulfilling your role, you’re suddenly no more than a liability to be traded away…

name: Look At Me
summary: Look At Me is a first-person horror game where you must escape from a haunted house by solving puzzles and facing terrifying paranormal phenomena.

name: Long Story Short
summary: Long Story Short is a funny and erotic adult game about a young man who finally decides to explore life beyond his computer screen. Follow him as he retells his experiences to a mysterious girl. Choose what kind of sexual person he will become. A new world of sexual debauchery awaits you.

name: Loader
summary: Loader is an exciting puzzle game where you place loads on platforms to pass levels.

name: Lost Sector Online
summary: Lost Sector Online is a Free-to-play squad-based, Tactical Strategy MMO Game combining, Turn Based Strategy (TBS) & MMORPG in real time.

name: Lone Wolf Saga
summary: Lone Wolf Saga is a digital implementation of the Lone Wolf gamebook series created by Joe Dever. The digital implementation includes automated random number generation for the combat system, automatic health tracking, as well as inventory tracking and management.

name: Lovecraft's Untold Stories: Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Lovecraft's Untold Stories
Badge
Artbook
Soundtrack
5 Litographs

name: Lounge Lord
summary: Underground DJ sim

name: Long Trip
summary: Long Trip is an action role-playing VR game set in a fantasy world where you can ride mounts, recruit warriors, tame pets, hunt, gather, cook, craft weapons, obtain magic abilities, and even summon ancient mechs or dragons to aid you in battles against bosses.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Zombies the Final Enemy - Battlepack 1
summary: Lock 'n Load Tactical: Zombie The Final Enemy brings Lock 'n Load Tactical system into the world of Zombie horror and a different type of conflict.

name: Love the Guard, Be the King
summary: The Kingdom and its future monarch are in your hands. The choice is yours. Love the Guard or be the king?

name: Loop-Loop DX
summary: Far into the future, a galactic super prison known as "The Prisom" keeps the Galaxy's most dangerous criminals within it's colorfully crystalline walls. Escape this superstructure by blasting down prison staff, other criminals, and even... yourself.

name: Long Time No See
summary: Long Time No See is an Interactive Movie FMV game. You and your friend Ma Zhigao decided to participate in a class reunion and use it as a chance to rob the safe of your rich classmate. But against all expectations, the tranquil villa turned into a closed-off crime scene. You need to make a series of choices in order to survive in various situations as well as uncovering the truth.

name: Lost Elements
summary: Gather your friends and find your way through a magical forest.

name: Lost Key: The Path of Illumination
summary: An ancient order that protects a secret, kept hidden for centuries. An unexpected crime that causes you to be accused of the murder of a friend. Solve the mysteries and puzzles of a story full of esotericism to prove the truth about your innocence and hold the real murderer responsible.

name: Logik
summary: A minimalistic, stylized puzzle game where you have to move the striped block through a maze of cubes, out of the puzzle area. Progress through cute, colorful sections of puzzles as you try to uncover the solutions.

name: Lone Elven Wanderer
summary: Lone Elven Wanderer is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements. You have to go on an incredible adventure through different worlds in search of gold, jewels and fame.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Bitter Harvest - Battlepack 1
summary: Heroes of the Bitter Harvest is a module for the Lock 'n Load Tactical series. It features a fluid, impulse-based turns, squad-level, and individual heroics, plus lots of armor and special rules to bring the fight for the southern steppes of Russia to life.

name: Love Connection
summary:
Love connection is a game about creating paths between two lonely blocks. 
It's a simple colour based puzzler about love and relationships.

name: Love Hina Sim Date RPG
summary:
Practice getting a date with Love Hina characters. Meet girls, talk to them, make them like you. Love Hina Sim Date RPG is based on the popular Japanese animation Love Hina.
Begin by choosing the name for the main protagonist and allocate the available 40 points into age, power, intelligence, and magic levels.
The main goal is to get one Hina girl to fall for you and become your girlfriend and your Valentine’s date. Try to gain as much money and experience as possible.

name: Loot the Land
summary: Fast paced puzzle game where you field your Viking army by connecting soldiers of the same type. PlayStation Mobile launch title.

name: Lovely Heroines
summary: Become the greatest super hero in this visual novel!

name: Loonies 8192
summary: A simple puzzle game where the goal is to match 2x2 blocks of the same color. The sweeper will mark and remove matched blocks, scores are awarded for matching as many blocks as possible per sweep. This game is available for multiple platforms.

name: Lowrez dungeon
summary: Dungeon game inspired by Pixel dungeon for LOWREZJAM

name: Long Car Journey
summary: Traverse the never-ending desert searching for provisions. Look for fuel, fix the engine, pay attention to the battery, change the turbo charger! Explore abandoned buildings, sell the objects you find, check the condition of your car. Collect provisions and hide them at home!

name: Locomotorica: Staggering Ragdoll
summary: You are a machine learning model tasked with driving an active ragdoll in a computer physics simulation. Take manual control of your feet to retain balance, walk, navigate obstacles, and perform various tasks. A challenging game partially inspired by Bennett Foddy's work.

name: Louie Lucha
summary: Body-slams and elbow-drops with a side of guacamole! Battle bizarre opponents using simple one-tap controls as you play energizing mariachi melodies to fuel Louie's rage. The addicting, fast paced gameplay is wrapped in vibrant hand-crafted visuals full of personality. Two different game modes give you multiple ways to progress!

name: Lollipops
summary: A game featured in Action 52.

name: Loop Grow
summary: Loop Grow is an Psychological Horror based in a layer based growing loop of different environments and mysteries.

name: Loopy Tennis
summary: Tennis just got loopy!

name: Lock-On
summary:
Port of the arcade title "Lock-On" DOS and Atari ST.

Lock-On is a 1986 first-person combat flight simulator video game with a futuristic theme. It was developed by Tatsumi and licensed to Data East for US distribution. Its graphics feature scaling sprites and a full-screen rotation effect. The game consists of 20 levels. Gameplay is similar to After Burner: the plane follows a predefined path, but the player can steer it slightly to evade incoming missiles. The player can fire guns and homing missiles, the latter of which requires the eponymous lock-on first.

name: Loot Hunter
summary: Loot Hunter is a fun role-play game from the world full of old ships, pirates and adventures!

name: Lo-Rez
summary: A one level PICO-8 demake of Rez for the Dreamcast by Morgan Quirk.

name: Lord of Ultima
summary: A browser based city building strategy game by EA. Create your own empire and defend it from others!

name: Love Com: Punch de Cont.
summary: Based in the original manga, the player assumes the role of Risa Koizumi as she interacts with other characters. The players choices guide Risa down one of the many available endings.

name: Love Hues!
summary: Love Hues! is a university-based visual novel packed with both character and world secrets. You'll be playing as Skyler (changeable name and pronouns) and navigate your first few months at Falls West University, where you'll meet 5 romanceable - or befriendable! - characters who hide certain truths about themselves and the world around them.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Hell Frozen Over - Battlepack
summary: Hell Frozen Over is an expansion module for Heroes of the Pacific. Play nine scenarios on a unique 22”x34” Map that accurately depicts Attu’s harsh terrain. The terrain varies over eight levels in height and features boot-sticking Muskeg, rock-strewn Rough, precipitous Cliffs.

name: Loop Line
summary: A little train game where you're stuck in a loop.

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 1
summary:
The first season of Love Island: The Game was released in June 10, 2018. New episodes were made available weekly, with the final one being released on August 15, 2018.

A Christmas reunion episode was later released on December 17, 2018.

name: Loverowind
summary: Loverowind is a very short experience about the wind of spring.

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 2
summary:
The second season of Love Island: The Game was released on June 6, 2019. Two episodes were made available weekly up until Day 24 – where only one episode was released per week, with the final one being released on October 8, 2019.

A special wedding episode was later released on February 5, 2020. A spin-off series named "Chelsea's Murder Mystery" was also released in 2021.

name: Lotus Simulator: Module - Streets of Lotus
summary: Streets of Lotus – the streets-module of this simulator unlocks everything that is somehow driving free on wheels.

name: Lord of the Click 2
summary: Orcs,goblins and other evil spirits are getting closer, and very soon they will get so close that it will simply be impossible to get out of the kingdom. The king himself is ready to stop the army of dishonor. It will be difficult to determine how this battle will end if you don't help him!

name: Lonpos
summary: Wiiware game where you try to fit differently shaped pieces into a box.

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess
summary: Fall in love… with a goddess?! In this visual novel divinely beautiful girls will steal your heart!

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Ultimate Edition
Lotte
summary: A minimalistic five-minute puzzle platformer, where you become a fly when you die. Immerse yourself in a relaxing forest and use your ability to become a fly to solve puzzles.

name: Lost Existence
summary: Explore vast, forgotten lands, banishing ancient horrors, in this open-world voxel action-RPG. Create your own uniquely crafted character class. Build custom multiplayer dungeon, PvP, or siege experiences. Run, vault, and leap effortlessly across endless wilderness, or delve deep underground.

name: LoveAndComplex
summary: LoveAndComplex is a simulation game set in college. Like any other simulation game, you can watch all sorts of endings by your choice.

name: Lost Colors: World of Secrets
summary:
In a distant, mysterious world, there lived unusual inhabitants–creatures who wake up every morning and fill the world with smiles and joy, the reason the world is illuminated with bright colors. One day, the cities of this world began to lose their colors, because some dark force stole the paint from the good inhabitants, who fell asleep and couldn’t give the world a colorful smile any longer.
Help the monsters wake up, paint them.

Pluck living plant-machines from the bushes, move them to the flow of paint, turn yourself so that you can correctly build up the direction of the flow of paint toward the monsters. Build a chain of paint flows through the crystals, which you will need in order to begin to paint the residents of the next city.

name: Lonely in the Winter
summary: Embark on the journey of Robbery Cold, a former soldier of the Kingdom of Thaltas, now living as a mercenary since a terrible tragedy struck his life, with his wife dying due to an incurable disease.

name: Lorna
summary: Lorna, a free-willing, live life by the seat of her pants kind of gal, rockets from one side of the galaxy to the other with her faithful robot companion and gets into one misadventure after another. Based on the popular comic book by Alfonso Azpiri.

name: LongCat
summary: LongCat is a puzzle game inspired by the minigame from the Fancade Android game.

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 3
summary:
The third season of Love Island: The Game was released on June 23, 2020. One episode was made available weekly, with the final one being released on September 8, 2020.

A spin-off series named "The Boat Party" was also released.

name: Lovelorn Sanatorium I
summary: This is a role-playing game, the game adopts the expression of dynamic comics. You can play the game by dragging similar to the comics.

name: Locodriver 9
summary: Guess what you get to do for a ninth time in this game? SPOILER ALERT: It's in the title

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Aimi's Secrets
Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Emiko's Secrets
Logic Quest 3D
summary: Logic Quest is an educational game focusing on building thinking and problem solving skills. Solve the existing puzzles or design your own 3D labyrinths full of locked doors, puzzles, and perhaps even a robot or two.

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Tomoe's Secrets
LoveSick Darlings
summary: Make impossible decisions, romance girls, break each others hearts, and form unique bonds through your choices in this immersive game and story! Who will YOU ask out to the end-of-year dance?

name: Lost in the Sand
summary: A slow-paced shooter with strategy elements set in a fully destructible environment. Fight with unique weapons in procedurally generated worlds, build and demolish oil extraction camps, manage and upgrade your army in order to conquer the world. The fight for oil has begun!

name: Loofy
summary: Loofy is a puzzle game. The task of which is to calculate the trajectory of the ball in such a way that it touches each of the green lines.

name: Loot Ultimate Games Bundle
summary: Experience all the strategy, action, and adventure of the LOOT Ultimate Games Bundle! Own the complete collection of LOOT games for Xbox One in this amazing package!

name: Lotus Simulator: Addon - Düsseldorf 1981
summary: Welcome to Dusseldorf! Get yourself seated in a tramway and travel through Dusseldorf and neighboring cities in the year 1981. Includes the Map "Düsseldorf 1981" and various Vehicles!

name: LoveR
summary:
Romance... Record.
A new love is starting.
Summer in senior high school.
An encounter with 6 girls... and love happens.

name: Louisiana Adventure
summary: An adventure game by SilverPlay.

name: Love in an Enchanted Realm
summary: Lost in a magical world where true love is your only escape - form powerful connections, outsmart deadly enemies, and resist the temptation of a dangerous villain who swears you're destined to be his.

name: Loinkham TD
summary: A tower defense game set in the village of Loinkham. Use towers and various interactable objects in the environment to protect your little oinkers and their assests! Each map offers something new to help you with your journey. Unlock new towers and maps as you play.

name: Loco
summary: You control a locomotive and try to collect flags along the way.

name: Lola's ABC Party
summary: ABCs and words to children aged 3-6. Spell words! Memory Games!

name: Love Sucks: Night One
summary: Love Sucks is an adult Visual Novel, in which monster-kind has secretly integrated with humanity. Two monster girls, a vampire and a succubus have chosen you to be their date this Halloween! But their motives go beyond just showing you a good time...

name: Loco Launcher
summary: You're an animal with an appetite for destruction. Use a cannon, vehicle, ride in a giant rock, or simply run through walls to destroy buildings as fast as possible. Have fun in these wacky arcade levels with added abilities that make no sense whatsoever!

name: Lost In Purple
summary: Lost In Purple - Sci-Fi platformer with RPG elements, which tells us the story of a space traveler crashed in deep space. The planet which turned out to be the hero is dangerous for foreigners, almost all its inhabitants aggressively against you configured and ready to attack at any moment.

name: Lost Islands: Legend Pack
summary: Lost Islands - Legend Pack

name: Lovefield General: Back to Work
summary: A visual novel set in a local hospital, in which science and the supernatural collide. Also... romance!

name: Lovecraft's Mythos Run
summary: LLC Blini Games have developed Lovecraft’s Mythos Run, an entertaining free to play 2D action endless runner with pixel art graphics based on their original roguelike multiplatform game, Lovecraft’s Untold Stories.

name: Loco Bonobo
summary: Loco Bonobo is an indie platform shooter with ragdoll physics, gory mayhem and princess rides! Die constantly like you deserve whilst kicking ass as a lobotomized lab monkey slaughtering a never-ending barrage of evil clones!

name: Love Island: The Game - Chelsea's Murder Mystery
summary: Chelsea's Murder Mystery is a spin-off series that takes place after the events of Season 2 of Love Island: The Game.

name: Los Cops
summary: Become a detective in a multi-genre non-linear TV series. Uncover mystery secrets using acting and hot temper. Choose who will be your friend or foe - do everything you can to restore order in Los Angeles.

name: Lost Nova
summary: Your spaceship crashed on an alien planet. Explore, salvage, craft, trade, manage and upgrade your way back home!

name: Lollipop: Summer!
summary: Lollipop: Summer! is an exciting puzzle game with delicious, sweet candy combinations! In the game Lollipop: Summer! You will find many bright and varied visuals, very beautiful music and many achievements.

name: Louloudi Asteri: Save the Solar System
summary: "3D STG with a 2D feel! Join the adventure to save the solar system! Ace pilots Louloudi & Asteri fight a massive virus. Twin-stick controls, sidestep & roll, dodge enemy attacks. Shield-life system for beginners; damage auto-recovers. Normal & Hard routes for all players!"

name: Lovers Anonymous: Rehab for Romantics
summary: Be gay, do crime, and go to therapy!

name: Lost Remnant: Roaches to Riches
summary: A Point & Click Management game of Incomprehensible Entities, Survival and Discovery. Inspired by SCP and Cultist Simulator, with Cosmic Horror elements.

name: Lord Mayor
summary: A strategy game that lets you build cities, solve puzzles and create an empire!

name: Logicats
summary: Logicats is a beginner-friendly programming game. Learn programming concepts through reading code in a fun and effective way. Perfect for classrooms or at home. Start your programming journey today!

name: Love of Magic Book 3: The Return
summary: Love of Magic is an Urban Fantasy Erotic VN/RPG about discovering your destiny, finding true love and becoming a God. Book 3 is the final part of the trilogy.

name: Lost
summary: "Find Your True Self" The circle has fallen from the sky. The circle awoke, and saw the bright stars. The circle admired those stars. Now the circle is about to start a journey to be a star.

name: Lotus Simulator: München Tram
summary: The first add-on for the Lotus Simulator: the Munich Tram. With the tram R2.2b of MVG you can virtually drive through the city centre of Munich and explore the scenery along routes 27 & 28. Detailed reconstructed and perfectly animated. Take control at the driver's seat, let's go.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: For the Emperor - Battlepack
summary: For The Emperor brings the award-winning Lock ’n Load Tactical game system deeper into the Pacific theater with a vengeance. For The Emperor details America’s brawl with Japan during World War 2

name: Love Live! After School Idols
summary:
Love Live! ~After School Idols~ is a visual novel fan game and sequel to
The Chikafag and Chika.

name: Lonath Online
summary: Lonath Online is a classic Top-Down PvP based 3D MMORPG set in a fantasy world! A world where your main goal is to grow, build your home, make friends, fight against the biggest predators, fight against other players, survive and become a legendary warrior!

name: Loot Box Simulator
summary: A satirical look at the current trajectory of the game industry. Open loot boxes, collect loot, equip cosmetics, face off against the dark lord, watch ads, take surveys, and slowly succumb to addiction.

name: Lone Lamp
summary: A point-and-click puzzle adventure

name: Lost Connections
summary: If she leaves now you will never see her again. Would you have enough courage to take a step, or would you stay quiet and regret it? Experience this story about love and loss.

name: Loot Box Achievement Simulator
summary:
Do you love to spend money in order to buy loot boxes that are filled with crappy items? No, of course not!
With Loot Box Achievement Simulator you can open as many achievement packed loot boxes as you want while finishing easy, funny and very questionable click quests.

name: Loose Lips Side: Sunnyday
summary: This is the second installment in the Loose Lips BL suspense series.

name: Love Dots
summary:
It's time to use your brain and find a way to bump the balls!

The rule's easy, just draw lines or shapes to bump the balls, your will need your wisdom and imagination.

You'll surely love this game once you get how it works!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
* You can also enjoy the fun of collecting pens
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!

name: Lost Word of Jenny: Ushinawareta Message
summary: Jenny’s on her way to the theater to practice for an upcoming role. Her script gets stolen though and has to track the pages down in different stages which are entered through the hub world. Once you collect a key and memorize letters and numbers, you go to the theater and use them to unlock the combination lock. Jenny has 2 abilities: punching and kicking, and after picking up powerups, throwing stars and bug spray

name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Hirameku Puzzle Dai-3-gou
Loneliness Butterfly
summary:
Loneliness Butterfly marks the thrilling conclusion of Arachne's Anthology trilogy.

Picking up right after the events of Realm of Lament, this installment introduces Eddy Ruina, Feedra's wife and a lieutenant in Measuryville. Alerted by Penelope's email regarding Thomas's disappearance, Eddy joins the search. Their investigation leads them back to the events of Carnival, where they uncover the existence of the Soul Realm Gate, a potential path to Thomas. But is it truly that simple?

name: Lost In Space: infinite frontier
summary: You are lost in an infinite and threatening space void.

name: LonlyToy
summary: Pass through various obstacles and descend to the next level when you have reached the signpost after crossing all obstacles and mechanisms.You can buy HP at the store. When you end the game due to a trigger mechanism in the middle of the game, you can continue the game from the position before the trigger mechanism by consuming HP instead of restarting.

name: Lone King
summary: Simultaneous-turn-based tactics with a single mech versus a small army. Simple controls, deep gameplay. Play the arcade mode for free or support development by purchasing the story mode. Participate in early access to suggest new modes, gameplay changes, and other content to be added.

name: Lost Secrets: Caribbean Explorer - Secrets of the Sea
London Cab
summary: Imagine yourself as a 19th-century London carriage driver. You must be vigilant, as danger lurks at every corner. Darkness and challenging times make surviving in this world even until the next day difficult. You must be brave and make wise decisions to endure in this gloomy world full of perils.

name: Lost in Bardo
summary:
This is a story about Sam, travelling through the alleys of her mind. From tedious everyday routines to spiritual self-discovery, Sam's world is changing according to her wishes.
The game's main idea has a lot in common with Buddhist philosophy.

name: Lode Runner 2
summary: Lode Runner 2 is a sequel to the original Lode Runner and its remakes. The game is played in isometric view unlike its predecessors.

name: Loihtija
summary: cast some spells to make the way!

name: Lone Leader
summary: Lone Leader is a unique zombie apocalypse survival game. You're only aim in life is to survive. Explore the spine chilling open world map in a quest to survive.

name: Logic Master Detective 2
summary:
The Logic Master Detective is back for another round of logic puzzles, to keep you occupied for hours.
Fun for the whole family.

name: Lonefarm
summary: Lonefarm is a farming and driving simulation game. Harvest a wide variety of crops, care for and feed your animals, decorate your cabin with furniture and drive your old Van all over the island in the middle of the South Pacific.

name: Loftlock
summary:
Loftlock is a point-and-click fantasy puzzle game. You are Runi: a young wizard who is eager to set off for their new apprenticeship. Your beloved grandmother has bequeathed a tome to you that will undoubtedly serve you well in the coming days, but there’s a catch – she’s forgotten the combination to its lock!

Thankfully, she’s left some clues in the attic – all you need to do is find them.

name: Lost Identities
summary: In this mystery-themed adventure game FBI agents Alice Holloway and Derek Chase are sent undercover to the little town of Heart’s Gate. Heart’s Gate became a model neighborhood but problems began to surface. Social workers have seen teen runaways develop a 180-degree shift in their personalities after they returned home.

name: Locodriver 3
summary: A third roll through the Locodriver series.

name: Lost in Nature
summary: As a shipwrecked person, you are stranded on a beautiful and wild island. Collect resources and build structures like campfires and shelters to survive but be cautious - the raw environment is constantly challenging you! Are you ready for the adventure of your life?

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Days of Villainy Battlepack
summary: In March of 2011, Libyans in opposition to Colonel Muammar Gaddafi and his government took up arms. For eight months, the opposition, fighting under an interim governing body, the National Transitional Council (NTC), fought Colonel Gaddafi’s Loyalist forces all across the country.

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Special Edition
Love Obsession VR
summary:
My room. lover's picture. Imagine your sneaky dream through her picture.
she will show you good reactions by my touch.
You want more than this? Collect articles into her house undetected.
Then, your dreams come true.
Meet and feel her right now.

name: Love is a Canvas
summary: After being accused of plagiarism, you thought your career as an artist was over. No matter how much your beautiful artist friend tries to convince you, you just can't get yourself to display your work… But one day, you decide to paint the girl of your dreams on a blank canvas and before you know it… she appears at your door! It seems like everything you paint about her seems to come true! Could you really have brought her life just by painting her? With a new sense of courage, you reenter the gallery scene where you meet an up and coming new artist that encourages you more! But as you paint more and more, you begin to wonder if this girl really is the girl that you painted… Is your true love nothing more than a figment of your imagination? Or could she be more real than you could ever imagine?

name: Loading Story
summary: A short story about loading, I guess. Play as Memu@ as she explores the cyberpunk(ish) little town and interacts with its inhabitants.

name: Loving You Fully
summary: A short, free visual novel about body positivity and learning to love yourself.

name: L.OD
summary:
A 2D exploration adventure.
The main character, Yoi, receives a letter from his dead sister, Chitose, saying that she wants to tell him a secret.
In order to find out the truth, Yoyi heads to an abandoned laboratory.

name: Lost Journey
summary: Game for android and ios.

name: Lobotomy Corporation Wonder Lab Mod
summary: A mod for Lobotomy Corporation that adds new abnormalities and E.G.O from the Official Wonder Lab comic by Project Moon

name: Lord of the Balrogs
summary: Lord of the Balrogs is a text adventure game from 1983. This game is almost like a proto-Diablo without the graphics or the more action-based control method. It features a map which shows your position as you move around the dungeon.

name: Load Shedding
summary: Load Shedding - Bad Dudes have taken over the island and stolen all of the power, it is up to You to stop them!

name: Love in the Crimson Void
summary: Embark on an interstellar odyssey in Love in the Crimson Void. Navigate the treacherous nebula, forge connections and confront the unexpected. Immerse yourself in a captivating narrative, where love and the cosmos collide.

name: Lost Day
summary: At that the day, the world ended. People die left and right. Scream heard everywhere. Yet, this is the beginning of my new life. A life where I could finally found my happiness.

name: Lord of Chaos
summary:
You are an entity of disorder. The flow of time neither concerns nor binds you; you traverse worlds at your leisure, and you exist for only one purpose...To destroy!!!
You are the Lord of Chaos, a being that feeds on destruction, death, and rivers of blood! This is but a glimpse into the existence of the Lord of Chaos, as he appears on the site of a medieval field of battle, to lay waste to either side of the conflict.
The question is...how much destruction can you bring before the Lord gets bored, and moves on?

name: Love Memory Mimic
summary: Isn't she pitiful?

name: Lost Flower
summary: A RPG Maker game by Terrormono.

name: Lore City: Alkahest
summary: Brew death for your friends or die by a vengeful spirit holding you hostage.

name: Long Distance
summary: Gather a friend, a family member or your SO and dive into this cooperative puzzle platformer!

name: Logic Island
summary: Logic Island a logic puzzle game for the original Game Boy. It's inspired by an existing game from a famous Japanese magazine publisher called Nurikabe.

name: Lode Runner Classic
summary: Classic Lode Runner action comes to Windows Phone.

name: Logistical 2: Indonesia - Bundle
summary: Logistical 2: Indonesia spans many islands in a wonderful tropical climate. Build your truck empire to cover the many islands and help the local tourism industries.

name: Lords of Conquest
summary:
The game is based on the board game Borderlands by Eon Productions (best known for their highly acclaimed board game, Cosmic Encounter), and was marketed with the slogan "Better than Risk!" to identify it as a global conquest game similar to Risk. It proved to be one of EA's best-selling titles of 1986. GameSpy awarded Lords of Conquest a "Gotcha" award as one of the top games of its era. 
 
You and your opponent start by selecting countries in turn from a map. This can be randomly generated based on requested numbers of countries and volumes of water, chosen from one of the 19 predefined ones, or created using the built-in editor. 
 
Your army possesses infantry, cavalry and a water fleet. Natural or produced resources such as gold and iron are identified - countries containing these might be the best ones to invade.You can play at 4 skill levels, and decide how big a factor luck is. With calculations settled by the computer, players can concentrate on the power games.

name: Lords of the Black Sun
summary:
Lords of the Black Sun is an epic, complex, dense, turn-based 4X PC strategy game, set in deep space.

Take command of one race to join the struggle for supremacy in the galaxy. As the leader of your empire you are tasked with exploring the stars, colonizing new worlds, managing your empire and conquering whoever dares to oppose you.

The galaxy is full of secrets and dangers: Discover ancient ruins and artifacts, repel or befriend pirates, promote a general to guide your fleets to victory. Concoct complex plots with your allies or use your intelligence services to uncover weak spots on that threatening empire whose leader has vowed to destroy you.

Make sure to keep your population happy or be prepared to face protests against your rule, or in a worst case scenario, rebel factions within your empire.

Only the mightiest rulers can prevail in the depths of space. Are you up to the task of becoming a Lord of the Black Sun?

name: Lottery Winner

name: Locust, U.S.A.

Easy to play, exactly what you need to rest from the dynamics of big games; Level-design with no dead ends, so you don't have to restart any level except if you really want to start anew; Short animated cutscenes with story elements.

name: Lost Isle

To escape, you must uncover the asylum's dark mystery: the shattering secret that led to its condemnation. There are many doors, but there is only one way out.

summary: Puzzle game with numbers. Observe, find and combine clues to open doors. No horror. No storyline. Just Logic!

Call your best friends, come to the Lovely Cat: Dessert Bakery together, make beautiful and delicious desserts, and become a top pastry chef!

name: Look and Find: Elmo on Sesame Street
summary:
This is an interactive games app, which will help teach your child observation and memory skills in a fun and engaging way. 
 
Look and Find Elmo on Sesame Street is a new educational app from the creators of Potty Time with Elmo. In this app, everyone’s favorite furry red monster needs help finding things that go HONK! and BOING! and CLANK! With Elmo as their guide, preschoolers can develop hand-eye coordination while looking for silly things on Sesame Street.

name: Lockes the Thief

In addition to the six charming girls, the chemistry teacher Himari Saiki has been added as a romantic interest. The theme of her route is "experiments in love".

Drop in multiplayer means you never have to wait in lobbies. Plunder the universe with friends to take on tougher foes; then PvP to see who has the best gear!

name: Love! Truth! Puzzle!

name: Lovely Hentai

name: Local Call for Death

name: Lone Tower Roguelite Defense
summary: Lone Tower is an idle tower defense game with a unique twist of Idle and Roguelike features. Lone Tower is inspired by games such as Oregon Trail and The Tower, it is an incremental tower defense game where you control and upgrade a single tower and have to survive as many days as possible. There is farming, card collecting, mining, and plenty of repairs to do in order to survive each day! Defend your tower until its destroyed, earn coins & gems to unlock permanent upgrades, then give it another try! Build the perfect tower for defense against fantasy creatures and foes!

name: Lonely Wolf Treat: The Complete Series
summary: Lonely Wolf Treat: The Complete Series is an RPG Maker game that combines the previously-episodic story of treat into one package! This project is still in development, so only 7 of the 8 chapters are available to play.

summary:
In the great classics, the snake game became a must-have from 1998.
Take a dose of nostalgia and play as the famous loch Ness monster in this snake like!

name: Lost Life: Origins
summary: "Lost Life" is an indie horror project where you have a chance to explore a foggy town full of mysteries. A place where worlds collide ready for you to reveal their secrets.

name: Logistical 3
summary: Logistical 3 is a strategy puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout each country and/or state. The whole game is a huge puzzle while each city is its own little piece of puzzling. Plenty of cities are easy enough plus a bunch of tougher challenges.

name: Lords & Peasants

Start out as a lord of a small village and develop it into a prospering city. Manage your city and rule over the peasants. Forge alliances and intimidate your enemies. Recruit an army and conquer the lands to create your kingdom.

name: Lost Memory of Angel Frane
summary: The first entry in the Frane series of PC action RPGs.

name: Lounge zone
summary: Want to have fun? Gather a group of friends and turn on the game. lounge zone is an experimental game. Roll the dice in turn and complete tasks. The "lounge zone" can be played from two people to infinity. The game has 50 cells with different tasks. Each player in turn rolls the dice.

name: Locksmith Simulator

name: Loop2Loop

name: Lords of Delusia
summary:
Lords of Delusia is a 2D Space RPG / Space Shooter.

It brings elements of a thriving market system, trading, and missions that were popularised in games like Freelancer, and combines this with the random looting, skill point and experience system that exists in many ARPGs.

A rich storyline spanning 5 empires: Delsec, Vipersec, Griffon, Chimera, and Reina with their own galaxy control across 73 solar systems with 500 unique locations to discover.

A combat system reminiscent of the old Arcade bullet hell shooters, combining modern visuals and audio to bring an adrenaline fueled and cinematic experience to the genre.

name: Lost in a Forest
summary: This game is a parody of horror games, rather than running and hiding from the monster you are now able to fight back!

name: Lost in Place
summary: Pilot a delicate little ship through a variety of environments. Collect the coins, compete with friends, and try not to crash!

name: Love wish
summary: Love Wish is an easy, fun and challenging jigsaw puzzle.♪(^∇^*) Put the pieces together to restore the full picture of the girls.

name: Love or Loved
summary: Be Loved, eliminate your competition and claim your right to Valentine

name: Lockdown: Stand Alone
summary: Step inside one of the most atmospheric and challenging VR games to date. Free movement, refined gun mechanics and large city scenes - no wave shooting.

name: Love, Hate and the Mysterious Ocean Tower
summary: A dashing and magnetic genius has invited his closest companion to an eldritch structure, hoping to avert a cataclysm and hiding a terrible secret.

name: Lost in the Dance
summary: Sometimes finding out who you really are can be a pleasant experience, let's hope this is one of those times.

name: Love Tavern 2: Beastmen Kingdoms
summary: After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different staffs from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.

name: Lonely Survivor
summary: Lonely Survivor is an adventure roguelike game. In the game, you can endlessly harvest enemies, upgrade your skills, and defeat the menacing enemy army. Waves of legions are coming, ready for a battle of heroes? Continue to collect the EXP and gold dropped by the enemy to enhance your combat ability. Upgrade equipment and talents to expand your own advantages and create your secret recipe for victory.

name: Looming Darkness
summary: 2D, top-down retro-style game that takes place in a pitch black creepy cave with a dark fantasy setting.

name: LolliPop: The Best Indie Game
summary: LolliPop: The Best Indie Game - the best that could have been made by two indie developers that having no development experience, no time, no money or the desire to work and claws instead of hands.

name: Low Light Combat
summary: A ridiculous new ninja-and-nukes shooter from Wolfire Games, the creators of Receiver.

name: Lost in Memory
summary: You play as a girl who has shut herself in her home and refuses to leave. she must explore and find her memories if she ever wants to escape her past. This game is inspired by Yume nikki and various classic RPG Maker horror games.

name: Loop Drive
summary:
Loop Drive is a simple but challenging driving/racing game where all you have to do is drive in circles, keep your car safe and avoid any crash.
Watch out for other cars, control your speed, avoid crash and earn points for every circle your car does.

name: Lost Valley
summary: Lost Valley is an excellent freeware action-oriented RPG that offers over 25 hours of gameplay, a lot of neat weapons and magic items, and smooth animations.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Pacific - Battlepack 1
summary: Heroes of the Pacific brings the award-winning Lock ’n Load Tactical game system to the Pacific theater with a vengeance. Heroes of the Pacific details America’s brawl with Japan during World War 2

name: Lovely Brides
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Longhaus
summary: Defend your home on a floating island

name: Lost at Sea
summary: Maribel Hearn and Renko Usami go on a date to a supposedly haunted museum ship. This can, of course, only go well. A point-and-click adventure game made in Ren'Py.

name: Love Letter: First Draft
summary: Summer break approaches. With wishes unfulfilled, Danielle strives to find fellow students to attend Romance in Literature with her. If she can't, she may never be able to study Romance and Love at all!

name: Low G Man: The Low Gravity Man
summary: You are the Low Gravity Man! When powered up, you can jump one and three quarters screens high. Capture and use enemy vehicles, including the spider vehicle which can crawl on ceilings. Catch and power up enemy weapons, and much, much more. Your mission is to take back the robot-producing exploration planet from the evil aliens before they reprogram all of the robots for the destruction of the human race. Includes password, infinite continue, and multiple quests for long-term enjoyment!

name: Logistical 2: Suriname - Xmas 2018
summary: Logistical: Suriname - Xmas 2018 is a small add-on module for Logistical 2 that covers a couple of tiny countries on the north end of South America. Suriname is the first module to fully make use of the road upgrading ability. There are many businesses and towns that would be so much easier to do if the roads took bigger trucks.

name: L.O.L. Surprise! Remix: We Rule the World
summary: Explore the themed world of LOL Surprise, move into a new home, meet new friends, complete missions, play mini-games, earn your VIBB ticket, and perform on stage with your favorite LOL Surprise doll!

name: Lovely Kana
summary: Lovely Kana is a PC-9801 inspired visual novel revolving around the life of a humble, overworked office lady.

name: Lonely People Potion Shop
summary: Somewhere deep inside the magical forest forgotten lies a hut, a potion shop! The creatures of the lands near and far come visit this tiny place sharing their stories, feelings, thoughts on the mystery that's about to unravel... And it's your job to pour 'em some potions!

name: Lonely Birds
summary: A puzzler where you reunite separated PEARakeets with their match by clicking on pairs of animals to make them move towards each other. It starts simple but grows challenging quickly over the many available levels, all in a pretty, cozy and cute setting.

name: Love Wish 2
summary: The girls are sealed by magic! Complete the Hexagon Puzzle, this is the only way to gain the power to break the seal. Go! You must rescue them.

name: Loot Keeper
summary:
Are you one of those damn hoarders? Do you loot every single house on your way - as long, of course, as their owners don't see your dirty hands touching the cutlery? Well, this game is for you!

But this time, you don't have unlimited inventory space. Try to fit all your crooked swords, magic shields and useless food items in the little space you have - all that in a randomized dungeon, with enemies out to get you!

What's going to cause you the most trouble - a legendary skeleton mage or your beloved items?

name: Looney Rally
summary: Get behind the wheel of a racing rally car or a truck and go head to head against other rival AI racers in gorgeous locations.

name: Lola's Fruity Sudoku
summary: Lola’s Fruity Sudoku is specially designed for kids ages 4 to 8. Attractive animated instructions help children get into the game easily and they can quickly learn to play even without knowing what Sudoku is.

name: Logic Light
summary: A minimalist puzzle experience to restore the electricity of the houses after a blackout

name: Lola's Math Train
summary: Find out about numbers and shapes! Learn to compare number values!

name: Lost Roads
summary: Lost Roads is a psychological horror game in a world where undecipherable mysteries hide, are you ready to start the game?

name: Lords of Blood: Vampire RPG
summary:
Your mission is to find the magic sarcophagus of the first vampire and use its power. Choose your clan and go to war for the underworld’s throne. Construct your secret city, research new skills and use them in battle. Experience the large singleplayer campaign with its numerous adventures and fight epic battles against vampires, werwolves and demon hunters.

Pass thrilling missions, fight your way from dungeon to dungeon and conquer castles and palaces. Find useful items and enchant them with powerful spells.
Expand your army by recruiting new heroes and train their skills to make them more invincible. Ally yourself with other players’ clans or challenge them in action packed multiplayer battles.

name: Logo Quiz Festival: Guess the Brands
summary: You are trapped in an unknown place. If you want to go back to your world, you will have to overcome the creatures challenges. Will you be able to solve all the quizzes on the first try?

name: Lockdown Town ZX
summary: Drive around Lockdown Town picking up patients and delivering them to the hospital for treatment while avoiding the nasty covidiots. Rinse and repeat! How many lives can you save!

name: Lovers ' Smiles
summary: A developing causal puzzle game for the whole family. Use physics, logic, imagination and ability to draw, to arrange a dream date for the two emoticons in love!

name: Lost in Heart of Chernobyl: Survival
summary: Survive the Shadows, Uncover the Truth.

name: Logistical: Egypt
summary: Logistical expands into Africa with the addition of Egypt. Over 130 New towns to Complete. The annual flooding of the Nile has occurred (Wafaa El-Nil). There is a two weeks holiday for all... except you.

name: Logistical: USA - Hawaii
summary: Logistical expands into North America with the islands of Hawaii Over 100 new towns to complete. Hawaii like what you have been doing down under and would like to use your services. Hawaii is built across a series of four major islands as well as others in between. You will need to start adopting new logistical strategies to do this one.

name: Loot Clicker
summary: Wealth and Loot await in Loot Clicker!

name: Lost Home
summary: Lost Home is a 2D adventure game with a platformer spirit. you'll play as an armadillo and a snake, who'll have to work together in order to find themselves a new home.

name: Lord of Nightmares
summary: Angela Young loses her cat Felix in a dream world where the Lord of Nightmares rules. With the help of a mysterious wizard she sets out to find Felix and stop the evil Lord. Help Angela navigate her own dreamscapes in this fantastical Hidden Object adventure.

name: Loneliest Depths
summary:
What mysteries await beneath the oceans surface?

Step inside your diving bell and venture into the deepest depths of the Bitter Maw Trench, encountering a vast array of dazzling ocean life and documenting your discoveries!

Press the central switch to engage the diving bell’s viewing lantern, providing high voltage florescent light to even the lowest depths of the ocean floor.

name: Look Find Find
summary: "Look Find Find" is a cartoon style casual game. Players need to find the corresponding props in the scene according to the prompts.

name: Love Hina 2: Kotoba wa Konayuki no You ni
summary:
The Winter has begun in Hinata. X-mas is coming up. There are rumors about this special christmas eve: If someone is going to confess his love on this christmas eve, any wish will come true. Keitaro decides to confess his love to Naru. But he isn't the only one confessing on this christmas eve...

Link up with your PocketStation and gather all the words to win the heart of your love!

name: Logistical 2
summary: LOGistICAL 2 is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the state or country. Thousands of towns and thousands of businesses to complete across the world. Many free sub-modules to get you started.

name: Lostgamer
summary: Lostgamer tests your gaming geography skills. Dropped into a gaming world, you must use your surroundings to locate your position and get a high score!

name: Lockstone Mountains
summary: Wake up in the world of Lockstone Mountains as the main Pilot of the Rook expedition. Explore the world, complete quests and gather materials to research new technologies, ships and weapons. Powerful enemies and intriguing mysteries await in the Lockstone Mountains.

name: Lost Within
summary:
A city in ruins, hell on earth: Seph Garrett is a police officer running away from certain death. He will find himself trapped inside lost within his own city...alone, wounded. Searching for help he will find someone else alive: they are close and distant at the same time, but they will need to work togheter to survive.

Lost Within is a RPG/Survival Horror/Stealth hybrid made with RPG Maker VX, coming soon on PC.

name: Logistical: Europe
summary:
Logistical spans across Europe. This Bundle Contains:

- Logistical
- Logistical: The Netherlands
- Logistical: Germany
- Logistical: British Isles
- Logistical: Italy
- Logistical: Norway
- Logistical: Russia
- Logistical: Switzerland
- Logistical 2: Belgium
- Logistical 2: France

name: Lords of War
summary: Lords Of War is a fast-paced strategic card game that supports real-time PvP battles. Although game design may resemble turn-based TCG/CCG games, game mechanics is more like a real-time 3D card-based roleplaying game – this combination provides an entirely new gaming experience.

name: Lone Wolf
summary: A third-person exploration game placed inside of an eye-catching stylized forest. Players control a stunning wolf who was born without a pack and is trying to find a place where he fits in. Along the way, players encounter other animals and secrets which will lead you to uncover your true self.

name: Lost:Smile Memories
summary: "A lost thing and living love ADV" set on the stage of Okinawa appears on Steam. Midsummer Island, heroines, and the only truth you will arrive.

name: Looper
summary: Escape the dungeon using the Looper — a cutting-edge technology that lets you fold the space itself.

name: Lode Runner
summary:
A remake of the 1984 classic arcade puzzle game with the same name.
You're a highly trained Galactic Commando, deep in enemy territory.
Your mission: to recover a fortune in gold, stolen from the Bungeling people by their power-hungry leaders.
You'll be running, jumping, and climbing heroically, solving perplexing puzzles.
With your laser pistol, you'll drill passageways through stone floors and barriers.
To get through this mission alive, you'll need more than fleet feet and good looks.
You'll need your quick wits and brains. And more than just a little luck.

name: Lore Masters: Video Games
summary:
Lore Masters: Video Games, the ultimate trivia challenge for gamers. Dive into a vast collection of over 30 000 questions and adding daily to test your ability to identify images from games.

In the ranked game mode, all players face the same set of 15 questions in the exact same order. This ensures a fair and consistent challenge, allowing players to truly test their knowledge and compete on an even playing field.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Bear and the Jackal - Battlepack
summary: Nine fierce firefights from the Soviet-Afghan War. Grab an RPG-7 and find a rocky place to hide behind: there’s a Soviet convoy coming down the road!

name: Lost Gray
summary: Recover all 9 gems scattered throughout the stages, each gem you manage to get a new skill to help you, always remember to come back between stages.

name: Logistical 2: Vampires - Bundle
summary: This Logistical 2: Vampires has over 1000 towns and 16,000 businesses to complete PLUS there are Vampires. Vampires are slowly taking over the country. Provide resources for the towns people to help push back the vampires to where they belong within Romania.

name: Love Letter From Thief X
summary:
In Love Letter From Thief X, an otome visual novel for the Android and iOS platforms you play as a curator for a museum. One day the museum you work for is broken in to, but why are they looking for your fingerprints?

Available in the Love 365 app and as a standalone on the Nintendo Switch store.

name: LogiCally
summary: Test your skills in this challenging game of logic, observation and mental calculation. Solve problems of increasing difficulty and exceed your limits. How far can you get?

name: London Underground Simulator - World of Subways Vol.3
summary:
World of Subways" is our series of the most interesting Subway and Underground routes of the world for the PC. After the releases of New York and Berlin we are now proud to introduce Vol.3 - London Underground. This simulation covers the entire Circle Line in its current operational service which includes the new section to Hammersmith. This line offers a length of 27km with 35 stations, many hours of fun and interesting missions. 
 
The Circle Line is an underground service of the London Underground circling the center of London. It was first described as such in 1949 and already appeared on the 1947 Underground Map. It had not been built as a separate line, but was merged from different sections of the Metropolitan Line and the District Line. Only two short sections of this line are solely used by the Circle line. These sections are the connecting curves between the stations of High Street Kensington and Gloucester Road and between Aldgate and Tower Hill.

name: Lootbox Gungeon
summary: Become a space cowboy.

name: Lode Runner 1
summary: Lode Runner 1 is a remake of the original NES game, with the same mechanic, bur brand new 2d graphics (not to be mistaken by Lode Runner Legacy)

name: Lovely Kitchen
summary: Lovely Kitchen is a 2D arcade game filled with donuts, pizzas and pies. Jumping from donuts and avoiding all clever traps, reach the final goal and wake up the cook.

name: LoveR Kiss
summary: The “R” in LoveR stands for “Romance” and “Record.” Players will develop their love with six girl characters designed by Taro Mino and take pictures of their memories. In addition to the six charming girls, the chemistry teacher Himari Saiki has been added as a romantic interest. The theme of her route is "experiments in love".

name: Love Room VR
summary: 'Love Room VR' is a simulation game of physical contact with a cute girl. Please have a fun time with Nozomi Tachibana.

name: Lockdown 2024
summary: A modern day point-n-click adventure game about a guy who spends a year with seven women locked down in a house due to COVID.

name: Location Withheld
summary: Location Withheld is a short, horror adventure game in which you find yourself in an unfamiliar office. You rumage through files and inspect objects in order to slowly uncover the mystery behind various unusual deaths.

name: Loftus and the Sky Cap
summary: Inessa is woken by the smell of smoke. She races down the stair case to discover the workshop torched and no trace of her Master Loftus. The townsfolk are convinced that a dragon must be responsible or that the crazy inventor must simply have blown himself up- but Inessa believes otherwise.

name: Love Story
summary: ØSTORY (Love Story) is a full-motion video adventure about a dead man after a motorcycle accident. Then appears the Japanese Angel of Love, who gives them a second chance, so long as Rina falls in love with them in 6 days. Developed by General Entertainment and published by Enix in 2000.

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 8
summary: The eighth season (also known as Tempting Fate) of Love Island: The Game was released on February 14, 2024. A new volume will be released every Wednesday.

name: Lost Cat
summary: "Lost Cat" is a single-player, adorable, healing, adventure game. Try to collect enough fish while avoiding traps and monsters, and use your wits to clear the levels.

name: Lost In Woods 2
summary: You wake up in woods unknown to you. No people nearby, no car, no telephone. You are completely alone. You need to get out of the forest alive.

name: Love Me Forever
summary: Love Me Forever is a Puzzle, Exploration RPG with dark humor and profanity. You slip into the role of a young firefighter, that saves the life of an excessive, clingy girl. Following up in a cute, insane relationship together that will last forever... according to her.

name: Lost in Time
summary:
Recent discoveries allow people to travel back in time with the use of a simple instrument worn on the wrist that generates an intense magnetic field. Time travel is a privilege and is limited to a few trusted people. The inevitable consequences od such an extraordinary discovery lead to the creation of the Committee for Temporal Ethics. Only Observation of the past is authorized. Any other sort of intervention is forbidden because of the danger involved.

The main character of this adventure game is Doralice Prunelier who is 27 years old woman living in year 1992. She works as a ship's captain in her age, however in a certain circumstances, she is forced to travel through time uncovering a time-traveling agents from the future.

name: Lost Hammer
summary: Lost Hammer - This is a 3D adventure with puzzle elements and first person view. You have to take on the role of a city dweller who dreams of becoming a blacksmith's apprentice.

name: Lords and Villeins
summary: Build and grow your settlement in a city-building simulation of medieval society.

name: Lockheed Martin: Prepar3D
summary: Lockheed Martin: Prepar3D is a simulation software game.

name: Logic Machines
summary: Set forth on a quest to become a puzzle master! Use your keen sense of logic and the Laws of Physics to solve brain teasing puzzles.

name: Lore
summary: Lore is a stealth horror game about finding your missing grandfather while avoiding a mysterious man hunting you in the woods. Try to outsmart and avoid an adaptive AI and save your grandfather from wherever he is hiding.

name: Lovin House
summary: 【互动漫画】 小屋的故事就像是一部互动漫画绘本，各种漫画小互动，每一个画面都是精心绘制的细节，和小屋成员一起体验故事里的心动瞬间，生活中的细腻，以及旅行中的风景... ... 【小屋故事】 这是一个关于“6个完全不同的年轻人，聚集在一个share-house里，遵守着特殊的房屋生活准则一起成长”的故事。 【小屋成员】 木子，是一个温柔可爱，对生活的充满了美好向往的摄影师，还有活泼鬼点子多的策划师左左、成熟稳重的金融女拉拉、欢乐逗比的音乐人路遥、温柔偶尔腹黑的料理师白泽、傲娇豪爽的互联网公司CEO卓子瑜。

name: Lot Lot
summary: Manipulate the balls so they fall into the pits for points. Get enough points and you will move on to the next round.

name: Lofi: A Year to Fulfill my Dream.mp3
summary: This is a story about a young woman who thinks and chases her dreams bravely under the pressure of reality and family. In order to prove that she has the ability to support herself with music as a career, Lu must show her strength by winning the annual award of the streaming platform.

name: Lost In Dungeon
summary: Lost In Dungeon is a randomly generated action shooter with Rogue-like elements. Players will find bizarre treasures, Upgrade weapons and fight off droves of mysterious creatures.

name: Lost in Transit
summary: Lost in Transit is a unique blend of the classic Asteroids and modern bullet-hell games. As a space-traveling mailman, fight your way through dozens of levels to deliver the final package in your route.

name: Love and Conspiracy
summary: You are the former princess of the Kingdom of Elbert. The Path to Azul Incident seven years ago was the cause of your kingdom's destruction.

name: London Control
summary: Simulator of UK Area Air Traffic Control.

name: Locked-in syndrome
summary: Syndrome " locked man" (a syndrome of isolation syndrome of deafferentation )

name: Loot, Steal 'n Destroy
summary: Loot, Steal 'n Destroy is an XNA community game available over Xbox Live Marketplace. It is a local multiplayer only game featuring 2-4 pirates in a race to collect gold.

name: Look Closer!
summary: Look Closer! is a single-player horror surveillance game. Monitor haunted locations through cameras, spotting and reporting anomalies like moving objects and sudden intruders. Sharp observation skills are essential to survive the eerie challenges.

name: Lost on the Island
summary: Your dream holidays have never been so instantly accessible. We invite you on unique immersive vacation experience to enjoy the breathtaking views, swimming with dolphins, teleporting and jumping from beautiful cliffs and diving in a deep water around corals and colorful fish.

name: Lofi Ball: Dessert
summary: This DLC contains 2 skins (Donut) (Wreath), and 10 new levels (Dessert)

name: Lone Hero Path
summary: The idle game is mainly about improving skills and equipment. You will meet pets and people with the same path, communicate with them, discover various strange equipment and items, and collect various skills.

name: Look, Your Loot!
summary: An involving card game with bits of magic and simple rules. You've got 9 cards with the one representing your brave hero, which you move one step left or right, or up, or down. The hero is to go through dungeons, unlock chests, drink elixir, collect coins, cast fireballs, avoid spiked traps, defeat bosses. Break into a number of leaderboards!

name: Lovely Girl Puzzle
summary: Easy relaxing puzzle. Lovely girls are waiting for you!

name: Lost Lagoon: The Trail of Destiny
summary: A turbulent balloon ride across the ocean crash-lands you on a strange island. Stranger now because the accident wiped your memory clean and there are no answers to any questions. A map slightly jolts your mind with the thought that you are meant to be here, but where exactly are you and where is everybody else? Only by trekking through the landscape of this island can you figure out why you are here, and why you have placed yourself in such a dire circumstance. Search the island coasts and interior to recover your memory. Investigate an ancient temple, a sunken ship, and gloomy catacombs to find answers. Uncover helpful items, solve intriguing puzzles, and capture images within stunning locations. Each clue brings you closer to unveiling all of the truths, and perhaps your ultimate destiny.

name: Loco Mogul
summary: In Loco Mogul you play a seasoned railroader turned entrepreneur as you attempt to build a railroad empire. Search for hidden towns, mines and other customers in your territory then build a fully functional railroad, complete with train stations, junctions, bridges, and mountain tunnels. After you've built your railroad lines you get to run your trains and maximize profits by delivering materials to their destinations before your fuel runs out.

name: Loop
summary: Welcome to Loop. Loop is a first-person comedy game based around completing laps around a test track. What will happen to you in the Loop?

name: Lost Oddies
summary:
Help the Oddies get home by puzzling them towards their symbol.
But be aware, Oddies of the same color will always follow one another!
If you move one green Oddie to the left, all other green Oddies will also move to the left!
This makes Lost Oddies a simple, yet brain twisting puzzle with 6 different Oddie behaviors and many interactive elements to use!

name: Lord of Vermilion IV
summary: The fourth entry on the digital card battle experience for arcades.

name: Los Rostros del Bosque
summary: A metroidvania where you draw constellations on the screen to put on animal masks that unlock different abilities, set in a magical Latin American forest.

name: Low Fast
summary: Short game with 4 minigames, your mission is to complete them all without time running out!

name: Lotia
summary: Dreamer Reef O’Meara and his crew on the Surprise journey across Lotia, trying to avoid entanglements with the dreaded Dominion who rule the seas. The nature of their latest enterprise embroils them in a desperate conflict, one whose outcome will determine the fate of all who dwell in Lotia.

name: Lost in the Static
summary: Lost in the Static is a simple little game that uses some surprising aspects of the human perceptual system to create a visible world out of animating static.

name: Lost jumping frog
summary: One day the frog went out and lost his way. Help the frog to return home.

name: Logistical 2: Belgium
summary: Logistical 2: Belgium is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country. Over 550 towns and 11,000 mailboxes to complete including cities like Brussels, Antwerp, Ghent, Charleroi and many, many more.

name: Logistical 2: Indonesia
summary: Logistical 2: Indonesia spans many islands in a wonderful tropical climate. Build your truck empire to cover the many islands and help the local tourism industries.

name: Logistical 2: France
summary: Figure out and schedule cargo deliveries across the country of France to solve the logistical problems. Includes cities like Paris, Marseille, Lyon, Toulouse and many, many more. Over 3000 towns and many logistical puzzles to solve.

name: Loadstar: The Legend of Tully Bodine
summary: Loadstar is a rail-shooter concerned with shooting enemies while navigating your ship, much like Sewer Shark. You're actually on rails in this game, as you travel in a truck/train called Loadstar along a magnetic rail network covering the moon. Shifting the cursor to the edge of the screen changes to a different track when available, with incorrect turns either killing you instantly or moving you off-course from the level end. Direction indicators and distant landmarks help keep you driving in the right direction, while accidents, track closures, and robot cops work to keep you from it. Your weapons "tag" enemies and force them to explode, or can tag incoming shots and deflect them with a separate shield button.

name: Logistical: Russia
summary: Logistical: Russia is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country. Over 1000 towns to complete including Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Siberia and many, many more.

name: Logistical: South Africa
summary: Logistical: South Africa is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country. Over 100 towns to complete including Johannesburg, Cape Town and Port Elizabeth and many, many more.

name: Logistical: United Kingdom
summary: Logistical is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country. LOGistICAL: United Kingdom covers England.

name: Logistical: The Lot
summary: Logistical: The Lot gives you access to all the modules created for LOGistICAL, including the base game.

name: Logistical: ABC Islands
summary: Logistical: ABC Islands is a introductory Logistical module to a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the countries. Many towns to complete across the islands of Aruba, Bonaire and Curacao.

name: Logistical: Germany
summary: Over 2600 New towns to Complete. A Large Chemical Spill in the Stuttgart region has created chaos. A full quarantine of ALL products in and out of the Stuttgart region has been put into place. Over 100 towns are within the affected zone. We can get you into the area so you can fix the towns within the zone, and you can move your empty trucks in and out. Small industries have been setup for each type of product within the zone.

name: Logistical: Chile
summary: Logistical: Chile is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country with over 100 towns to Complete.

name: Logistical: Italy
summary: Logistical: Italy expands the core Logistical experience with over 1,400 towns to complete and a wide range of new puzzles and challenges. The game covers mainland Italy as well as the islands of Sicily and Sardinia. Players must navigate new obstacles and complete a variety of delivery tasks across an extended map.

name: Logistical 2: Vampires
summary: This Logistical 2: Vampires has over 100 towns and 5,000 businesses to complete PLUS there are Vampires. Vampires are slowly taking over the country. Provide resources for the towns people to help push back the vampires to where they belong within Romania.

name: Logistical: British Isles
summary:
Logistical: British Isles brings you all the fun and puzzling of LOGistICAL with even more towns, more puzzles and much more to do.

Over 2000 towns to Complete.
Logistical: British Isles game covers England, Scotland, Wales, Northern and Southern Ireland, the Isle of Man, the Bailiwick of Jersey and the Bailiwick of Guernsey.
There are many new obstacles and deliveries to make.

name: Logistical: Caribbean
summary: Logistical: Caribbean is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the countries. Over 1000 towns to complete across the islands of the Caribbean covering 26 different countries.

name: Locked & Loaded
