summary: Locked & Loaded is an advanced gun simulation game but also has realistic sandbox environments to play in, like fighting off a zombie horde or clearing an old abandoned building of terrorists who want to Nuke a nearby town.

name: Logistical 2: USA - Nevada
summary: Figure out and schedule cargo deliveries across the state of Nevada, USA to solve the logistical problems. Includes cities like Las Vega, Reno, Carson City, Death Valley and many, many more. Over 100 towns, 5,000 businesses and mini-games to play.

name: Loved
summary: Platformer game playable on Browser developed by Alex Ocias.

name: Log.in
summary: This game is a short surreal exploration game inspired by Yume Nikki.

name: Lost Manor
summary: Unravel the chilling secrets of a desolate manor in Lost Manor, a suspenseful horror adventure game. Venture into the decaying heart of a rural estate, shrouded in a veil of mystery and rumored to harbor unspeakable horrors.

name: Loop: ClassRoom
summary: Every school has some terrifying rumors, and you certainly don't want to be a part of these rumors.

name: Love Bites
summary: Twelve dropdead gorgeous creatures that are hungry driven by animal instinct with only one desire, to quench their thrist.

name: Lost in Abyss
summary: Lost in Abyss is a first-person VR horror game about a man trapped in a twisted and terrifying dream. Warm memories and terrible realities are intertwined and tragedy unfolds as you explore a long-forgotten nightmare.

name: Lonecastle
summary: Lonecastle is a top-down shooter where the player attempts to survive countless enemies. Defend your little castle from the incessant waves of enemy ships and soldiers. Collect gold and gain experience to improve your castle.

name: Love and Job! Otona no Jijou
summary: An otome game aimed to women aged 30 and older. The protagonist is supported by her three female friends during her job and romance troubles.

name: Loop: A Tranquil Puzzle Game
summary:
Loop is a tranquil puzzle game, with a unique, simple, meditative feel.

Inspired by Zen philosophy, the minimal UI has no timers, move limit or score; allowing you to just relax and focus.

Includes over 1 Billion Levels and a colour blind mode.

name: Lost Tribe
summary: Go on a dangerous journey to save your tribe! An unknown foe has turned the once peaceful island into chaos. With the help of an ancient guardian, you must uncover secrets, gain new abilities, and restore peace.

name: Lovebugz: An Anthro Insect Dating Sim
summary: A point and click visual novel about bug girls.

name: Lords of Uberdark
summary: Lords of Uberdark is a game about organically reshaping the earth using voxels. It is still very early in development.

name: Lost Mastery
summary: Roguelike deckbuilding meets memory gameplay. Embark on an adventure in Lost Mastery, a unique blend of card battles, memory gameplay and strategy. Collect powerful cards, battle mysterious enemies and uncover hidden secrets. Can you master the game?

name: Lock Parsing 2
summary: Simulator of opening the lock, where you are tasked to find the right combination that will help to open the lock as quickly as possible.

name: Lofi Hollow
summary: A moddable ASCII semi-casual life simulator with permadeath options and multiplayer.

name: Loot Train
summary: Loot Train is a procedurally generated game where you take control of a hooded thief, that has a will bent on robbery, in a train full of valuables. Progress through train cars to defeat colorful enemies, and weird bosses summoned by the Guild of Righteous Protectors, to stop your genocide!

name: Lodoss-tou Senki: Eiyuu Kishiden GB
summary: A boardgame for Game Boy Color based on the Record of Lodoss War series.

name: Lorena and the Land of Ruins
summary: Lorena and the Land of Ruins is a third-person 3D platform shooter in which you explore a beautiful fantasy world filled with many mysteries and ruins of the past!

name: Love Letter
summary:
Your mail carrier is new in your neighborhood and they look friendly !

But... They also seem to be hiding something...

name: Lost Flame
summary: Lost Flame is a modern roguelike game featuring unique and challenging turn-based combat. Explore the ruined kingdom of Hiraeth, discover its history or ignore it and focus on the gameplay itself.

name: Love Puzzle
summary: This is casual, intellectual, minimalist puzzle game. Control your square and find the way to pass the level. Gameplay is fun and relaxing.

name: Lost in Translation
summary: A reflection on language as a source of cultural identity and how to regain it

name: Locked
summary: Locked in a deadly cat-and-mouse with a relentless serial killer, you must outsmart, escape, and survive in this intense 2D horror experience. Solve chilling puzzles, and stay one step ahead of a relentless pursuer. Inspired by PS1-PS2 classics and iconic horror films.

name: Lottery Simulator
summary: Lottery Simulator is a realistic simulation of the lottery intended as satire.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of Grenada
summary: 'Heroes of Grenada' brings to life this conflict with US Marines, Rangers, and SEALs supported by AC-130Hs face off against the Grenadian military and Cuban troops

name: Looney Tunes: Carrot Crazy
summary: Coming home after a long day at work, Bugs and Lola find their garden ransacked and all of their carrots stolen. Now the two must explore the Warner Bros. Lot to discover the identity of the carrot thief. You guide the bunnies through five worlds, collecting carrots that will allow the characters use special powers like the ability to walk on thin air and using their ears as a helicopter propeller. The two can also collect Super Carrots that will allow them to use their powers longer and Habanero Carrots that make them invincible. The player must switch between the Bugs and Lola to solve puzzles with each character's special skills. Try to find the carrot thief in Looney Tunes: Carrot Crazy.

name: Lords and Peasents
summary: Lords & Peasants is a medieval real-time strategy and city building game developed by Inverted Cat Games. It has both single and multiplayer modes with up to 16 Players. Start out as a lord of a small village and develop it into a prospering city. Manage your city and rule over the peasants. Forge alliances and intimidate your enemies. Recruit an army and conquer the lands to create your kingdom.

name: Long Journey
summary: Long journey - Many people know that a large amount of sweets is bad for teeth .. But not for this skeleton! Embark on a long adventure with this skinny sweet tooth and collect all the donuts!

name: Locked Up
summary: Together with Snezhana and her dog Ayda you will go to the woods for mushroom hunting. An ordinary adventure does not foreshadow adversity, until you decide to step into an uncharted plase… A short but atmospheric visual novel that will give you goosebumps.

name: Love Chronicles: A Winter's Spell - Collector's Edition
summary: A dark wizard awakens the ice queen using your daughter!

name: Lost King's Lullaby
summary: Lost King's Lullaby is a roguelike game with RPG elements. We will venture forth with Kiara in a Celtic adventure, exploring different maze-like procedurally generated worlds. We will face enemies in frenetic battles where we will have to make use of our reflexes and choose between different abilities to beat the menacing creatures.

name: Lost World
summary: This is a very big outdoors map containing various locations such as some temples, caves, volcano, cementery, colisseum... The map focuses on two concepts: exploration and intense action. There are no puzzles or thinking, just find the keys and make it to the end while exploring the different locations of the map.

name: LocoPets
summary: The ultimate team-builder roguelike. Assemble a team of powerful LocoPets, collect game-breaking Charms, and unleash outrageous synergies to defend Tonto Kingdom.

name: Lost Eve
summary: Lost EVE is a dark, atmospheric puzzle-platformer, the story of which unfolds in a post-apocalyptic future about 3 thousand years after a nuclear war.

name: Long Z-Night
summary: Long night, only you and bloodthirsty zombies. You will have to make every effort to survive. And for this you need to kill a lot of zombies. Very, very many zombies ...

name: Lost Direction
summary:
Explore an truly infinite space of pure discovery and full of secrets, find things not meant for your eyes, discover places no one else has, and truly lose direction, all whilst being completely and utterly alone...

Or are you?

name: Lowlander II: Lowerlander
summary: Yarak means business. She ain't got time for you! Get that armor on- there's adventuring to be done!

name: Love or Passion
summary: This interactive story love game will have you hooked up on reading! Great news for story lovers! The best romance story love game is finally out. Don’t miss your chance to download it and enjoy reading captivating chapters of Love or Passion - Love Game Romance Teen Story Game.

name: Lost Island of Jungata
summary: This is a 7 map episode for Doom 2 for use with GZDoom that features several new weapons, new enemies, new textures and new music. This wad is very loosely based on an island Lizardcommando made for an unreleased RPG Maker 2003 game and a really old unreleased Doom 2 map from many years ago. Also loosely based on their "Make a Good Mega Man Level 3" submission called Lost Caverns of Jungata.

name: Love Spell: The Starlight Update
summary:
Complete remaster of the original game in a new engine with overhauled graphics, new music, new content, and more!

After saving the life of a mysterious old woman, a young girl is gifted a magical spell book with the power to make anyone whose name she writes inside of it fall madly in love with her until the next full moon. "Love Spell" is a romantic-comedy otome game full of magic, laughs & cute penguins!

name: Lost Cats
summary: Lost Cats is a 4 vs 1 online horror game, play with or against your friends and randoms! Collect perks and cats to dominate the game! Build your own sets, be creative! Have Fun!

name: Lost Amulets: Four Guardians
summary: A unique combo of hidden object games, tile-matching puzzles and challenging mini-games!

name: Lost & Found
summary: Lost & Found is a short horror game.

name: Long Tail
summary: Long Tail is a combination of classic snake game with puzzle game based on route planning. Find the best way to collect all coins scattered on the board. Bounce from your own tail, avoid spikes, use portals... No time pressure or failure punishments - anytime you can undo any move!

name: Loot'N Shoot
summary:
In a world driven by automation, you jump into one of many warehouse robots that experience a malfunction and start fighting each other with everything they can find. 
The objective of this fast-paced game is to defeat all enemies in multiple themed warehouses before they can defeat you.

name: London-Faversham High Speed
summary: London-Faversham High Speed brings together the exhilaration of high speed trains with the more serene ‘classic’ third rail lines of Kent all in one route, complete with the streamlined Southeastern Class 395.

name: Long Nose Dog
summary: A game about the long nose borzoi dog. Be the best of all dogs and grow your nose far and beyond. Long Nose Dog is an endless running game where you play as a borzoi and stretch your nose through an amazing adventure. Eat all the chips and unlock your favorite dog. How long is your nose?

name: Loot Box Simulator: Heroes of the Dark Age
summary:
Be rich for once and buy all the loot boxes.
Earn gold and spend it on awesome loot boxes filled with amazing pictures of anime girls. It's simple, yet addicting.

name: Lovely Island
summary: Romantic story about the adventures of the main character and four girls on a deserted island in the nearest future. Will you solve the riddle of the island? Will you get romance with one of the beautiful girls?

name: Lost Star
summary:
On a snowy night, a witch loses her way home and meets someone new.

Work together as a witch and her cat from space to overcome obstacles and find a way home in this challenging single-player platformer. Summon your familiar and swap places with it to reach new heights, use your broom to soar across chasms, and combine the two for acrobatic action and puzzle solving.

Includes adjustable gameplay speed. Slow things down if you want more time to think with each jump, or speed it up for an extra-fast-paced challenge.

name: Logistical: Switzerland
summary: Logistical: Switzerland is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country. Over 1000 towns to complete including cities like Zurich, Geneva, Basel, Bern, Lucerne and many, many more.

name: Lockjaw
summary: Lockjaw is a party brawler where robots use interchangeable arm, leg, and head parts to knock each other around to win a robo-royale! Play with up to four players locally or over Steam Remote Play Together.

name: Lost Luggage
summary: This Kaboom!-clone takes place in an airport. Instead of catching bombs before they hit the ground you have to catch suitacses which are thrown from a luggage carrousel gone haywire. The games becomes progressively harder as more and more suitcases are hurled towards the ground. In addition to that you can chose between two difficulty levels which let you control one or two baggage handlers. You should also watch out for suitcases containing bombs - failing to catch those results in instant death.

name: Loco Dojo Unleashed
summary: Enter the whimsical wooden world of Loco Dojo & step up to Grand Sensei’s 'Table of Trials' to pit your silliest skills against (up to) 3 friends or strangers in this hilariously competitive multiplayer party game

name: Lords of the Fallen: Collector's Edition
summary: Lords of the Fallen is a challenging Action RPG set in a medieval fantasy world ruled by a Fallen God. Fighting against the formidable Lords and Generals that command his demonic army is the main feature of the game. Lords of the Fallen rewards skill and persistence among dedicated Action RPG fans. Included in this Collector's Edition is a Handcrafted 8" Polystone Bust, Hardcover Art book, Official Soundtrack, Cloth Map, Digital Content (The Monk's Decipher, Lion heart Park, Demonic Weapons) all packaged in a Collector's Box.

name: Logistics Expert
summary: Logistics Expert – a modern simulator for managing a logistics company and heavy equipment with realistic physics!

name: Lost In Space: The Adventure Game
summary: "Danger! Danger!" Play as Will Robinson, Dr. Smith and Robot in this 3D, point & click adventure game based on the TV show: Lost in Space. Explore treacherous environments, outwit classic Villains and solve countless puzzles and mysteries to rescue your fellow crew members of the Jupiter 2.

name: Love Amidst the Timeless Rift
summary:
Embark on a captivating journey with this short fantasy Boys' Love visual novel.

Time has frozen for everyone except our hero and his fellow guild members.
Turns out, our villain is kidnapping and brainwashing an army of people for his grand castle renovation.
Yet, the key to saving everyone lies in...

ENTERTAINING HIM AND CONFESSING YOUR SECRETS?!?! WITH YOUR GUIlD MEMBERS?!?!

name: Longshot Universe
summary: Longshot Universe is an intense action arena shooter where you pilot a variety of space ships to dogfight and shoot down the enemy before they shoot you down.

name: Lost Ember: VR Edition
summary: Explore the remains of a fallen world from fascinating perspectives! Slip into the role of different animals to uncover the fate of an ancient world. Dive into deep waters, fly at lofty heights, dig underground as a mole, climb steep cliffs with a mountain goat, and many more!

name: Love Complex: The Black Cat He Loved
summary: A mobile otome game.

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 7
summary: The seventh season (also known as Stick or Twist) of Love Island: The Game was released on September 27, 2023 with its first volume. A new volume will be released every Wednesday.

name: Lost
summary: A game for mobile phones based on the Lost TV show.

name: Lost Lands: The Golden Curse
summary: Susan, who is already famous throughout Lost Lands, returns again to that mysterious world! This time she will have to face the ancient curse of the druids. And more…

name: Loose Life
summary: Find yourself in the middle of the humanitarian horror of war. You have no weapons, and you are not a soldier. You only have a life and the way you want to survive. Write your story. Maybe you will lose life. Maybe you'll live loose. It all depends on your decisions, which always have consequences.

name: Lollipop Chainsaw: Premium Edition
summary:
A Japan-exclusive release of Lollipop Chainsaw. The difference are:
- A gore toggle.
- An option to toggle the audio between English and Japanese.
- The ability to obtain the Sexy Rider outfit early (360) and the Cutie Waitress outfit early (PS3).

name: Lost Tomb
summary: Is a arcade game released in 1982 by Stern Electronics. The game has maze-like levels that feature game play that some say feels like the game known as Berzerk which was also released by Stern Electronics.

name: Lovecraft Game
summary: It's an extremely simple shooter game. You are a nameless wanderer in a nameless land, populated by dangerous creatures and strange characters.

name: Lola's Lutong Bahay
summary: Lola's Lutong Bahay is an immersive Filipino cooking simulation game where players step into the shoes of Dalisay, a budding chef learning traditional recipes from her beloved grandmother, Lola Felicia. Explore vibrant kitchen settings, master authentic Filipino cooking techniques, and embark on a flavorful journey to recreate iconic dishes. hone your culinary skills and celebrate the rich cultural heritage of Filipino cuisine in this heartwarming game.

name: Locust Hunter
summary: Though faraway, they shall be vanquished! "Locust Hunter" is a third-person, level-based space shooter game. Pilot WHEEL fights through Locust defenses with lasers, missiles, and more. Her ally, NIGHT, gathers parts for weapon upgrades. Enjoy unlimited ammo and regenerating armor—just push forward!

name: Lost Lands: Mahjong
summary: Plunge into the fantastic journey with the game Mahjong! Complete more than 150 levels, get awards, finish more than 200 quests, collect many collections and help elves to survive on the mysterious island.

name: Loopomotive
summary: Loopomotive is a short casual train survival game where you drive a train stuck in a loop that never stops! You can accelerate or slow down the train, but never stop it. Avoid accidents to complete levels!

name: Love at Any Cost
summary: You’ve always put your work before your love life, so when your younger sister announces her engagement, you need to find a date ASAP! Luckily, you find a service that provides just what you’re looking for—a handsome, wealthy businessman. But when you discover that your rental boyfriend is hiding something, will you be able to keep up the charade? Can a fake relationship lead to real love?

name: Locodriver 6
summary: A sixth Locodriver game

name: Lovewood
summary: A fantasy dating sim for a cozy evening

name: Lord of the Mall (Lord of Them All!)
summary: This old man walks a fine line between the mists of reality/delusion, between the mall and the dungeon.

name: Love Connect
summary: If you are lonely and bored at home alone, little brother, come and play with me. If you win, you will be given the reward that a man wants.

name: Lost In Blue 2: Fate's Island
summary:
Unravel forsaken island secrets, survive with strategy
Welcome to our island survival and management strategy game!
Embark on a breathtaking journey where you will join other survivors from an enigmatic incident in establishing camps on this mysterious island, navigating the perils of nature and facing off against ominous threats.

name: Lolagame
summary: Lola Game is a management and simulation game with an isometric perspective. It is a game commissioned by Granarolo, an italian multinational company that operates in the fresh milk and diary-cheese sector. It was released as a free-to-play game on their website alongside a prize competition. The goal of the game is to be able to produce 310 litres of milk every month from the best breed of cows. The player starts in march 2003 with just 3 brown cows, 1 bull and 950 euros.

name: Loathing Heart
summary:
In this psychological, emotional experience you have to protect your heart from getting harmed. 
Doing so will evolve a short but impactful story around yourself, the protagonist our social system and the way we interact with other people. 
The further you get the more you will understand what is going on…

name: Lock Parsing
summary: Simulator of opening the lock, where you are tasked to select as much as possible keys that you need for a successful open lock for 1 minute

name: Locodriver
summary: A vector graphics train-driving simulator for ZX Spectrum.

name: Lola: The Escape
summary: In this challenging action platformer. Help the little cow Lola to escape from the Martians who kidnapped her. Explore and avoid obstacles in each level. Her main ability is to float while she falls.

name: Love Death
summary:
In this pixel art platformer inspired by Takanashi Kiara from Hololive, it's up to you to find a way to die in each level.

How long will it take you to complete the 60 levels?

name: Lords and Tactics
summary: Here, you will start from scratch and meet like-minded comrades. With wisdom and courage, you set out on a journey to conquer and unite the lands. Use the Strategy system and deploy Frontline, Center, and Rearguard units to fight your opponents in small-scale skirmishes.

name: Lost Judgment: School Stories Expansion Pack
summary:
This pack includes activities to deepen the interactions with the school’s clubs.

Additionally, Yagami takes boxing from the ring to the streets as a new fighting style that joins his default martial arts styles.

The School Stories Expansion Pack contains:

Dance Club additions:
•Additional Special Moves
•New Outfit

An additional robot for the robot war minigame:
•Additional Robot: [MB5000/SUPREMACY]

The following items expand the game of School Stories "Bikers":
•The body of the motorcycle [MAXINATOR]
•Additional Course [Urban]

Adds the following sparring partners to the Boxing Gym:
•Sugiura
•Higashi
•Kaito

A new fighting style for Yagami:
•Boxing Battle Style

name: Lorax Garden
summary: Help the Lorax regrow the world's Truffula tree forests! Design your own trees and flowers, see them grow right before your eyes, and share beautiful postcards you've created with friends & family.

name: Loot.io
summary:
Get ready for an unforgiving adventure in this addictive 2D rogue-lite shooter right in your browser! Fight enemies to gather the finest loot in the land. Be prepared to inevitably die… over and over and over. Return to the Hub World with the loot you earned, customize your playstyle, invite friends (if you have any), and try again! Death is temporary... Loot is forever.

LOOT is a multiplayer 2D rogue-lite shooter with an action-RPG combat style and rhythm. Fight through hordes of monsters in different biomes to collect that sweet, sweet loot! Satisfy all your inner loot goblin needs directly from your web browser!

name: Lotus Minigames: United Nations
summary: A very basic implementation of a shedding-type card game. Play with your friends and be the best of you!

name: Lost in Spice
summary: Lost in Spice is a cooking game for Oculus Rift in which you play as an abducted human forced to cook Earth food for aliens at the Intergalactic House of Planets. Now you have to dice up weird ingredients, cook them, and submit them in the time limit to get a good score. And if you don't, you'll be vaporized!

name: Logo Quiz: Guess the Image
summary:
Looking test your aptitude level or IQ level and improve your general knowledge?
How many Logos & Picture you can Recognise or Guess ?
Start using the most unique quiz and learning app - “Logo Quiz - Guess The Image or Picture” for the most comprehensive list of general knowledge questions. Improving your general knowledge while testing your skills with this quiz trivia app is extremely useful. The “Logo Quiz - Guess The Image or Picture” app includes the most comprehensive categories.

name: Love or Money?
summary: Available in the Story Me app.

name: Lost Adventures of Kroz
summary: The Lost Adventures of Kroz was the last released entry in the Kroz series, created by Apogee founder Scott Miller and released in 1990. Being the Kroz series' "swan song", this entry featured a whopping 75 levels. A fitting finale to a great series. A great game by itself.

name: Lode Runner for WonderSwan
summary: Lode Runner for WonderSwan is an Action game, developed by Aisystem Tokyo and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: LocoMotives
summary: LocoMotives: a Town Building, Track Laying and Gun Slinging fun game for all!

name: Lobo with Shotguns
summary: Lobo with Shotguns is a retro, arcade action game featuring a dual shotgun wielding werewolf.

name: Love at The Milky Way Diner
summary: A LGBT-friendly cozy sci-fi cooking/dating sim about making friends, finding love, and running a diner in deep space.

name: Lost Chapter: With You
summary: Venture into the abyss once again to find out the protagonist's true identity! This DLC comes with new card system, bosses, events and many more!

name: Love Island: The Game
summary:
Welcome to Love Island: The Game, the interactive story game that puts YOU in the heart of the hit reality TV show ‘Love Island’!
Crack on with hotties who catch your fancy, and PICK which guy or girl you want to couple up with. How will you stir things up in the Villa? Are you here to make friends, or will you do everything it takes to find love? Can you make it all the way to the infamous Love Island final?

name: L.O.L. Surprise! Roller Dreams Racing
summary: Race your friends in L.O.L. Surprise! Roller Dreams Racing, a roller-skating racing game based on L.O.L. Surprise! Players can choose one of their favorite characters, and race in a variety of tracks and modes with up to 4 players! Explore popular L.O.L. Surprise! themes including delectable sweets, Route 707, outer space and beyond. With each race you will earn Glitter Points to open L.O.L. Surprise! Balls and unlock different surprises like stickers and accessories to use in future races.

name: Lords of New York
summary:
Lords of New York is a new kind of poker game where cheating is not just allowed, but the only way to win. Face off against the toughest, craziest gangsters in Prohibition-era New York on your way to the top, with fully-voiced and lovingly animated characters. A full emote system allows players to let their opponents know just how they feel.

Story Mode is on the way, allowing players to learn more about their characters with a branching, deep story with special poker scenarios and mini-games.

name: Low Knight
summary:
This game is a demake of and an homage to Hollow Knight, a game by Team Cherry. Made for the 2018 Demake Jam.
Explore an insect underworld, find the six charms and beat all the bosses.

name: Loot & Legends
summary:
The Facebook page describes the game thus: 

"Loot & Legends is an innovative free-to-play card game, role-playing game mashup."

The game is no longer available for download.

name: Logic Town: Santa's Grotto
summary: Step into the festive spirit with "Santa's Grotto," the heartwarming DLC for Logic Town! Featuring a new story chapter, bursting at the seams with over 30 new story puzzles. Then take to the leaderboards with the new Christmas Free Play Puzzle Theme!

name: Lone Wolf: Flight from the Dark
summary: Gameplay is very close to the original gamebook with branching decisions entered by keyboard, except for combat which is handled in a real-time 2D combat interface.

name: Loading...
summary: You are a 10-year-old Kiet. It is 2005, and your brother is dead. Nothing to do but play video games.

name: Looking for Lokae
summary: Find hidden objects and solve puzzles. A pair of rambunctious twins have gotten themselves into trouble, and must now cover up their mistakes before their uncle returns home!

name: Lords of Doom: Part One - The Black God
summary:
Lords of Doom is a shareware fantasy role-playing game. A prosperous kingdom has been overrun by demons, and now a sole hero controlled by the player must put an end to this invasion and restore peace in the realm.

The game uses a custom role-playing system which is based on a number of character attributes and skills the player can build. There are no character classes, and the player may develop fighting, thieving and magic skills based on their choice. Experience points are awarded for exploration, interaction with NPCs and successful combat encounters.

The setting is a vast fantasy world with several human kingdoms, also inhabited by various fantasy creatures, including dragons and other monsters, as well as different types of undead. However, humanoid fantasy races like elves or dwarves are not present. The state of human civilization is comparable to that of Ancient Rome, except for the widespread use of magic.

name: Lotus II
summary:
Licensed by the classic British car company, this game featured 2 modes of play - one has you racing against 19 computer rivals (with witty names such as Alain Phosphate and Crash-Hard Banger), and the other pits you against the clock.

There are 13 different types of races, ranging from Motorways to night-time to sections punctuated by roadworks, and some are lap-based with others being simple A-B. 2 players could play on a split screen mode.

The game's crowning glory, however, was the RECS editor, which allowed you to create courses of your own, with theoretically millions possible.

name: Lost Harem
summary: Lost Harem is an adult game, in which you have to find your harem. You can't hesitate. The passion for girls only grows.

name: Lords of Cards
summary: Lords of Cards is a multi-player, real-time deck building game. Create a deck of 90 cards that you select among more than 60 unique cards. Play them to recruit powerful units that fight in your name, build constructions that improve your economy or cast spells with various effects.

name: Logic Escape
summary: Put your intellect to the test with challenging escape rooms featuring high interactivity and intricate logical puzzles. Observe, search for clues, combine information, apply logical reasoning, and uncover mysteries through exploration.

name: Loopy Treasure
summary: Infinite Looping Sea Battle for Treasure

name: Loki
summary:
A fantasy voyage through the great mythologies, Loki allows the player to take on the role of one of the four heroes of the game, each drawn from a different mythology: a mighty Norse fighter, a fierce Greek warrior, a powerful Egyptian magician or an Aztec shaman who masters the secrets of the spirit world. 
 
Whatever hero the player adopts, he must come to the aid of the gods he worships. He will come to realize that behind the chaos that is threatening his world lies Seth, the Egyptian god of darkness and evil, who has returned from the kingdom of the dead. 
 
The hero must therefore undertake an epic journey across the various epochs and myths. He will fight a multitude of monsters of all shapes and sizes, and even overthrow a few gods, on his way to preventing Seth establish his wicked reign. 
 
An epic adventure across four great mythologies - Aztec, Egyptian, Greek and Norse - allowing the player to live through many of the key episodes that mark these cultures (the siege of Troy, Ragnarok, ......) and setting him in the path of the most prominent figures within each episode (Achilles, Thor, Akhenaton...). 
 
Choose from four different heroes with radically different attributes and powers. Each hero has a vast array of spells and skills to help him through his quest. 
 
Innumerable story lines through random generation of decors and items, so that nobody lives the same experience and allowing the game to be played many times without the hero ever having the same set of weapons, armour or spells.

name: Love FMV
summary: Wales Interactive are proud to offer you Five Dates and Ten Dates all discounted in one bundle!

name: Lost Princess: Winterland
summary: Play this walking simulation. Lost princess are again missing. Collect items and try to find missing Princess in big open snow world

name: Lost Borderline
summary: Lost Borderline is a retro pixel-art, hack & slash puzzle-crawler where the boundaries of reality are broken, giving you creative control over the sides of the screen to solve puzzles and defeat enemies.

name: Lost Relics
summary:
Lost Relics is an Action-Adventure Role Playing Game with blockchain backed items that you can truly own.

Explore Talmuth and embark on Adventures in search of precious artifacts while saving the townsfolk from terrifying beasts!

Precious Artifacts you find are Matrixchain Digital Collectibles which are tangible game assets with real value, allowing you to trade, sell or own forever!

name: Love Love Diary
summary: Complete the puzzle challenges to win the hearts of 15 different girls with various professions. Apply the patch and dive deeper into their lives!

name: Love Love Candy
summary: Choose your favorite girl and help her to complete a very popular phone game to unlock fashionable dresses for her avatar. As you guide and support them, they'll express their gratitude for you in many ways!

name: Lords & Knights
summary: Lords & Knights is a free to play medieval strategy MMO. At first you take control of one castle and its knights. As time goes by, you can expand your realm all the way to an empire with the right tactic. Conquer the cities of your enemies and become the most powerful ruler of the Middle Ages.

name: Lonely Trip
summary: Lonely Trip is a 2D puzzle platformer. Unique puzzles, beautiful visuals and capturing music, experience all these by completing this lonely adventure.

name: LonelyMe
summary: Under the lonely moonlight, let's play chess by playing cards! Please note whether your chesses are under the shadow. Or, you will be punished! Is it offensive or defensive, is it a slap or a solution? What, the moon can still rotate? Your choice determines the fate of the chessmen and lays your end

name: Love Potion
summary: Love Potion is an engaging visual novel that takes players on a heartfelt journey through the complexities of love and self-discovery.

name: Loony Loco
summary: A Train based arcade game released for the BBC Micro. With action stages where you platform across the roof of the train and try to stop coffee cups from falling of desks.

name: Loop Craft
summary: Loop Craft is a game about economics. There is an item trading system within the game. This game has a variety of item mix systems. And have a reservation system to set up a factory to produce products for sale in the game.

name: Lolita of Labyrinth
summary: Slow Xbox Live Indie platformer by aorz.

name: Lost Marbles
summary: Do you like challenging platforming? How about solving cool puzzles?! What about games that dare to use more than 3 shades of brown in their color palettes?!!? Well come on in!

name: LocoSoccer Classic
summary: LocoSoccer is a fun, crazy physics-based soccer game where you must do a lot of goals to win cups and accesories for your team. Your objective is easy: win all cups with your goals. How awesome is that?

name: Lost Passage: Ushinawareta Hitofushi
summary:
Kyoto, the ancient capital.

A heavily traditional Japanese city separed from modern society. Akira Misaki, the hero, is a fourth year university student who is homecoming for teaching practice.

In his old town he meets many familiar faces. After some meeting and reunion with girls from his past, a big story begins to move, quietly .......

name: Long Starlight
summary: Long Starlight is a Snake clone based on the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic character Starlight Glimmer.

name: Love in the Dark
summary: In this multiplayer horror game, a loving couple receives an invitation from a wealthy man for an event. Despite my concerns, she insists on going. To protect her, I decide to secretly join and keep her safe.

name: Lordmancer 2
summary: Experience a FREE fully-featured 3D fantasy MMORPG

name: LoYuno
summary: You were kidnapped by a crazy girl. And your phone started predicting her future for a short time. It's up to you to find out who she is, why this day doesn't end, and how to get out of this house.

name: LoBlocks
summary: LoBlocks is a puzzle game, where the player must destroy all blocks to go to the next level enjoying a relaxing atmosphere with LoFi musics. The game also has an arcade mode with ranking.

name: Lord of the Imps
summary: Lord Of The Imps is a survival strategy game. Build, gather resources, expand, defeat your enemies and Regain your position as the ruler of hell.

name: Love Quest: Los Angeles
summary: Connect with intriguing characters through thoughtfully chosen questions in Love Quest: LA. To win a girl's heart, you'll need to ask all questions correctly and eventually invite her on a second date. Can you unravel her desires and emotions to make her your girlfriend by the end of the game?

name: Lord Monarch Pro
summary: Lord Monarch Pro is a port of Advanced Lord Monarch, though it has music taken from an assortment of other Falcom games, including Ys, Sorcerian, Brandish, and Dragon Slayer: Eiyuu Densetsu.

name: Love, Election & Chocolate Portable
summary: Love, Election & Chocolate Portable is a PlayStation Portable port of the romance visual novel that puts the player in the shoes of a male student named Yuuki Oojima. The game is mostly driven by dialogue, with a limited amount of illustrations to accompany the story narrative.

name: Lost Light
summary:
Lost Light is a Survival, Warfighting, Progression mobile game developed by NetEase Games.

Join the "Firefly" task force and unveil the sinister plot behind the exclusion zone. Survive the brutal domain where humanity ceases to prevail and danger lurks in every corner!
The world of Lost Light abides by the rule of "high risk-high return." You could either sneak your way around and scavenge for supplies or go out with guns blazing and plunder like a warlord. Upgrading and trading are also essential to build up your strength and keep your enemies at bay. Armed to the teeth or be a minimalist in the next mission? Each decision will affect your chances of survival in Lost Light. And that’s the way warfare is.

name: Loveless on Lockdown
summary: Who needs romance amid a pandemic? Not me!

name: Lost Island
summary:
Lost Island is another old Scott Cawthon game made in around 2003.

The game appears to be set on some sort of island where you can interact with animals in what looks like a shop. Virtually nothing else is currently known about the game. The animals are drawn by Scott Cawthon.

name: Lots of Guns
summary: Lots of Guns is an Xbox Live Indie Game.

name: Lost In Fantaland
summary: Lost In Fantaland is a retro pixel-style roguelite game that blends deck building and turn-based strategies on a checkerboard.

name: Lone Samurai.
summary: Lone Samurai is a hack and slash samurai side scroller set in a fantasy world.

name: Love Colors: Everyday Pixels
summary: Enjoy and paint more stunning pixel art: mandalas, vehicles, famous paintings, people of various professions and others!

name: Lost Daughter
summary: Lost Daughter is an open-world action game which tells the story of Sawyer trying to find his daughter.

name: Lord Of Tower
summary: "Lord of Tower" is an action RPG game. Climb the tower and meet the bosses on each floor.Defeat bosses with unique patterns and win in battle. Conquer all the bosses and become the true lord of the tower!

name: Local Paper Small Town
summary: Local Paper Small Town is a 2-player co-op puzzle game about spreading happiness around a quirky papercraft town. Team up with a friend, using a physical newspaper and VR, to discover Smalltown and its charming cast of characters by communicating and relating between both formats.

name: Loopy Wizard
summary:
Control a wizard and make wise use of spells. Can you outsmart the monsters and reach the end?
Spells are placed on the Magic Clock. After each move the clock hand turns and you must make use of the spell it points at.
Enjoy this hectic puzzle game and become a "Loopy Wizard"!

name: Looking For Love
summary: Play matchmaker for a bunch of cute little blobs in a series of match-the-blob challenges. Spin the bouncy cuties until they lay eyes on the blob of their dreams and watch as they run into each others' arms. Well, they roll. And they don't have arms. But you get the picture.

name: Lode Runner II
summary:
In 1984, after developing the first arcade conversion of Lode Runner, Irem developed a sequel in a very short period of time. This second version contained 30 selected levels from the 150 original levels, in comparison to the first version's 24 levels. Other than the new levels, and some new looks for the enemies (all of whom behave the same) there is no difference in game play.

Irem brought many of their arcade inspired levels to the Famicom Disk System under the names Super Lode Runner and Super Lode Runner II.

name: Lost World
summary: Lost World is a survival video game with single and co-op modes. Open world and first person view.

name: Lords of the Fallen: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes:

-The Monks Decipher DLC offers more single-player action, uncovering hidden secrets throughout the three worlds Harkyn explores in Lords of the Fallen
- The Demonic Weapons pack includes three devastating new weapons
- Soundtrack

name: Lords of the Fallen: Demonic Weapon Pack
summary: A set of three powerful, demonic weapons: The sword IHIR (“the one who”) for attack and defense. Twin daggers MARGYR (“friends”) that excel in all-out attack. The hammer THEHK (“thief”) able to steal magical energy.

name: Lords of the Fallen: The Arcane Boost
summary: The DLC package contains 2 special resource cards which can be redeemed for a small boost to help Harkyn get started: Spell Points Card (play this card to achieve 1 additional Spell Point), Rune Card (play this card to achieve 3 small sealed runes).

name: Lontra-Metragem
summary: In the city of Lontrina, the last rental company in the world is on the rise! Several cinephile animals from all over the country are eager to visit it. Among them, a very astute otter, who is not there to rent DVDs. Guide this little thief through this sprawling video store, slipping out of sight of the staff to complete her mission: borrow lots of DVDs… …without warning! And, of course, without getting caught, because you need to take these DVDs to your neighborhood otters!

name: Lost Soul
summary: In Lost Soul, you’re a soul that got lost after the plane crash, and now you need to challenge yourself to find your brother! Venture out, overcome barriers, and fight evil souls until none of them remain.

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Extended Edition
Lobby Loitering
summary: Have you ever felt like, in a single step, the world around you changed, and you didn't notice until it was too late? Explore a collection of alternate realities in an attempt to get Marcel back to the reality he belongs in.

name: Logical Now!
summary: Away with the musty dust of the old but still classic game Logical from 1991. It's time for Logical Now! - Many discs - One color - Many explosions ... and off to the next level! With new sound, 3D-graphic, levels and new game features!

name: Loopers Plus
summary: An expanded version of Loopers with brand-new scenarios and artworks.

name: Logistical 2: Sweden
summary: Logistical 2: Sweden has over 2,000 towns and 1,000 businesses to complete.

name: Lose Your Head
summary: An Action Arcade Game Made for a Game Jam

name: Logic Pro
summary: Logic Pro is an arcade game where players uncover checkboxes to reveal a picture.

name: Lodestone: The crazy cave adventures of mad Stony Tony and his encounter with the exploding rolling stones
summary: Lodestone is a single player action spellcaster made exclusively for VR. Hold the power to summon and bend stones at your will, prove yourself against enemies while exploring an underground world and do your best to get to the end! We dare you!

name: Lost Islands: Pioneer Pack
summary: Lost Islands - Pioneer Pack

name: Lost August
summary: 082192 is a single-player open-world walking simulator game based on the concept of liminal spaces and the backrooms. Experience a dream-like world through the lens of a VHS camera as you explore the contents of a recently discovered video tape.

name: Lock Lock: Farm
summary: Lock Lock: Farm. Embark on this adventure, fun and relaxing (or not). Surround the animals and capture them. Using only fences, prevent them from being swallowed by dangerous animals, and don't forget to guide them so they can capture the star :).

name: Lost in You
summary: Take on the role of [REDACTED], an 18 year old senior high school student trying to move on from a rough breakup. Meet new people and cross paths with old acquaintances as you try to build and maintain relationships in the fictional Japanese city of Jakuofo. As you grow closer to everyone they'll start to open up more and you'll soon come to realise that life isn't all fun and games for those around you either. But worry not, the city is your playground to do as you please! Or is it...? Perhaps not everything is as it appears at first... Only time will tell.

name: Love and Guillotines
summary: A visual novel video game which allows you to woo the most powerful figures of the French Revolution. Be careful to stay on everyone's good side, or you might just lose your head.

name: Lovely Hero
summary:
A science-fiction visual novel centered on a romantic story with your favorite super hero!

Superheroes are not the only ones that wear a mask. Ayaka is 21 years old and very self-conscious about her scarred body, feeling she has no place anywhere. She reinvents herself as "Nina" — a stylish, sophisticated, and successful girl, with great influence in social media. After spending years as a shut-in, she finally gathers courage to start university with her new identity, believing she will be able to have a normal life this way. But her negative thoughts won't be the only villains she will have to face, because she meets a team of boys that also wear masks to hide their identities, but with a sightly different purpose...

name: Lost and Foundry
summary:
Take a trip to a place thought long lost...

Lost and Foundry is made out of my strong desire to make an Arcane Dimensions map and features. It features around 90 enemies and should only take 5-15 minutes to beat. I really wanted to understand the privatives that make up a typical map and be able to re-create them and make use of them multiple times properly in a way that didn't feel 'rehashy'. While Lost and Foundry isn't my first Quake map thanks to the Reload Jam, it was my first idea that I reworked and scrapped until around 2 months ago. I'm glad I persisted if not for the learning experience it gave me as I felt I learned a lot of Arcane Dimensions quirks and have a better appreciation for some of the iconic maps made in it. Feel free to message me any agregious errors that may softlock the player or break events. Not made or tested for any multiplayer but does have spawns.

name: Lost Circus
summary: Follow Joy as she discovers the real-life source of her nightmares. Search for clues to help spark Joy's memories of a forgotten past. Solve puzzles, play curious mini-games, and collect peculiar items in an eerie quest for answers.

name: Lone Eagle: Colombian Encounter
summary: Lone Eagle: Colombian Encounter

name: Lovers ' Smiles 2
summary: Casual puzzle where you need to help two lovers to meet each other. Use your fantasy and the physical laws, draw incredible designs to connect Mr. and Miss Smile!

name: Lovely Lisa
summary:
Lovely Lisa helps younger girls learn the importance of having fun and working hard while earning your way to your own fashion style! Earn Lisa-points by perfecting your beauty skills and techniques, helping out around the house and even learning what it takes to become a successful career girl! Providing a well-rounded approach to beauty and fashion, Lovely Lisa rewards girls with gorgeous accessories, original clothes and fabulous hairstyles and make-up! Prove you’ve got what it takes in the Heart Hills pageant-with-a-difference! Only the girl with the best skills in all categories can win – because after all, beauty is only skin deep!

- Fashion Sense: Polish nails and add your own touch with sparkly accessories, apply make-up and coordinate with the perfect hair style!
- Design and customize! Use the DSi camera to snap shots and customize Lisa’s outfits!
- Mini-games: Dance your socks off in the idol game or learn to play the piano
- Family values: Help mom with shopping and cooking or even help dad to put furniture together!
- Learn valuable career skills: From babysitting and cake decorating to nursing or even practicing to be a flight attendant!

name: Lots of Swords
summary: A web export test!

name: Lock 'n' Roll
summary:
Lock 'n' Roll is an intriguing puzzle game requiring a combination of luck and skill. Roll four dice at a time and arrange them on a 4x4 grid. Receive points for various combinations according to number and color. 
 
You must place all four dice and once you lock them down, they are fixed in place! The most difficult combinations are cleared from the board. 
 
Earn enough points and be rewarded with a Joker! The game keeps going until there are no more places for dice. How high can you score? That's entirely up to you..

name: Loch Ness
summary: Loch Ness is a 1-4 Player Co-Op Horror Hunter. You and your team must navigate precarious waters, use your equipment to hunt for Nessie’s feeding ground and lay bait to lure her out. But be careful, for lurking deep beneath the lake is a creature more ancient than all mankind…

name: LocoRoco
summary: The peaceful world of the LocoRoco are under attack by the not-so-nice Moja Corps! These evil outer space creatures have come to take the LocoRoco from their land of blowing flowers, lively creatures and pastel scenery. As the planet where the LocoRoco inhabit, you must move them through more than 40 levels of slippery slopes, teetering platforms and maze-like passages. The LocoRoco have the uncanny ability to fluidly morph to their landscape, so all you need is to tilt, roll and bounce the happy blob-like creatures to safety!

name: Long Time No See
summary: A short, cozy, narrative-driven Halloween game about three friends reuniting to spend a stormy Halloween night together in a haunted house.

name: Love Notes
summary: Play as Rachel or Jesse in this horror dating sim featuring 2 male and 3 female love interests.

name: L.O.L.: Lack of Love
summary: L.O.L: Lack Of Love, is an evolutionary adventure game developed by Love-de-Lic and published by ASCII Entertainment for the Sega Dreamcast. The game was released exclusively in Japan on November 2, 2000.

name: Lorgeban
summary: Fourth in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: Love in School
summary:
Campus love is not so much interest entanglement, only pure I love you and you love me.

Love in School tells a short love story, simple and fresh.

name: Logic Town: The Library
summary: It's time to cozy up with a real page-turner in "The Library," the latest DLC for Logic Town! Immerse yourself in a celebration of literature, logic, and the joy of a well-organized bookshelf.

name: Logic Colors
summary: Logic Colors is Indie Logic Game in which You move color tiles to solve riddles. Discover rules and relax in 225 unique levels and unlock all items in game! Will You finish them perfectly?

name: Love Verne
summary: Ludum Dare 46 Submission

name: Loop: Beginning of Never Ending Journey
summary: A Boy With Amnesia Embarks On A Journey In Search Of Answers. It's a 2.5D game set in a surreal world, where you embarks on a mysterious journey filled with unexpected plot twists, thrilling action and challenging puzzles. Loop is an adventure that will keep you guessing until the very end.

name: Lobo
summary: Lobo is an unreleased Mega Drive fighting game developed by Ocean of America. It is based off the DC Comics book series of the same name, and was due to be released in the Winter of 1996. A Super Nintendo version was also planned, but both copies were cancelled last minute.

name: Love You till the End
summary: Stealth-based game that challenges to navigate the delicate balance between love and fear. Step into the shoes of a misunderstood monster who has fallen in love with human girl.

name: Love, Money, Rock'n'Roll: Summer '94
summary:
7 years have passed. Nikolai's life has changed: he has left much behind and now simply goes with the flow, avoiding stress and upheaval. However, fate has its own plans for our hero! New and old acquaintances will rush into his life like a gust of summer wind, bringing with them long-forgotten emotions and love!

An all-new story taking place across over more than two in-game weeks.

The opportunity to learn what fate befell the characters after the end of the game.

New characters, environments, music tracks, and illustrations.

A chance to see Nikolai from a different perspective and help him find new love.

name: Lost Recipes
summary: In Lost Recipes, you are a Ghost Chef in training. You will cook for ghosts from Greek, Chinese, and Maya civilizations who long to pass on the traditional recipes of their favorite dishes. Recreate authentic food from three historic cultures in this relaxing cooking game.

name: Long Lost
summary: You must unravel the secrets behind the death of your great grandmother, explore the past, discover what happened, and, above all, ensure that history does not repeat itself.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of Normandy Battlepack 3
summary: Heroes of Normandy Battle Pack 3 has 12 scenarios. The scenarios cover battles spanning the D-Day drops, fighting the Norman hedgerows and Operation Market Garden.

name: Looking for Something
summary: The objective of the game is to find what you are looking for, which appears randomly on the map. Please get a hint and proceed through the map relying on that information, or else you may get a hint, which you can use to recommend the game to your advantage.

name: Lost Room: Escape
summary: As twilight descends and the world plunges into darkness, you, a seasoned police officer, find yourself answering a harrowing call that shatters the peace of a quiet, unassuming neighborhood. The distressed voice on the other end speaks of Lost Apartment, a place steeped in sinister legends.

name: Lord of Fire & Ice
summary: Become a powerful Wizard and defend your realm from invading monsters! Cast spells of fire and ice from your magic staffs using hand gestures. Be careful to use the opposite element in battle, as creatures can gain strength from their own element. Good Luck young Mage! Your people need you!

name: Lost Player
summary: You are a lost player looking for true world.

name: Lost in Red Valley
summary: Lost in Red Valley is a survival game set in feudal Japan. Explore. Craft. Survive! Alone or with friends!

name: Love Menu
summary: Love Menu is a visual novel game about a romance between a young man and a waitress. It has immersive story, interactive choices, and mini-game events that enhance the characters and influence the relationship. The beautiful artwork will keep you entertained and invested in the story.

name: Lord of Vermilion
summary: Lord of Vermilion is Square Enix's card battling arcade game only found in Japan. It uses packs of cards and is capable of both local and network play. It is currently one of the more popular games at Japanese game centers.

name: Lost Meridian
summary: 3D Deckbuilding game where you craft your perfect deck to survive the dungeons. Online co-op support with up to 4 friends.

name: Lowland Keepers
summary: Build a team and create synergies to face ever more powerful enemies.

name: Lost Color
summary: In the world of lost color, light is lost and only darkness descends. He has many conversations with various cute monsters he encounters in it, and sometimes has thrilling battles with powerful monsters. Investigate the whole world, restore the color they lost, and save them.

name: LocoRoco Midnight Carnival
summary: Go on a late-night adventure with blobs of goo in this download-only LocoRoco game.

name: Loca-Love My Commuting Crush
summary:
Aoi Ichitaro's convenient ten-minute walk to school has turned into a one-hour train ride on a little-used local line after a disaster at his apartment forces him to move in with relatives.
However, his misfortune turns out to be a blessing in disguise...

While Ichitaro has always had a secret crush on his drop-dead gorgeous classmate Aritagawa Nio, she's infamously inapproachable. But now, he finds out that she rides the same train to school, at the same time every day.

While she brushes off his approaches at first, her attitude toward Ichitaro changes after he offers his help when he finds her feeling unwell at the station one day.

"You don't need to be so formal with me..."

Soon after, he finds himself on the fast track toward a friendly relationship with her.Yet while she blushes and swoons at all his advances, she refuses to make things official and be his girlfriend.

All trains must eventually reach their destination, but where is Ichitaro and Nio's relationship headed...?

name: Longsword Tabletop Tactics
summary: Longsword brings turn-based tabletop tactics to the digital world of PC Gaming. In Longsword, you will collect and build an army comprised of miniature champions, spells, equipment, and structures. You can then customize the appearance of your army and enter it into battle on a hex-based tabletop battlefield!

name: Lost Satellite
summary: Explore, control, dive and ascend to beautiful heights with an original soundtrack.

name: Lovely Planet 2: April Skies
summary: Sequel to the most adorable First Person Shooter Gun Ballet. Feel the speed once again as you jump and shoot your way through the familiar cutesy abstract world filled with clever traps and angry baddies fuming with rage. Pick out targets with precision accuracy and dodge an infinite barrage of bullets carefully jumping between floating islands all while racing the clock for a better score.

name: Lones
summary: Lones is a single-player adventure. Leave stress behind and live off-grid in the Canadian woods. Investigate and uncover the truth behind a mysterious and peculiar shadow.

name: Lonely Knight
summary: Lonely Knight is a game that combines idle and roguelike elements. Defeat monsters and embark on a journey to find companions for the lonely knight. Experience growth through idle gameplay and test your strength in dungeons!

name: Lost in the Void
summary: Lost in the Void is an isometric pixel art walking simulator with RPG elements inspired by the 80's nostalgia. Currently under development.

name: Looped: Love at first sight
summary: Looped is a short interactive story told through hand-drawn animation. Guide Him and Her through the chapters of their story by solving peaceful mini-puzzles and find a way out of the

name: Lost in the Mine
summary: Joe has been trapped deep in the mine after an earthquake. Help him navigate the dark tunnels of the mine and face its dangers until he finds the exit.

name: Love Option
summary: Interactive Otome-style romance with hundreds of free picks per episode. A complex choice tree, different endings, illustrations to unlock!

name: Lollipop Knight
summary: Lollipop knight is a challenging jumping game where you have to overcome various obstacles and traps.

name: Love & Diaries: Duncan
summary: When was the last time you had a fresh start in the most exciting city in the world?  When was the last time you have pursue your dreams and made them actually happen? When was the last time you met your true love and fought in order to get him?

name: Lovely Traps Dungeon
summary: Your quest : Guide a golem through mad dungeons filled with platforms, traps and puzzles. Recover lost madn-- knowledge at all cost (golems are just moulded clay after all)

name: Lost Squad
summary: Lost Squad extends the award-winning Half-Life universe allowing to look at familiar events through the eyes of Barney Calhoun and the gameplay with ability to destroy environments, play with friends in co-op mode, fight newly-spawned creatures and much more.

name: Lorenzo il Magnifico
summary: Florence, the cradle of Italian Renaissance. The city is experiencing an unprecedented economic and cultural flourishing: will your family prevail and control the city?

name: Love Kira
summary: Love Kira is an upcoming visual novel inspired by the independent VTuber group Kira Kara, filled with drama, romance, and lots of comedy with the talented "Kiras" from the esteemed Kara Talent Academy.

name: Lop Nor Zombie VR
summary:
In a west lab of Lop Nor, staff were infected by virus and become to Zombies. Soldier 9527 discovered the threaten and entered the town to investigate what happened in the town. You have to survive by killing all the zombies you met. Examine the environment carefully and make use all the weapons including melee weapon and guns you can find to defeat the horrible creatures. Also you have to solve some puzzles to keep searching forward.
IMPORTANT: keep the distance from zombies and kill them before they get close to you, or the zombie would eat you soon !

name: Love Nikki-Dress UP Queen
summary: Love Nikki-Dress UP Queen is a free-to-play mobile game centered around fashion battles between titular player character Nikki and the people she encounters on her journey through fantastical fashion lands.

name: Lovely Planet Arcade
summary: Relive your journey to Lovely Planet in this brand new adventure packed with impossible tests of skill and patience. Craft intricate combos to unfold the complex puzzle of flying projectiles and moving targets into a graceful sequence of well timed shots and jumps.

name: Love In a Bottle
summary: Ankora the Love Demon only has a month to prove she can live on her own, but the cute single ladies in her area might turn out to be a distraction! Can she settle down and find love?!

name: Logialand
summary: Dive into a world where physics reign supreme, allowing you to manipulate objects and press buttons in unique ways to solve intricate puzzles. Use the power of elements to your advantage - from conducting electricity with a wet object to defrosting frozen doors with heat.

name: Lovely Pop Mahjong: JangJang Shimasho
summary: Lovely Pop Mahjong JangJang Shimasho is a strip mahjong game with extensively animated strip sequences. Mahjong matches are played against the members of an all female pop-band called 'VisKiss'. After defeating an opponent, the player is given the chance to play a mini-game to gain more points. Points can be spent at an item shop to buy items to help the player cheat in following rounds.

name: Looney Tunes Galactic Sports
summary: Bugs Bunny & Co. go to Mars to compete in the zany Galactic Sports event.

name: Lost Items
summary: You wake up lost in a maze and realize there are many items on the ground. They all seem high-valuable, so you decide to pick them all. But there are also many ghosts that don't really want you to pick the items. Not that they will try to kill you, but they'll steal and move the items...

name: Love with Furry
summary: Love with Furry - exciting game consisting of a series of exciting Mini-novels with furry girls. Relaxing gameplay and cute atmosphere.

name: Long Hike with a Cute Girl
summary: Grace asked you to come with her on a quiet early morning hike, but her tight shorts and upbeat attitude make it seem like maybe she has a little more in store for you...

name: Lost in the Mirrors
summary: Enter a mysterious mirror maze. Your cleaning job becomes a survival game as darkness falls. Mirrors reflect your fears, creating eerie illusions. Grasp your cleaning tools and wipe away stains - it's your only escape route. Clear all stains to flee this maze. Dare to face "Lost in the Mirrors"?

name: Lost Snowmen
summary: A puzzle-platformer starring three characters with different skill sets, who will have to assist each other during their adventures in order to fulfill a variety of level objectives.

name: Love and Crime
summary: Visual romantic anime novel in the otome genre - a thriller with an exciting detective plot. Take up the investigation! Find your love! Your choices influence the plot and actions of the characters! 7 novel endings!

name: Love Island
summary: Tired of the hustle and bustle? Take a tour to Love Island - catch 'em all, bang 'em all! Play this match-three game with RPG elements to seduce all those charming anime girls!

name: Lost Lands: Stories of the First Brotherhood
summary: A strong brotherhood is forged only in difficult trials.

name: Lost Diskettes Vol. 1
summary: This is a collection of short and experimental horror experiences, focused on surreal and bizarre plots.

name: Long Ago: A Puzzle Tale
summary: Long Ago: A Puzzle Tale is a relaxing puzzle game combined with a modern fairy tale told in rhyme. Experience a beautiful colorful world and follow the story of a brave princess striving for freedom and adventure when everyone around her tries to keep her in line with the status quo.

name: Lost Dutchman's Gold
summary: Lost Dutchman's Gold is a text based adventure game.

name: Lockdown VR: Kidnapped
summary: Backpacking was all fun and enjoyable, until you and your friends hitchhiked a ride to your next destination. Will this be your final destination? Alone or with up to 6 players, explore, gather clues, and escape before its too late!

name: Love Sweets
summary: After Itsuki’s first year at Hayagase Gakuen passed uneventfully, he thought that if things continued as is, then he would graduate without having done anything. His friends all got girlfriends after the spring break. He didn’t think that they were seeing anyone during school, and it seemed that they had met while working part-time. Itsuki wanted a girlfriend too, so he decided to find a part-time at a place where there were lots of girls. That’s how he started working at Cafe Hot Chocolat with his childhood friend, energetic kouhai, kind senpai and a girl who he thought was out of his league.

name: Love Bites
summary: Play as male or female in this horror dating sim. A curse was cast upon you, can love be a cure for what ails you?

name: Love Love Joe Biden: The Joe Biden Dating Simulator
summary: Welcome to the retirement home! To win Joe's heart, you'll have to navigate the enticing world of gilfs, big hunky wolf-men, and sleepy presidents... Do you have what it takes?

name: Love Change
summary:
You play as Chris. A young man living his life when supernatural hijinks turn him into a woman. What misadventures will happen to Chris in this new body? That will be for you to decide.

Love Change is a light-hearted, short visual novel with multiple endings.
The main theme is gender-bending, and the story will have a mix of erotic/comedic tones.

name: LoveXLust
summary: Welcome to LoveXLust, where desire steals the spotlight! Immerse yourself in the ultimate VR adventure that's more than just a game, where you can unlock your deepest fantasies and experience love, lust, and endless excitement. Dive in, and let your desires come to life!

name: Lotus Simulator: Citybus Hamburg
summary: Take over bus route 172 in Hamburg, Germany. Set in 2005 with authentic low floor transit bus models, realistic buildings and streets and 1100 unique scenery objects. Also included in this Lotus Simulator DLC: new AI vehicles and vegetation.

name: Love, in Debt!?
summary: Love, In Debt!? is a romance simulation game. You once had a beautiful relationship, but overnight you were fired, cheated on, and even got yourself in a huge debt! In order to survive, all you can do is work tirelessly! But why does it seem like you became a chick magnet after you're in debt?

name: London Rush
summary: Your car will respond to your command, but the night is dark and the street is full of obstacles, so be careful. If you fall, get up and try again, because every game is unique, and you'll notice to starting improving quickly! In the shop you can trade bulbs obtained from lamps, for a lot of upgrades to your car.

name: Los Templos Sagrados
summary:
"Los Templos Sagrados" is the second part of the adventure tritogy "LEGENDS OF CI-U-THAN" that covers a period and a fairly extensive area of ​​the geohistory of Yucatán. 
The CI-U-THAN epic consists of three totally independent books and, therefore, such an extensive project has had to be developed in three complete games of several parts each. 
The first book, divided into two parts, narrated your adventures from the arrival on the island of Cozumel as a poor and helpless castaway, until your triumphant departure from it. 
 
In this second book, "LOS TEMPLOS SAGRADOS", you will have to find Chichén ltzá through the ruins of Cobá and Tulum. 
The third book, "THE MYSTERY OF CHICHEN ITZA", will tell us about the fabulous final outcome in the most famous Mayan temple: Chichén ltzá. 
So, now you have the opportunity to continue with the story of the famous adventurer and archaeologist Doc Monro in the lands of the archaic Mayan culture.

name: Logan's Treasure
summary:
Logan's treasure is a retro platform game.Collect all key on each level to open the Treasure chest.
Collect all 40 keys on each levels, and find the exit door to open chest

name: Lofty Form
summary: Yakushiji Shion is the eldest son from the clan that punishes bad people. But after he assassinated Empire's shadow Kurobe Akiyoushi, it is regarded as a rebellion against the Empire. He gathers the clan and moves towards the North. Every day they are attacked by pursuers. At the same time he is chased by the girl Hiramatsu Yae who fell in love with Shion.

name: Lord of Vermilion II
summary: An upgraded sequel to the original arcade-only, Japanese-only strategy action game. LoVII notably includes guest characters from properties like Magic: The Gathering, Final Fantasy IV, and Secret of Mana.

name: Lost Legacy: The Awakening of the Seals
summary: Lost Legacy: The Awakening of the Seals plunges you into a fantastic world full of epic challenges and ancient magic. The kingdom prospered, until envy and evil unleashed a devastating war. Now, the cruel leader's prophecy is about to come a new era of darkness.

name: Lone Soldier
summary:
"The aliens have stolen a super missile and will not hesitate to use it unless we pay their ransom demand, which is a large amount of Uranium." 
 
"You soldier, must enter the enemy zone and retrieve this missile by causing disruption among their troops and then taking out the alien scum." 
 
" I must warn you that you will move very slow and your motions will appear sluggish. When ambushed by the enemy do not attempt to shoot back as you will probably die because the on-screen cross-hair will take an age to reach it's intended target. Oh, and soldier, do not attempt to shoot your weapon while running.... as it will not work." 
 
"You will come across a number of vehicles which can be blown up with the rocket launcher that you will find during the game." 
 
"Just one more thing soldier, if a tree or a bush suddenly pops up right in front of you do not worry, as they are only frequent glitches that spoil the gameplay." 
 
"That's all soldier, do you have anything to say before you embark upon this suicide mission?"

name: Love Story: Letters from the Past
summary: Discover a wonderful Love Story in this fantastic Hidden Object game! Travel back in time and relive a beautiful tale.

name: Love Vibe: Aria
summary: Wouldn't it be great to be in love with mesmerizing girl? Jump into this exciting experience and enjoy time with your girlfriend Aria. She will hypnotize you with her charm. Relax and let her surprise you.

name: Locodriver 2
summary: A second romp through driving a train through merry old England.

name: Lost in the Nightmare: Deluxe Edition
LoL Sketch
summary: Unleash your creativity and compete with friends in LoL Sketch, the ultimate drawing and guessing game for League of Legends fans. Draw items, champions, and abilities, with your friends. Score points to become the ultimate champion!

name: Loco Parentis
summary: Co-op horror game, where you have to help a little girl find her mother and figure out what is really happening in your house and who your neighbors really are.

name: Love Chronicles: The Spell - Collector's Edition
summary: Remove an evil curse that has caused a whole kingdom to be trapped in their dreams! Save a beautiful princess before it’s too late!

name: Love, Death and PvP
summary: From average high schooler to powerful hero—you've just become a member of the strongest party in the newest VRMMORPG, Inferno, after accidentally kill-stealing from one of the most powerful players. Join forces with a selfish but strong dark knight, a kind mage who tends to go overboard, and a self-proclaimed treasure hunter with social anxiety, and embark on a journey to defeat the final boss!

name: Lost Pig (And Place Under Ground)
summary: A text adventure game about an orc named Grunk and a pig who would much prefer to remain lost.

name: Lost Knight
summary: You find yourself in deep dungeon, deep down under castle and you need to find a way up through levels of castle, rooms, catacombs and mush more. You feel that there is an exit... You should reach top of the castle using intersting but in same time simple 2D-platformer mechanics.

name: Lords of the Shattered Kingdom
summary: LotSK is a kingdom building game, featuring turn based hex grid combat, exploration and resource gathering.

name: Loot Snake
summary: A combination of a top-down dungeon crawler and Snake.

name: Lovely Defenders
summary: A group of legendary monsters is said to silently invade bedrooms while girls are fast asleep, stealthily stealing their precious belongings. As the commander, you will assist the girls in reclaiming these stolen items!

name: Lost in Blue
summary: Lost in Blue lets you follow a girl and a boy who are stranded on a seemingly uninhabited island. While planning their escape, the two learn survival skills, such as hunting, gathering food, and building tools. You can play the game first as the boy, and then play as the girl for a completely different experience. To survive in this adventure, you'll need to learn how to share responsibilities with your partner.

name: Loca-Love My Cute Roommate
summary: Aoi Ichitaro has had a crush on his cute coworker, Kojika Hiwa, for quite some time. When he's presented with the opportunity to move in with her, all his wildest dreams may finally be coming true...!

name: Loot Loot Goblin
summary:
A fast-paced arcade-style treasure hunt set in a deep, mysterious pit full of shiny loot, deadly traps and vicious enemies.

Take control of a goblin equipped with a magical satchel and grab as much treasure as you can before running out of light.

name: Logic Levels
summary: LOGIC LEVELS provides players with the opportunity to exercise logic and planning skills in exciting and challenging ways. These skills are essential in understanding how one action causes something else to happen and learning how to use these relationships in reaching a planned outcome. In LOGIC LEVELS. players learn to position -tools- throughout the building to create a path that directs a rolling ball past numerous prizes. But only careful and creative planning will get you to the highest score.

name: Lore Finder
summary: Become K.C. Morgan, paranormal investigator, and search a New England mansion for your missing father. Battle the forces of corruption infesting the mansion armed only with your wits and an old .38 revolver, and gather scrolls of forbidden lore. But the more you discover, the more warped and twisted the world – and you – become.

name: Love Hina: Smile Again
summary: Love Hina: Smile Again is an adventure game based on the Love Hina franchise for the Sega Dreamcast. The gameplay is very dialogue heavy, but it has a few mini-games and the storyline can be changed based on a luck system. You take control over Keitaro and talk with the girls in Hinata House.

name: Lost Highway
summary: 7 levels (1 secret) with well-designed highway passages, vast canyons, a huge dam and even a cable car (if you find the secret exit).

name: Lost Girl
summary: In the dark, the girl seems to have returned to her early time, On the way to escape, monsters keep chasing her... She wanna escape, but the end comes before her leaving...

name: Lonely Skies
summary: Pilot your rickety airship along a dangerous journey in a 2D vehicle adventure game, stealing parts and fuel to keep your ship running long enough to reach safety.

name: Lootfest2
summary: Lootfest is back for everyone who loves classic adventure games. With more monsters, weapons, missions and of course - more loot! Explore a large world with your friends, using an easy drop-in multiplayer. Any combination of split screen and online gameplay is supported.

name: Love Clear
summary: One day Itsuki chased a cat to a water courtyard at the school which is seldom visited by the students. He noticed a girl by the waterside; it was his childhood friend and kouhai Himari. When he called out to her, that was when his colourless days turned vibrant.

name: Love Pandemonium
summary: A boys love mobile game.

name: Love Pheromone
summary:
"You either have it all or you lose it all! It’s only one of the two in this world.”

“You” have a very special love pheromone where the scent decides your class.
Your love pheromone can evoke human instinctual impulses!
Is this power a blessing or a curse?

name: Logic Dots 2
summary: If you love solving ingenious puzzles, you need Logic Dots 2! A uniquely fantastic combination of Sudoku and Battleship, it's easy, addictive and logical to play. Place dots on the grid to make shapes and solve each puzzle. This award-winning puzzle sequel is simple and logical, but increasingly challenging.

name: Low Frequency
summary:
After a catastrophe you are left adrift on your old ship hoping to find life.

Although not human...

name: Lode Runner Clone for Commodore PET
summary: After 40 years there is now a Lode Runner clone for Commodore PET.

name: Longjuice Squeeze
summary: Shoot, parry, and slash your way to self-awareness in Longjuice Squeeze, a roguelite fighting game where you get to steal gear from your opponent when you win. Featuring wild art, sick music, rollback netcode, and highly customizable fighters.

name: Love is in Bloom
summary:
When Heather's mother invites herself for dinner, she expects to meet her daughter and her girlfriend.
Wait, girlfriend? Heather has no girlfriend! She has two days to find herself someone who poses as her girlfriend for that dinner...

name: Lost in the Past: A Heart's Remembrance Labyrinth
summary: Lost in the Past: A Heart's Remembrance Labyrinth is a story game about love, lost, hope, grief, medication, meditation and more. You will be the our nameless character and experience his memories.

name: Lost in Dungeon
